73b6(rgyud): steng pa'i thugs ni ma mdzad par nyid kyi dgongs pa kun bsgrubs kye// rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs// gal te sngon gtso tshig gsan na// 'bras bu yal bar ma dor cig/ khyod mi snang na 'gro ba yi// skye bo mtha'
73b7(rgyud): dag gdung bas non log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par// stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni// khyod kyis dngos med kun thong la// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs la spyod// rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi po yi// 'di lta bu yi glu yis bskul// 
73b8(rgyud): sngon bzhin mdog dang mtshan sogs ldan// kun nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor// 'jigs pa 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i// dpa' bo chen po 'di bzhengs so// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na/ 
74a1(rgyud): med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ dkyil 'khor dang he ru ka bskyed pa dang skom pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// sbyin sreg
74a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog bzang po// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod de// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// shing gi sbyin sreg mi bya zhing // 'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang min// blo ldan
74a3(rgyud): gal te zhi 'dod na// me tog gis ni sbyin sreg bya// me tog lnga po mchog chen dang // 'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya// gal te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod// zhi ba'i gzugs sogs ldan pa yis// zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa/ 
74a4(rgyud): thabs dang rgyar ni mtho gang ba// kha la rdo rje rje lnga pa// dkar dpo rtse mo 'dus pa bri// rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po ni// zhi ba hUM bdag 'khor bar ni// de yi dbus su 'khor lo la// gru gsum pa yi yogs brgyan// 
74a5(rgyud): e ba ma yA mchog chen gyis// lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs/ rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor// rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i dbus su nyaM ma bsam// nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hUMHkha dog dmar po'i
74a6(rgyud): 'od chen po// mtshams dang mtshams su rdo rje ni// rtse dgu ser po bri bar bya// bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste// phyis ni sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam// shes rab can gyis me yi lha// sngags 'di yis ni sprin drang po/ oM sarba
74a7(rgyud): de bA hI da pra d+he ne/ a bi kalpe su da ha ne da ha da ha dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ya tri kun A tiSh+Tha ya a tiSh+Tha ma ti N+DiSh+ma/ ki li ki li/ ha he ho ha hraHhri hU swA hA// me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas
74a8(rgyud): thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// shes rab can sngags lan bdun bzlas// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs shing // mdog dkar du ba dang bral ba'i// me lha rgyal dbang byon nas kyang // thab khung gi ni dbus
74b1(rgyud): su bzhugs// de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya// de ru sol ba bzhugs bya ba// a shwa ta dang n+ya gro dang // u dum par raka ti// ba sha ste shing lnga las// sol byas du med 'bar ba'i me// blo ldan thab khang dbus/ 
74b2(rgyud): su bzhugs// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+ma brgya ni rtsa brgyad dang // de bzhin ut+pa la nyid dang // ku mu da dmar dri zhim 'dra// ka ru bi ra gzhan nyis 'gyur// byas
74b3(rgyud): te bsregs pas zhi bar gsungs// sbyin bdag mdun na 'dug pa la// de tshe dub dbab par bya// mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di gtan zhing // pad+ma mar lpags bsreg par bya// oM pad+ma rA dze ag+ni pri na ya a
74b4(rgyud): mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// mkhas pa yis ni sngags bzla sa te// ud pa la 'o mas sbyin sreg bya/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA tA ya te dzo rA dza bi nA ya shA dan+ti ku ru swA hA// mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis/ 
74b5(rgyud): gur gum ku mu da sngags bsregs// oM su puSh+pe su ka ra tsa le dz+wa la nI ye shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// dri zhim tsan+dan sbyin sreg bya// oM d+ha me hA me rA dze da ha da ha sarba bi g+hA shAn+ti
74b6(rgyud): ku ru swA hA/ ka ra bi ra dri zhim mar// mkhas pas sngags rgyal bzlas te sreg/ oM ka li su ka li ka ra ka la tri sarba pA pa da ha da ha shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// me te ga re re re re la// gsang sngags rgyal po lan ri bzla
74b7(rgyud): zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bla med pa// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'// me ni 'o mas zhi bar byas// de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya// rgyas la thab khung zlum po ste/ 
74b8(rgyud): chu yi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba// zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gsum ste// kha dog ser por rnam parabasam// de dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa// sngo bri de steng pad 'dab brgyad// bdag nyid he ru ka rnam pa/ 
75a1(rgyud): khro ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid kyis// shing bsregs pa yi sbyin sreg bya// gal te rgyas pa mchog 'dod na// a mra kan tha pa la dang // arka bi la ba du dur// shin tu red
75a2(rgyud): ka'i shing lnga las// sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du// slob dpon gyis ni bzung bar bya// ma gas ma bskams ma bcad cing // bu ga can gyi shing spang ngo // de yi dbus su sangs rgyas dang // 
75a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsam// re re la ni brgya rtsa brgyad// bgrangs te de nas sbyin sreg bya// bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul// sku mdog nag po 'od chen pos// mar dang yam shing thams cad ni// sngags
75a4(rgyud): bsregs 'dir ni the tshom med// mogag gag ni ba lo ka ne hUM daphaT/ te dze rA dzA puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ shing rnams kun gyis sngags 'di yis// re re de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// phyis ni ser po'i chus zhi ba// 'di/ 
75a5(rgyud): lha'i rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par de ka'// rgyud gzhan rnams su sbas pa ni// rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg mchog
75a6(rgyud): thabs khung gru gsum dmar po la// zabs dang rgyur ni sor mo brgyad// de dbus pad+ma mdab brgyad dmar// zla ba dmar la sogs pas brgyan// grA gA ru ni rdo rje dmar// bdag nyid he ru kar bsam pa// dmar
75a7(rgyud): po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag/ rdo rje dmar po thod pa bsnams// yongs su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis// khams gsum pa la rjes su chags// a sho ka yi yam shing dang // ge ro tsa nar ldan pa ni/ blo ldan
75a8(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs te// shin tu mnyam gzhag sngags ni gdon// oM a sho ka ni su ra ke a nu rA ga ya tre lo kya ba shaM ka rI trai lo kya ba sha mA na ya hrIHswA hA/ nyin bdun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ 
75b1(rgyud): khams gsum dbang du 'gyur ba yin// chu ni dmar pos me zhi bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// mngon spyod dang ni bsad pa mchog/ zla ba phyed pa'i cha 'dra'i thab// zabs dang rgyar ni khru gang tshad// 'jigs
75b2(rgyud): / chen mdog ni ljang ku'o// kla grwa ru ni rdo rje bri// dbus kyi sa gzhi stong pa ru// blo ldan sha lngas sbyin sreg bya// gsod pa yi ni sbyin sreg mchog/ mngon spyod gsod pa ru ni gsungs// dgra kun bsnun cing bzlog
75b3(rgyud): par byed// dgra bo thur du kha bltas shing // kha nas khrag ni skyug pa nyid// sha yi dbus su bsam par bya// seng ldeng sol bas me bya ste// med na 'bra' bo la nyid kyi// 'ba' 'bo tshar mas sha phug ste// brgya
75b4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad du sngags kyis srog/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya kA li yakA li ya sarba sha trUM nA sha ya hUM phaT// bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing // sku mdog sngo na po thugs 'khrugs pas// dgra rnams thams cad
75b5(rgyud): brlag par ni// skad cig de la the tshom med// pad mdzad 'i rngags shing 'jigs par byed// ha ha zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzad// gdug pa thams cad gsad par ni// sbyin bsreg tsam gyis the
75b6(rgyud): chom med// 'di lta'i bsad pa'i sbyin sreg dang // mngon spyod kyang ni rnyed dka' ba/ rnal 'byor lha mos rtogs min na// sngags skyes phal lta smos ci dgos// de phyir sangs rgyas thod pa yi// rnal 'byor/ 
75b7(rgyud): nga rgyal dang bral bas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems// lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'// ljang ku'i chu yis me zhi bya// gang gis bsregs shing gang zhig bsregs// gang gi zhi ba gang
75b8(rgyud): zhi ba// gang gis rnam rtog kun bcom pa// de yis sems ni mgu bar byed// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sbyin sreg gi tshe/ 
76a1(rgyud): ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// spyod pa'i le'u shin tu rnyed dka' ba// bud med shi na tu mchog gyur dang // rnal 'byor gang
76a2(rgyud): gis spyod kun byed// dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam// sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod// de de'i dngos grub rtag tu ster// lag pas thod pa bzung byas te// gcer
76a3(rgyud): bu skra grol gyur pa yi// brtul zhugs can gyi spyod pas 'khyam// gang du gang tshe de tshe der// rtag tu spyod pa thams cad bya// rgyun rnams kun las rnam grol zhing // nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa yi// shes rab
76a4(rgyud): can gyis khyim khyim du// slongs mi bya bar the tshom med// yi ngang dang 'thun pa kun blangs nas// bsam gtan gnas su the tshom med// dga' ba'i nga sems kyis bsams nas ni// rnal 'byor ma yi slongs mo
76a5(rgyud): bslangs// chos la gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas// thod pa'i steng du bzhag pa yi// rdzas ni de nas bza' bar bya// rdzas ni zos ma thag tu yang // khyim khyim thal phung shing drung dang // gang du gang che der de'i/ 
76a6(rgyud): tshe// gang gi dga' ba'i sems de yis// blo gros chen po gnyid log phreng // 'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya chen po nges par 'thob// de ltar yang ni rgyud las gsungs// gang du ji ltar der de ltar// gang gis
76a7(rgyud): de yis sangs rgyas te// rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams// mtha' dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las spyod pa'i le'u ste/ 
76a8(rgyud): dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// gcig tu sems can don rab nges// gser du nges par byed pa'i le'u/ slob dpon la ni rab dang bas// mu tig dang ni nya phyis dang // dngul chu dang / 
76b1(rgyud): ni byu ru yis// gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur// 'di ni phyi yi sman min te// shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing // dngul chu bcud len ma yin te// mu zi lhang tsher ma yin zhing // lcags dang zha nyi zangs ma min// 
76b2(rgyud): lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te// grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no// 'di lta bu yi tshig thos nas// phyag na rdo rje stobs po ches// zhabs kyi rdul gyi cha btud nas// sems dpa' gcig tu dad brtan pas// lha mo leg
76b3(rgyud): so zhes ni smras// sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing // dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu// gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal// lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs// grub pa'i sman gyi mchog gang lags// gang gis
76b4(rgyud): sems can nor ldan 'gyur// tshe 'phel ba la brtson pa gang // sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis// sman chen grags pas 'grub pa gang // gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur// mo sham bu dang ldan
76b5(rgyud): gyur gang // yang dang yang du mi 'chi zhing // shi nas yang dag 'tsher 'gyur ba// lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs// bka' stsal pa/ khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi// sman chen po yis 'grub pa ste// de yang snod/ 
76b6(rgyud): bzang mchog la 'grub/ byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so// bdag don gcig pu la 'bab cing // kye ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas// ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur// snod bzang la ni gnas pa'i bcud// ze
76b7(rgyud): 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te// ro bcud rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i// sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod// gang gis lcags ni gser 'gyur ba// ga cig gis kyang ni grangs med 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sman chen mchog
76b8(rgyud): ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas// rab 'byor mchog sngon 'gro bas// sman gyi mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// der ni yang dag sbyor ba bshad// dad pa brtan pa yis ni nyon// me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang // 
77a1(rgyud): gzhon nu kha dog nag mo ste// rgyud 'di thos pa dang ldan zhing // ngo tsha med cing ltos med ma// 'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brten cing // rtag tu rab smras
77a2(rgyud): rtsog med ma// 'di lta'i bud med rab blangs te// sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam// skyes bu shin tu chags che zhing // myur du byang chub sems 'bab pa// gang yin de la dngos grub med// 'di lta bu
77a3(rgyud): yi sman chen po// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'// shin tu bstan pa'i sems kyis ni// blo ldan bud med de rnams brten// de ltar yang gsungs pa// rab tu brtan pa gtso bo'i gnas// zhes ni sgrub pa po
77a4(rgyud): rnams smra/ de phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// snod bzang nga 'bras bu bskul bar bya// der ni me tog ldan bud med// gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka da' brtsam// grub pa'i bcud kyis byugs pa yi// zla ba rang
77a5(rgyud): gi snying ker bsam// sngon du ri yi rgyal pos rgya ni// der ni yi ge hI sa bin// sems can don la cig tu 'bad// blo ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam// zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas// zlum po
77a6(rgyud): snod bzang la gtsug ste// g.yon pa bskum pa'i g.yas zur bzhag/ med na lcags kyang bya ba yin// brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni// de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam// ri rab zla ba sa bon rgyal// zhu 'gyur the
77a7(rgyud): tsho ma med pa yin// snod bzang der ni ngal bsos pas// 'pho ba'i sbyor bas 'dzag pa nyid// bzang por myur du rab blangs te// mkhas pa yis ni byug par bya// rdog po byugs pa tsam gyis ni// me yi nang du gzhug bya zhing / 
77a8(rgyud): de nas shes rab can bltas na// gser du 'gyur bar the tshom med// de ni ma sha gcig gis ni// srang brgya ru ni 'gyur ba yin// de ltar gser gyi sbyor ba mchog/ 'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'// gal
77b1(rgyud): te sman chen tshang min na// de tshe/ sangs rgyas tshad ma yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir// dngos po gang dang gang gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur// gang zhig
77b2(rgyud): 'di tshad min smra ba'i// blo gros chen po thos ldan pa// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi khar// de dag thams cad dmyal bar 'gro// sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na// chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang // bla
77b3(rgyud): med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// de dag thams cad brdzun par 'gyur// mtshams med lngan byed pa dang // sems can sangs rgyas chos la 'tshe// sman gyi mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba// skad cig de la the tshom med
77b4(rgyud): sems can don la gcig tu 'bad// sgom ldan 'grub pa/ lta ci smos// dman mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur// ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod// mi ni bskal pa bye bar 'tsho// de nas
77b5(rgyud): yang dag rab bshad pa// mo sham rnams kyi bu med pa// yang dag sbyor bas bkrus tsam gyis// skad cig de la bu ldan 'gyur// sngon gyi gtso bos ji skad gsungs// khrus kyi cho ga rab tu bshad// kha dog
77b6(rgyud): lnga yi rdul tshon nam// yang na rdul tshon dkar po yis// dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yis// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// der ni bum pa lto che ba// zlum po bzhi ni bzhag par bya// shes rab
77b7(rgyud): can gyis chu yis dgang // ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya// rang gi khrag gis mtshan ma bri// bud med mo sham de yi ni// khams kyi gtso bo blangs nas ni// mkhas pas bum pa'i kha la byug/ de nas
77b8(rgyud): khrag 'thung go 'phang la// gnas pa sgom pa'i mchog ldan pas// nag po dmar mo 'jigs chen po// rdo rje hUM las yang dag byung // 'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs byed pa// zhal cig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ 
78a1(rgyud): bla ma 'jigs pa'i gar byed cing // mkhas pas hUM ni sgrogs bzhin pa// blo ldan bum pa'i nang du bsam// de nas ral gri 'dzin pa yi// skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po// khro ba
78a2(rgyud): gzhan gyi sems dang ldan// 'jigs chen skyes bu de rnams kyis// ral gris na mkhar bsnun cing gsod// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba dang // 'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas// de bzhin du ni bud med bkru// 
78a3(rgyud): skad cig de la bkrus tsam gyis// bud med bu dang ldan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thod paHzhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sman chen po khyad par can dang / me sham gyi
78a4(rgyud): khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// mkha' lding sbyor las byung ba'i le'u// sngon du gsung sa pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ 
78a5(rgyud): blo ldan he ru ka dang ni// kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed/ mtshan ma phyag sogs sngon gsung bzhin// kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid// phyag sa kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar zhing // mtshams kyi dmar po nyid yin/ 
78a6(rgyud): no// sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs// bum pa rnam pa bzhi po la// sngon gsungs phyag mtshan bri bar bya// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyis ni slob ma rjes
78a7(rgyud): su bzung // sngon gyi cho gas gsol btab te// sbyin dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang // de nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// slar yang gsang sngags 'di yis ni// slob ma rjes su bzung bar bya// sa stengs ni dus
78a8(rgyud): zin la// cung zad gso bar mi nus te// nam mkha' lding can gyis btang zhing // dus su zin ces smra ba na// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// blo ldan de nas las brtsam mo// bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing // 
78b1(rgyud): kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad de// de kun sku ni dkar po ru// cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya// 'bras btags rang bzhin blangs nas ni// rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis bya'o// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ 
78b2(rgyud): de yi lag pa ra ral gri sbyin// de yi snying kar sngags bris gzhug/ mdab ma gang dang gang de la// mar khu che byas snag tsha dang // mkhas pas sngags ni bri bar bya// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHoM ka pA li ni brdzi
78b3(rgyud): Ni aHbid+h+waM sa ya sarba nA ga na ud ba ya d+ya d+ha ra Ni/ bi b+ha ya ka la da sha na/ b+h+yo b+he b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+ha ka pA li nI sarba na Na k+Sha ye ka ri ha ha ha swA hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags so// de ltar yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ 
78b4(rgyud): 'dab ma snying kar gzhug par bya// gsang sngags 'di// dang lcug ma yis// lan bdun pa ra du spyan drang ngo // oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni g+he Ta g+ha TA/ g+ha Da g+ha Da hI hI haHhaHhe heHhaM/ lan bdun bsngags
78b5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis// bar snang du ni lding 'gyur te// gcig ni dum bu dum bu ru// sa la ltung ba ru ni 'gyur// dus zin 'dir langs the tshom med// gzhan yang sbyor ba rnyed dka'
78b6(rgyud): gang // pad btegs la sogs bcwo lnga po// glegs bam la ni bri ma byas// bla ma'i drin las shes par bya// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang
78b7(rgyud): ba las rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag nges pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces
78b8(rgyud): gsol to// rnal 'byor ma yi gtsor gyur pa// shes rab chen po lha mo legs// khyod kyis gsungs pa'i sbyor ba gang // 'jig rten na yang rnyed par dka'// bdag nyid gis rgyud kun mthong mod kyi// sbyor ba 'di dag rnyed par/ 
79a1(rgyud): dka' rgyud 'dir khyod kyis gang gsungs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis ma bshad do// e ma'o sems can don la brtson// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun bskyed ma// e ma'o phyag rgya che la brtson
79a2(rgyud): sngags rnams kun gyi rab sbyor ba// shin tu rnyed dka' gang yin des// rnal 'byor pa gang ngo mtshar ba// sna tshogs byed 'gyur lha mo gsungs// dang po'i le'ur gang gang gsungs sbyor te lha mo bdag la shod// 'di lta
79a3(rgyud): bu yi tshigs gsan nas// rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs sde// bzhad cing shin tu bzhad pa yis// lha rnams thams cad skrag pa dang // bdud sde thams cad 'bros pa dang // bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par
79a4(rgyud): 'gyur// e ma'o bzhad pa'i nges pa yis// rgyal ba'i mchog kun ngo mtshar ro// gsungs pa/ rgyal mtshan 'phyang ba blang byas la// de/ yi sha yang blang bya zhing // de yi rked cha'i rus pa ni// blangs
79a5(rgyud): nas thab khung du ni bya// de yi thod pa'i rjes bzung ste// rgyus pa sdong bur byas te bzhag/ de yi mar khus dgang bya zhing // thab khung gru gsum steng du bzhag/ gzhan yang dud pa 'bebs pa dang // ji srid dud pa
79a6(rgyud): chags kyi ba ra// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gsang sngags 'di ni bzla bar bya// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni b+ha ra b+ha ra// d+ha d+ha ra d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha rA pa ya d+ha rA pa ya/ she Sha ya she Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta pa ya trUM tAM/ oM maM
79a7(rgyud): saM ra d+h+waM ku ru ku ru b+ho b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+ha ka pA la s+ya dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya shI g+h+raM ka dza la pa taM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ trAM trAM a hUM stam+b+ha ya/ b+ho b+ha ga ba ti hUM aM phaT/ 'di ltar sngags kyi rgyal po yis// 'jig rten gsum yang rkams par/ 
79a8(rgyud): byed// 'byung po ro langs mkha' 'gro ma// srin po sha za la sogs dang // gzhan yang rung ste bgegs de rnams// thos pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur// ji srid dud pa ma bababs pa// de srid sngags ni bzla bar bya// 
79b1(rgyud): dung ba babs ma thag tu ni// lag pa gnyis kas bzung bar bya// de nas blo tshan rnal 'byor pas// rol rtsed phreng ba btung bar bya// bu mo lon bcu drug ma// lang tsho'i gzugs la brtse ba can// 'di ni rnal 'byor
79b2(rgyud): pa yis spyad// gcig tu sems can don 'bad pa// gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yis// mkhas pas hi hi'i sngags bton te// rol rtsed phreng ma btung bar bya// de yi rdo rjes la rtsed 'jo brtsams// shin tu bzhad gyur
79b3(rgyud): pede mdzad pa'i// brtse ba chen po'i lag g.yon tu// dud chen mchog ni bzhag par bya// sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis// phyis ni bags kyis bya ba bya// pad+ma las byung rdzas gang zhig/ de nyid kyis ni dud pa mnye// ming
79b4(rgyud): med mthe bos me tog sbyin// ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya// da ril bu re re re re la// gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/ oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni traMhrI/  hUM phaT// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing // rgyud rnams
79b5(rgyud): kun tu rnyed dka' ba// rnal 'khyer ma kyang rnyed dka' ba'i/ sngags 'di yis ni dud pa sgrub// srin lag gi ni sor mo yis// mig la dud pa byug sa tsam gyis// stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi// sangs
79b6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad cu yi// steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// skad cig de la rnal mar 'gyur// mdzub mos byugs pa
79b7(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te// 'byung po yi dgas sha za dang // gzhan yang grub pa rnams dang ni// dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag gi/ steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes
79b8(rgyud): tsam gyis/ rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med// gung mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni// shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te// pheg brdabs bdun gyi snga tshad du// nag po 'bar byed rtse mo yis// sprin rnams thams
80a1(rgyud): cad 'thor bar 'gyur// 'di lta'i dud pa rnyed par dka'// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur// mthe bong gis ni dud pa yi// bdag nyid chen pos byugs tsam/ 
80a2(rgyud): gyis// gzugs brnyan mtshan ma ri dang shing // gzhan dag gang yang rung ba rnams// khro ba'i blta bas bltas tsam gyis// dub bu stong du 'gyur ba yin// g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni// rnal mar
80a3(rgyud): 'gyur bar the tsom med// mthe'u chung gis ni mig byugs na// skad cig de la mi snang 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// skad cig sum cu gsum du 'khor// mdzod pa bud med rdzas nyid dang / 
80a4(rgyud): dngos po gang dang gang 'dod pa// dud pa'i bdag nyid chan po yis// skad cig de la 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi dud mchog gi/ sbyor pa sna tshogs legs par bshad// de ni mig la byugs
80a5(rgyud): tsam gyis// rang gi gzugs ni sbyar bar byed// dud pa 'di ni byugs tsams gyis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang // sbrul dang khyi dang lce sbyang dang // stag dang gung dang byi la
80a6(rgyud): dang sbrang bu glang po bong bu ru// de ltar dud pa chen po yis// sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o// kun la las kun yod mod kyi// sbyor ba 'ba' shig rnyed par dka'// sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris// bla ma'i
80a7(rgyud): zhal nas shes par bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad de// sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba// sngags dang rus pa'i sbyor ba yis// rtag tu sna tshogs las byed do// glang po'i rus pas bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// oM
80a8(rgyud): bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHhU~M// rta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par dka' ba/ bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI khaM hrI/ hUM phaT/ ba lang gi lus pas dgra'i snying kar phur bu gdab par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI tA hIH
80b1(rgyud): khyikhyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs so// oM bud+d+ha kA pA li nI oM AHhUM phaT// rus pa chen pos ni dgugs par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA linI hrI bo rba/ bong bu'i rus pas rmongs par bya'o// 
80b2(rgyud): oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI bruM hUM// 'ug pa'i rus pas dbang du bya'o// oM bud+d+he ka pA li nI tre hrIM hU~M/ bya rgod kyi rus pas dbye bar bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hAHphaT hUM/ bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li/ 
80b3(rgyud): nI badz+ri Ne traM// ce spyang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI b+ha ga ba ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ha he ho ha ha// ma he'i rus pas dga' zhing rtse bas lo bcu gnyis su nyin dang mtshan du de'i byang chub sem/ 
80b4(rgyud): mi ltung ngo // oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ra ma ra ma kri Ta kre Ta ha ha/ ra sbrul gyi rus pas shing rtsad nas 'don no// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ta Ta ta Ta/ tra ta ya/ da tra ta ya/ ma ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya u ta pa ta ya hUM phaT/ 
80b5(rgyud): sdug gi rus pas raM 'degs par byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA lo nAM/ g+hA ra g+ha ra/ maT ma Ta/ tra Ta ya tra TA ya/ g+ha nA pa ya g+hanA pa ya/ sAT srAT moT mo Ta ya sa kra ma ya hrIHhUM traM phaT/ lcags kyus naM
80b6(rgyud): nags stug po stong par byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+ra nA sha yA me ra ye/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni sarba ba na ya ti na hri ye yaM ta Da ya bi dra pa ya tsa ma tsa ma/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ 
80b7(rgyud): b+ho b+ha ga ba ti aM a taT hUM phaT/ sems gcig dri med me long bzhin// gang bsams de yang gzugs brnyan dang / rmi lam lta bur shes mod kyi// 'on kyang rnam par rtog pas gzungs// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes
80b8(rgyud): bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sngags sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// 
81a1(rgyud): de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// rnam dag le'u rab rnyed dka'// ne ne mo dang tsha mo dang / ma dang bu mo chung ma nyid// gal te phyag rgya che 'dod na// shes rab can gyis 'di dag spyad// g.yung mo dang
81a2(rgyud): ni gar mkhan ma// khrus mkhan ma dang gtum mo yi// bu mo ko ba byed par gsungs// blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad// de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog/ de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// ma dag pa yi sems sbyangs/ 
81a3(rgyud): phyir/ mig ni sring mor gyur pa ste// rna ba tsha mo nyid yin no// sna ni ma ru 'gyur ba ste// lce ni bu mo nyid yin no// yid ni chung mar 'gyur ba ste// lnga po dri rnams mchog lha mo// phyag rgya chen por rab
81a4(rgyud): ster ma'o// gti mug gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur// zhe sdang // gi yung mo nyid yin no// 'dod chags khrus mkhan ma yin te// nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no// phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o// lnga po de rnams
81a5(rgyud): bud med mchog / gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste// sgra las zhe sdang skye ba yin// dri la longs spyod pas 'dod chags// ro las nga rgya la nyid yin te// reg bya las ni phrag dog skyes// sems kyi dag pa
81a6(rgyud): nyid yin no// de phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis// shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni// skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang // skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob// ji ltar dngos po med par sgom// ji ltar dngos po bsgom
81a7(rgyud): par bya// dngos po bsgom bya ji ltar 'gyur// sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin// dkar mo ljang ku'i sngon mo'i mdog/ 'di lta'i gzugs dang ldan par ni// dag pa'i sems kyis blta mi bya// tsha mes ji ltar
81a8(rgyud): sgra thos pa'i// sgra grags pa ni rnam gsum nyid// 'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni// dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya// rab sbas skyed ma gang yin des// dri ni rnam pa gsum bltas pa// lta min
81b1(rgyud): yid dang ldan pa la// ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur// lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas// ro drug myangs pa ci 'dra ba// myangs pas longs spyod ldan pa yi// myangs pa'i gzugs ni ji lta bu// yid kyis/ 
81b2(rgyud): longs spyod dga' de nyid// yid kyis gnyis ka spyad pas bde// der ni rtag pa yod ma yin// dngos po las ni dngos med yod// dngos med la yang dngos po nyid// dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga stong // 'di dag
81b3(rgyud): sems kyi dag pa nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyir ro// lha dang ldan pa snying rje ste// 'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o// drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni// dga' ba yan lag ma yi mchog
81b4(rgyud): gnyis ka 'dus las gang 'dzag pa// de ni bdag gis da btang snyoms gsungs// de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa// ji ltar 'dod cha dgas kyis 'ching 'gyur// mthong ba las ni 'dod
81b5(rgyud): chags skye// 'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad tsam// drung pa las ni dga' ba skyes// kun gyi mtha' mar dga' bral lo// de ltar dga' de bdaga' bral 'bras// khams gsum pa las skye bar
81b6(rgyud): 'gyur// rab dga' sems kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po gsum gyis 'ching mi 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba gang ci'ang rung // bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams// de kun bshang dang gci sogs su/ 
81b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu brtag/ gang ci rung ba'i dga' rtse 'jo// 'khyud pa dang ni 'o byad dang // nye dang 'chir ba nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur// 'di lta'i sgom dang ldan pas ni// 
81b8(rgyud): 'di ru 'grub par the tshom med// rnal 'byor ma lngas sangs rgyas kyi// dpal dang phyag rgya che ster byed// rnal 'byor pa yi de mchod na// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur// phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags/ 
82a1(rgyud): kyang / de la nyes pas gnod pa med// rnal 'byor pa'i mchog de nyid// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// ji srid khams phyed mi gsor// sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral// byang chub
82a2(rgyud): sems ni 'dzag med pa// gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing // sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las sems rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// 
82a3(rgyud): de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u// de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal
82a4(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna/  tshogs sde ma la btud te bstod pa/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo// / sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed byed ma// dpal dang
82a5(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams spyan drangs grags pa che zhing 'jigs// sems can kun la phan mdzad ma// lha mo snying rje che ldan ma// phyag rgya tshe na po blo chen ma// don chen 'bras bu sten mdzad ma// sangs rgyas
82a6(rgyud): thod pa yi ni rgyud// rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa// gsungs gcig gis ni gsal mdzad de// de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs// e ma'o gnod chen lha
82a7(rgyud): me khyod// rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa// rnyed dka' dngos grub gang yin pa// de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod// gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad nyon// 
82a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // 'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyen// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa nyon// klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon// rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags tsam gyis// 
82b1(rgyud): bsod nams gang yin de kun gyi// bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo// phyag rgya chen po'i don du ni// sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul// sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni// sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba// 
82b2(rgyud): gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod// shin tu sbas pa'i yul de yang // sems can don du gsal byas pas// rgyal ba'i mchog rnams bdag bzed mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags// 
82b3(rgyud): kyi bzlas pa stobs po che// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla// oM hrI/ bud+d+ha hUM ka pA li nI A/ 'jug pa la oM// 'byung ba la hrIHgnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la hUM/ 
82b4(rgyud): nub pa la ka pA li nI ldang ba la AH'o// de ltar bzla/ sa pa rab rnyed dka'o// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chung bzla/ de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas// dngos grub 'thob par the tshom med
82b5(rgyud): oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhrIHhe hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+re Ni ho hU~M/ a dur lak+She hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ dbang du sa cho ga ji
82b6(rgyud): bzhin du// slob ma dad brtan gang zhig gis// shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab// dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis// maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyan byas pa// lha mo che la gsol
82b7(rgyud): ba gdag/ zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab// rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang // yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes so// lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni// tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed// rnam par
82b8(rgyud): rtog pa mang po yis// g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa// 'khor ba'i 'dam du byi ba bdag/ mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par mdzod// grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi// lha mo de ni zhi bar mdzod// der
83a1(rgyud): ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang // lhab lbu brgyan rnams dbul bar bya// dad pa bstan pa'i sems kyis ni// de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs btung // de
83a2(rgyud): yi mdun du dbul bar bya// gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod// 'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs// gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang // snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang
83a3(rgyud): zhig/ mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs// gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa// bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste// kye de lhan cig skyes dgar gyur// bla ma'i zhal sngagasal bar zhus// gang zhig 'char
83a4(rgyud): dus tshe na dpa' bo dang // yul mnyam nub gyur de la phyaga'atshal lo// mkhas pa rnams kyi snying rdzas su sad pa// phyis ni mngon dga'/ nga rgyal ba'i mdzes sku cig/ sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i
83a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags kyi bzlas pa dang // shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rgyud thams cad kyi gleng bzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / 
83a6(rgyud): 'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas na 'dug ste/ ci'ang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// 
83a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lets+tsha ba gyi je zla ba'i 'od zer
83a8(rgyud): gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gre la phyag 'tshal lo// 
83b1(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo bsgyur// ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// kun du rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing // 'jig
83b2(rgyud): rten bya bar rab 'jug pa// de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de las rdo rje mkha' gro ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste// gang zhig gis ni kun
83b3(rgyud): khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga // lha mo thams cad bskyed byed cing // tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che// de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang phyug che// sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag
83b4(rgyud): chen mo// 'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad ma// gang gis/ 'di kun la khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// des ni de nas 'di bsdu/ das nas// 'jig rten gsum po yang spro'o// gsang ba la
83b5(rgyud): rnams 'di yi ni// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ces rnam grangs// 'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba// gang zhig rna ma par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid
83b6(rgyud): lha dang nor bdag dri za dang // gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas// rig pa 'dzin dang gang yang rung // mi 'am ci dang lto phye che// srin po dang ni sha za rnams// sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur// dbang du 'du 'gyur
83b7(rgyud): 'byung po rnams// chu las skyes dang thang las skyes// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// thabs brjod pa yis de las ni// rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// rnal 'byor/ 
83b8(rgyud): me rnams sbyor ba'i ma// khams gsum po ni ma lus kun// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'o// sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su// lha mchog lha skyes bu mo spyod// 
84a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed rig pa// de bzhin du ni mig 'phrul byed// rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang // bskrad dang bsad pa la sogs pa// dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang // na mkhar 'gro/ 
84a2(rgyud): ba nyid kyang ngo // gzhan gyi grong sogs bya ba dang // mi snang ba dang gang yang rung // zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang // de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba'o// rig 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur nyid 'gyur// 'chi ba med cing rgas pa
84a3(rgyud): med// rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di// 'di yis na ba med par 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su// rnal 'byor pas ni rnam rol byed// bkrugs pa dang ni bsam pa yis// sgom pa dang ni
84a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin rnams// bklags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste// rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// brtul zhugs med cing dka' thub med// dka' spyod bsrung ba sdom med par// rtag tu shes rab thab/ 
84a5(rgyud): sogs kyis// rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub// lte ba'i dbus gnas dpa' bo ste// ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul la// sems dang sem sa med sems kyi gzugs// ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin
84a6(rgyud): bdag/ de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// a li ka li mnyam byas te// ri mo do la sbyar bar bya// ri mo steng du 'bar ba'i mthar// 'og tu 'bab par byed pa'o// khu ba'i tshul gyis
84a7(rgyud): 'bab pa ste// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i gzugs las so// gang gang dbang po'i lam nas ni// de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin
84a8(rgyud): 'bab// dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang // ril bu chen po'i sgrub pa yang // sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rab sbyor ba'i// sdom pa'i sbyor bar byed par 'gyur// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'dod
84b1(rgyud): ba'i yon tan lnga dang bcas/ sgrub pa'i dang po gas bya / dngos grub zhin tu rtag pa'o// gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis// lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// lha mo bden par smra ba'o// 
84b2(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas// 'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni// bzang po'i yi ge'i phreng ba rnams// gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'grub
84b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pas kun la nye ra spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod bzhin rten byas na// rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni// rnal 'byor bdag
84b4(rgyud): nyid ston par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dang/ la// dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur// bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o// khu ba dgug dang chang
84b5(rgyud): dang ni// gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid// sha chen po ni bku gnas su// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig spyod// tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang / gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur// lha'i mig dang rdzu
84b6(rgyud): 'phrul ldan// nyin re zla ba 'thung ba'o// de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te// bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas// lta bas mi ngoms lus dang ni// cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed// yid la bsam ma thag tu ni// 
84b7(rgyud): rang gi gzugs ni yongs rjes shing // bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa// rig ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul tshe// rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na// nga yi rig dang mnyam pa med// rgyud rnams gyi lung 'di ni// 
84b8(rgyud): mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// / de nas de las rnal 'byor
85a1(rgyud): ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'i gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor ma mchog ster
85a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba/ dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis// rtag tu dbugs ni btang bar bya// brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// u dang thig ler bcas pa yis// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed// dngos dang dngos
85a3(rgyud): med rnam spangs pa'o// de la brtul zhugs ma bshad do// phreng ba sngags dang bzung ba dang // sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams kyang // gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// 
85a4(rgyud): sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste// ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi das ni// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de ltar rgyun tu rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa
85a5(rgyud): 'ang // zla ba gcig gis de 'grub 'gyur// dbang po'i mdo ga dang yang dag ldan// dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste// rang gi rig pa rab sbyar na/ des 'di mod la 'gug par 'gyur// yi ge gnyis pa
85a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa// bsam zhing rnam par sgom byas na// sa gsum po na ma lus pa// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang po dang // de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug/ ye shes yi
85a7(rgyud): ges bskul byas nas// de dag chung mar bcas te 'gugs// / yi ge a dang yang dag ldan// sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa// sbyar ba rnam gsum sgom byas na// gong bu 'gugs pa'i mchog
85a8(rgyud): yin no// yi ge khe dang yang dag ldan// sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa// lag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag/ khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no// yi ge rtsi dang ldan pa yis// kha dog ser po kun tu 'od// rta yi/ 
85b1(rgyud): zhal gyi tshul byas nas// chang 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin// yi ger dang yang dag ldan// kha dog dmar po 'ang chen po// phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa// lce sbyang tshul du legs gnas pa// khro bo'i sems kyis sgom
85b2(rgyud): byas nas// khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o// yi ge drug dang yang dag ldan// gnas drug tu ni nges sbyar bya// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub// mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang // de
85b3(rgyud): bzhin sna dang yid nyid dag/ seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya// srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar// 'og min srid pa'i mthar thug par// rgyu
85b4(rgyud): dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun// thams cad kyis ni de bsgoms kyang // de ni rtogs pa ma yin no// gal te thams cad rab rtogs na// 'gro ba'i rol rapa rnams par 'jig/ de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing / 
85b5(rgyud): mi gsal yi ge med pa'o// gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen// rnal 'byor gnyid dang yang dag ldan// gong bur song ba'i yid de yis// gzugs gcig tu ni sgom par byed// sgo dgu las
85b6(rgyud): ni gang byung ba// rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms la// rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pa'i// rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis// kha ru yid bzhin nor bu ni// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung
85b7(rgyud): ba rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig pa chen mo las sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig sgrub/ 
85b8(rgyud): pa'i dam pa ste// rdzas gzhan tshogs ni bza' bya ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o// gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni// 'byung po'i ma rnams 'grub 'gyur ba// brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid// de bzhin
86a1(rgyud): du ni ba lang khyi// chen por yang dag ldan pa ni// de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga// tshes grangs bcu bzhi brgyad la ni// lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas// nyi ma bdun du lce sbyangs gi/ dbus su bzhag/ 
86a2(rgyud): la de nas bton// lnga po dag las yungs kar gyi// 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya// de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs mod kyis// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi'i bar dag tu// nyi ma bdun du lhan cig min sgom ste// sbyar
86a3(rgyud): nas lce spyang dbus su legs bzhag la// de las bton te lnga po dag las ni// dngos grub 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya// 'bras bu chen po rab tu rtogs pas na// de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi kun tu sbas// 'bras/ 
86a4(rgyud): bu chen po sangs rgyas kyis// thams cad du ni sbas pa'o// rkang de nas sgrub thabs 'byung ba'o// yid kyis pad+ma bsam bya ba// kha dog dmar po/ kun 'od la// lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas
86a5(rgyud): gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o// shar du ut+pal sngo 'od mdog/ lho ru ser po lta bu'o// nub tu dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od// byang du mar gang 'od yin no// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa dang // zhal bzhi/ 
86a6(rgyud): phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes// shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang / dril bu/ g.yas na rdo rje dang / thod pa bsnams pa bsam mo// lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum dang / rin
86a7(rgyud): po che dang / kha dan dang / lde spyang bsdams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang / mda' dang / sna tshogs pad+ma dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / rde'u chung dang / 
86a8(rgyud): thod pa bsnams pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// de yi dbus su bsam par bya// thod pa nyid dang kha T+wAM ga/ de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do// dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ 
86b1(rgyud): de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na// rdzas kyi dngos grub rab tu ster// rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub sbyor bas// 'phral du yid ches yang dag 'jug/ thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing // stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur// 
86b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun las phrogs pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa// lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur
86b3(rgyud): gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang // dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// sems kyi gar las byung ba mkhyen// yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis// sngags ni de ru rnam bsgom bya// 
86b4(rgyud): rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan// ril bu re re bza' bar bya// yi// ge brgyad kyi mtha' ldan pa// A dang thig ler bcas pa ni// mtha' ru yang dag skya/ ra byas la// sngags ni kun tu brjod bya ste// gu h+ya b+hak+Sha a
86b5(rgyud): b+hak+She hUM zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor makun sbyor ba yis// dang po'i yi ge yang dag ldan// gal te rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na// lan 'dun mngon bsngags rnal 'byor pa yis bza'// yi ge gsum mtha' nas bya ste/ 
86b6(rgyud): brgyad kyi mtha' mar legs gnas pa// U dang thig ler yang dag ldan// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas// yi ge dang po sbyor ba yi// hrI zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar// yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyor la// 
86b7(rgyud): sa bon lngas ni rab dgang bya// yi ge yis ni rnam bsgoms te// pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya// ci ste rdo rje can 'grub 'dod// de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya// de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i
86b8(rgyud): grus sred pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa// kye grogs po rdo rjes pad+ma kha 'a byed sad mdzad pa// a la la ho// bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzad cig/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i kha ni rab bye ba// bde ba
87a1(rgyud): ba chen po'i gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// de nas 'dir klu blangs tsam gyis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bsku la
87a2(rgyud): de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas// sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// dus bzhir rab tu sbyor ba yi// 'grub par 'gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing // spos
87a3(rgyud): dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i// dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'di ni rab tu snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor
87a4(rgyud): bas// ske dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas// sangs rgyas byang nga chub gnas zhi ba'i// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// 'dir tshigs bcad du 'gyur/ da ba ni// gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang / 
87a5(rgyud): rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan rnam sgom pa'i// cho ga'i thab sa ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang // lha ma yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o// gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang / rgyun tu 'chang ba dang / 
87a6(rgyud): klog pa dang / rnam par sgom pa de la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // rgas pa dang bgegs mi 'byung la 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// rgyun tu thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis bgegs
87a7(rgyud): srung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba gsung ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o// / sgyu 'phrul chen
87a8(rgyud): mo'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin par dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po mgos lha bcas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
87b1(rgyud): rgyag ska dadu/ rig sA ra li tan+t+ra dzA na ma/ bod skad du/ rig Ar li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rnga mtha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan
87b2(rgyud): 'das ri gi rnam pa'i e be sdom pa la bzhugs so// gnyis med gnyis kyi rnal 'byor gyi// A ra li dang ri gir brtags// ri gi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// de la A ra lis zhus pa// gnas kyi rnam pa du
87b3(rgyud): zhig lags// nye gnas rnam pa du ru 'gyur// de la zhing gi rnams pa du// nye zhing rnamang du ru gsungs// tshan do rnam pa du ru brjod// nye ba'i tshan de rnam pa du// de la 'du ba gang zhig lags// de bzhin nye ba'i
87b4(rgyud): 'du ba ci// de la dur khrod rnam pa du// nye ba'i dur khrod ji de ltar lags// de la lha mo re gi che// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cher gnas pas/ A ra lI dang bder ga par// sa bcu rnams ni rab tu phye/ 
87b5(rgyud): gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags so// de bzhin du ngaM lang spyod gnas ni byang gi sgra mi sbyin// gnas ni de bzhin 'dzam bu glang // gling bzhir lha me bzhi dang ni// ri rab spyi bor rig bzhugs// a ra li
87b6(rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor bas// gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor gnyis med las// si sa'i 'dod pa'i lcug ma dang // bde chen de bzhin sdom pa ma// ljang ku ser mo bcod mdog dang // dmar mo ru ni yongs su grags// zhal
87b7(rgyud): cig ma ni phyag gnyis dang // g.yas na chu gri 'dzin ma ste// g.yon na rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid// gcer bu mgo skyes grol ba'o// A ra li yi sku mdog gnag/ spyan gsum phyag drug A ra li// ri gi sngon mo
87b8(rgyud): spyan gsum ma// phyag gnyis zhags pa lcags kyu 'phyar// rdo rje ra li'i phyag gnyis kyis// ri gi dge ba'i bshes gnyis 'khyud// g.yas kyi phyag gnyis dag tu ni// rdo rje dang ni cang te'u brtags// gzhan dag du ni dgra sta dang / 
88a1(rgyud): thod par mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid// gnas su sems dang nye ba'i gnas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'dir yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi/ kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin// mi bzad rnon po sgyu ma che// mthon po
88a2(rgyud): gsung gi 'khor lo la'o// shar sgo de bzhin du ni zhing // nye ba'i zhing ni lho ru 'gyur// tshan do ha ni nub kyi sgo// nye ba'i tshan do ha ni byang // wa dang ma he nyid dang ni// rta mgrin glang po'i rgyal mtshan nyid// 'di rnams
88a3(rgyud): sgo dang sgo ru ni// kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin// gsung gi 'khor lo'i mtshams rnams su 'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba nyid// sku yi 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// sku gsum 'khor lo'i mtshams
88a4(rgyud): su ni// dmyal ba dag ni rtag tu bri// sku la grang ba'i dngos porang bzhi// gsung la de bzhin tsha ba bzhi// ri ki A ra li'i sbyor ba ste le'u dang po'o// / lha mo ri gi snying rje che// A ra li
88a5(rgyud): ni nyid kyis zhus// ji ltar 'khor lo'i mtshams brgyad du/ dmyal ba brgyad ni rnam par bsgom// ri gas bka' stsal pa// ji snyed pa'i sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas
88a6(rgyud): skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang // gzugs med pa can nam/ 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa can de dag thams cad A ra li dmyal bar 'tshed par
88a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de rnams gdon pa'i blos e baM rnam par gzhug par bya'o// stong pa nyid ni bsgoms nas ni// hUM ni snying kar bsgom par bya// hUM las sna tshogs rigs bdag yin// rdo rje las ni A ra li// 'byung ba
88a8(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur ba nyid// mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya// e ba rnam pa chos gsang bar// sangs rgyas rin chen gab cor ni// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'gyur// oM A ra li ri bo po pheM b+h+yo swA hA// char dbab/ 
88b1(rgyud): pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o// sa yi bdag po blangs nas ni// nor rgyas bu ni mkhas par bya// thod pa sbyar mar bzhag nas ni// ba yi 'o mas dgang bar bya// de yi sbyor bas bkang nus ni// nges par srad bu nag
88b2(rgyud): pos dkri// chu yi 'gram du rang song ste// ri gi A ra li sbyor bas// sngags pas sngags ni khri bzlas na// klu ni 'khrugs par char pa 'bebs// rmi lam gyi las bshad par bya ste// rnal 'byor bdag gi mal
88b3(rgyud): 'og tu// da du ra yi khu ba dang // dur khrod sol ba bsres pa dang // 'ug pa'i sgros tsa'i smyug gu yis// ro dkris dmar po'i gos la ni// bsgrub bya'i ming ni rang gis bri// de la rnal 'byor ma 'dug nas// A ra
88b4(rgyud): / li ni khri ru bzlas// oM A ra li ri gi pheM/ a mu kang ke/ ma da me taM swa pAM da rA ya b+h+yo swA hA/ khrag dgug pa bshad par bya ste// rna tshol brtag par byas de nas ni// gong bu mdun du dgod par bya// ri gi A ra li'i
88b5(rgyud): sbyor bas// dbugs kyi gong bu dgug par bya// khab kyi phya ga rgya mchu byas nas// dang po lce yi byed pa pos// ji ltar tsha ba'i gong bu bzhin// shes rab can gyis sbrang chen dgug/ khab kyi phyag rgya gnyis/ 
88b6(rgyud): pa ni/ mgrin sgras dal gyis yongs su gzir// 'jug pa'i las yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar spyod pa'i gzugs bltas nas// bdag nyid ri gi yi gzugs su// ri ga~M A ra li'i sbyor bas// mgon
88b7(rgyud): ni 'og tu rnam par sgom// oM badz+ra A ra li phaT ya to ta ya pheM pheM swA hA/ rengs par byed pa bshad par bya ste// dgra bo nyid kyi lce la ni/ bu ram gong bu bsgom par bya// oM ri gi g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta sha hUM phaT/ dgra bo'i dri mas gzugs
88b8(rgyud): brnyan bya/ de yi sgra yis dkri bar bya// tsha ba gsum gyis kha bkang nas// gzugs brnyan kha ru bzhag par bya// oM A ra li ma me a mu kaM kaM kaM sa ra ya phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ dbang du bya ba la bdag gi g.yon pa'i mig/ 
89a1(rgyud): tu ni e ba rnam par bsgom par bya// de yi g.yas pa'i mig tu ni// rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnam pa sgom// de dag 'dus pa'i sbyor ba ni// ri gi A ra lis sbyor bas// mdzes ma dbang du byed par 'gyur// bdag
89a2(rgyud): nyid bsrung bar bya ba dang // gnas ni sbyang ba nyid dang yang // ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa dang // thugs sogs byin gyis brlab pa dang // yan lag dgod par bya ba dang // de bzhin lha yi dbang bskur dang // lha mo rnams
89a3(rgyud): kyi sngags 'byung bar// A ra lis ni rtag tu bya// oM dang AHhUM byin gyis brlab// de nyid gsum ni rigs gsum 'byung // byin rlabs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// las rnams thams cad rab sbyin dge/ snying dbus
89a4(rgyud): rang gi sa bon gyi// lcags kyus A ra li phyung nas// ye shes rang 'khor lo dgug par bya// bkug nas dam por bcing bar bya/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ga/ su to Sh+yo me b+haHda ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+ham+me prats+tsha e h+ye hi b+ha ga baM ti ri/ 
89a5(rgyud): swA hA// spyi bo snying dang de bzhin mgrin// lte ba gsang ba'iganas su ni// zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam po la sogs bcings pa ra bya// ha ha hi hi de bzhin du ru hu hu ho ho de bzhin te/ lus kyi
89a6(rgyud): gnas ni brgyad rnams su// yan lag dgod par bya ba nyid// spyi bo mtshan khung lte ba dang / kha dang de bzhin mig gnyis dang / rkang mthil gsang ba nyid du ni// yan lag dgod par rab tu grags// sngags ni
89a7(rgyud): rim pa yis ni mtshon// lag pa ba spu'i khung kun nas// ri gi'i 'od zer spro bar bya// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rab sbyor ba'i// yang na phyis ni bsdu bar bya// ri gi hUM saM kaM maM sa nyid// thugs kyi 'khor lor rab tu
89a8(rgyud): grags// gaM tA maM yu zhes bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lor grags pa'o// dzaM ma hA ke aM nyid ni// sku yi 'khor lor rab tu grags// ri gi sngags kyi gdon pa ni// rim pa yis ni mtshon par bya// rang gi snying las 'od zer
89b1(rgyud): byung lcags kyu'i phyag rgyar rab sbyor bas// phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas// tshogs 'dod pas mchod nas ni// dbang ni blo dang ldan pas thang // oM sarba tathA ga tA
89b2(rgyud): DAkin+d+ra nu ga ta ma hA biShe kunu du'os// bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi// des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya// lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid// oM sarba ta thA ga tA DA kin+da b+hI She ka badz+ra swA b+hA ba
89b3(rgyud): At+ma kau&haM// gru gsum me'i sa bon gyis// snang byed rnam par bsgom par bya// snying kar hUM las rigs bdag nyid// de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur// de nas rdo rje las byung kun// rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid// ri gi a ra la~M gar+tha
89b4(rgyud): su// bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya// dmyal ba brgyad ni dathod pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gsum gnas pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// 'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin/ zhabs g.yon
89b5(rgyud): brkyang ba'i a ra li// sems kyis 'jigs byed mnan nas ni/ rigi shing la mngon zhon pa// zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor bar bya// rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas// gar gyi rkang pas phyogs su gnas/ 
89b6(rgyud): tsha dang grangs pa'i rab dbye bas// mtshams su thod pa brgyad po yin// las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gling gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / ri gi A ra lis zhus pa// brda yi rnam pa
89b7(rgyud): du zhig lags// de la lha mo ri ge ches// brda na yang dag rab tu phye// brda ni chen po ts+tshom bcu// bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na// gnas na
89b8(rgyud): dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod// ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid de// pus mo chen dor 'gro bar 'gyur// dpral bar nye ba'i tshan do nyid// lag pa g.yas pa 'du ba nyid// g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid// rna ba g.yas pa
90a1(rgyud): dur khrod gnas// g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod do// snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur// lhag ma nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // tshong rdal nyams dga' tshong 'dus dang // ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu blta/ kharda yi
90a2(rgyud): rnam par shes par bya// rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston// ril bu mig sman la sogs pa// mchog ni rab tu smin par 'gyur// A ra li yis lha mo zhus// ye shes dam pa ji ltar lags// gang gis rnam par shes
90a3(rgyud): tsam gyis// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// 'bras phyir byang chub thob 'gyur ba'i// ting 'dzin lha mo rig ste// mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid// srub dang bsrub byed las byung ba// kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag 'byung
90a4(rgyud): sems pa thams cad yongs su spangs// dbang po thams cad du bzlog par bya// dgon pa dben pa'i gnas su ni// gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par spangs// mig dag steng du bzlog nas ni// smin ma'i
90a5(rgyud): dadus su sem khye ma mi bzad mun pa'i gzugs su ni// sgrub po/ sa dang po mthong bar 'gyur// phyis ni rna ba g.yon par lhug/ dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur// yan lag can gyi bde ba gang de bzhin
90a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bde// phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jigs// de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig/ bde ba chen por rtogs pa'i phyir// de yi ye shes phyag rgya ba// 'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid// rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin
90a7(rgyud): can/ gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bur// gzhan du brjod par mi nus so// lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni// sems can kun la snying rje yis// 'di ni rnal
90a8(rgyud): 'byor gtso bo nyid// 'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni// snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor pas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur// 
90b1(rgyud): gnyis pa dkar dang du ba 'thul// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa ltar// bzhi pa ya ba'i me tog bzhin// lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni// rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs// sprin med na mkha' lta bu ni// de yod thams
90b2(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtse gcig sems kyis ri gir 'gyur// ye shes bdun rtsi rtag 'thungs pas// bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing // skom pa yis kyang zil mi non// rga dang / 
90b3(rgyud): na bas gzir mi 'gyur// 'di yi thabs kyis rnal 'byor gyis// ri gi thams cad rig par 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po// A ra li ni nyid kyis ni// dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas// ri gi la ni gus par
90b4(rgyud): zhus/ e baM ma yA ci zhig bshad// e yi rnam pas sa ru bshad// baM gi rnam pa de bzhin chu// ma ni me zhes bya bar brjod// yA yi rnam pa rlung du gsungs// ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad// ri gis bka' stsal/ 
90b5(rgyud): ba ri ga mkha' 'gro mar ni gsung // sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di// ri gi e baM sdom nga'i se rnam na par grags rig sna yi rtse mor ni// rtag tu ri gi bzhugs pa yi// ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni// kun mkhyen ye shes
90b6(rgyud): de yi bdag/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor chen po yi// A ra li ni nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus// dkon mchog gsu
90b7(rgyud): la gnod byed pa'i// khrag ni ji ltar dgug par bgyi// nus la sogs pas mdun du ni// ya ba'i me tog bzhag nas ni// rang gi khrag ni dgug par bya// ri gi nyon cig goms pa yi// nas ni nyi shu kha smad byung / 
90b8(rgyud): phyis nas khrag ni dgug par byed// lha ni dral bshad par bya// spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab nas ni// der ni sngags ni bzlas par bya// oM he ru ka pa taM pi pa ta ya ri gi A ra li'i
91a1(rgyud): sbyor bas// lha la phyag byas 'gas par 'gyur// a li ka li yan lag mnyam// 'di dag gnyis dbus rang sa bon// rang gi sa bon nyid kyis ni// rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te/ phyag
91a2(rgyud): rgya las ni lha rnams 'byung // oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis// mthe chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i tshul// dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis// mthe bong rgan pos gzir bar
91a3(rgyud): bya/ sdig mdzub gnyis kyi zhags pa nyid// rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po// chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan// ri gi nyid du rab tu grags// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni// si si la sogs rab tu grags/ 
91a4(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te// mi bzar la sogs rab tu gra dgas// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni// wa la sogs pa rab tu grags / phyag drug 'gro ba nga drug tu gsungs// sbyin gsum srid pa gsum du brjod// 
91a5(rgyud): 'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de// zhabs kyi rtsa bar bskye la ba nyid// dga' ba la sogs sa bcu na/ gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grag pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug/ thod pa na mkha'i dkyil 'khor
91a6(rgyud): nyid/ e baM ma yA'i dbus gnas pa'o// bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar bsam// 'chol ba kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis// thams cad rgyud du yang dag gnas// gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid// thod pa yin snying rje che// ri gi
91a7(rgyud): A ra li yi sgra// cang te'u hUM de'i sngags bzlas pas// dgra sta chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// rdo rje rdo rjer rab tu grags// mgo bo nyon mongs pa yi bdud// zed pa na mkha' dag pa nyid// lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste/ 
91a8(rgyud): de bzhin zhags pa dag pa nyid// ngang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni// lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste// skyil krung gdan du shes par bya// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi snying por gsungs// gnyer ma gsum rtag lte ba nyid// lto/ 
91b1(rgyud): ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur// mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par brjod// kha khyer mgon por shes par bya// spyi bo gdugs kyi phreng bar brjod// mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid// 'phan ni mgo las skyes pa yin/ 
91b2(rgyud): rus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung // de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu mchod// rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
91b3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di// A ra lis ni yang dag phye// de la raM gi sgyu ma che// 'gro ba thams cad shes rab dag/ don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste// lha mos 'tsho phyag rgya'o// sgra gcan bzang po bde ba che// sgyu ma'i
91b4(rgyud): gzugs kyi spros pa las// sgyu mchen pos 'tshe nyid// rdorjesgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul pas// don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// yaM ba ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags// yu~MmA na
91b5(rgyud): sgyu ma chen mo yin// de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ mthe bo rgan po rdo rje yin// lte ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs// sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'bru/ la bas// don grub nyid ni gzi brjid can// ngo bos 'gro ba
91b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid// lha mo ri gi nga tshig nyon// las la spyod pa rab brtags pas// lus can rnams ni rtag tu gdungs// dga' ba yang ni shi shir gdungs mchog dag nga 'dod pa pa// dga' bral dga' ba bde chen ma// lhan
91b7(rgyud): cig skyes dga' sdom pa ma// mi bzad ma ni 'o ru gsungs// rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid// sgyu ma skyed la sgyu mche// mthe bong mchu ni 'jib pa nyid// dga' ba'i rtsod pa wa nyid de// sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid// 
91b8(rgyud): rtog pa nyi yis ni rta mgrin te// 'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no// rdo rjer li 'don chen can// 'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab// si si rnam/ 
92a1(rgyud): pas dmyal ba bzhi// de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi// 'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo// rdo rje A ra li nyid ni// khu bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ri gi bde ba chen
92a2(rgyud): por gsungs// ri gai A ra li sbyor bas// rdo rje sgyu ma zhes bya ra brjod// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs// bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad spel/ 
92a3(rgyud): bar byed// snying po'i sngags ni/ oM A ra lI b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/ si si si si mi gsal bar bzlas so// gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni// ha ha ha las rgyas pa la sngags gang ni// de yi sngagasu rab tu bsngags/ snying
92a4(rgyud): bo yin ni/ sngags yin ni// nye ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba nga yin// sgom pa bde chen myang ba ste// de bzhin dam tshig mchod pa nyid// thams cad ra k+Shi ni dam tshig la// mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags// klu gzer/ 
92a5(rgyud): gnyis mthung dam tshig ste// rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags// bsad la ma he dam tshig go// dbang la khyi ni rab tu bsngags// khrag dgug pa la dam tshig ste// 'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid// rengs pa la
92a6(rgyud): ne'u' shi/ kha na ma tho med rnyed pa/ gal bsad par byas na ni// de tshe rnal 'byor pas mi 'grub// sems can bskyabs sems rnal 'byor pa// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dkyil 'khor khru ni bzhi par bya// sgo khyud sor
92a7(rgyud): ni gnyis su gsungs// log la yang ni sor gnyis yang // sgo khyud kyi ni kha khyer la// sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs// lha yi snam bu sor gnyis te/ rta babs sor ni bcu drug nyid// sgo las sor mo gnyis kyis ni/ rdo rje/ 
92a8(rgyud): phreng ba de bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po ste// phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhi dang ldan// kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nyid// srad bu lnga zhes bya bar brjod// gser dang yang na dngul nyid dang / mu tig dang ni bru ru dang / mu men yang dag
92b1(rgyud): bsres nas ni// rin chen lnga ni shin tu gzhug/ lha yi grangs kyi bum pa nyid// rnam rgyal bum pa ches che ba// bum pa bkri ba nyid du ni// sgrub pa po ni dam pas bya// dang poras ni yongs dag bya// gnyis par thig sogs gdab pa
92b2(rgyud): dang lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // de bzhin snga bar sbyin sreg nyid// 'jig rten skyong ba dbang po dang // lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi// 'od srung ma yis bgegs med mdzod// 
92b3(rgyud): ji ltar bdag nyid nags de bzhin// rtags pa nyid du gtor ma sbyin// mtshan mo thun cig gnas pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// gtor ma'i sngags ni// oM sharga ti ka sa na nA ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nu
92b4(rgyud): tAn+natrAta/ sa ni yongs su bzung dus su// bgegs ni spong par rang byed pa'i sngags// oM a nas ta na na Ta s+t+raiSh+Tha ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra ka sA tsaswa Ne khu tiHd+ha rak+Sha ku ru ta me bai ra traM// cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i
92b5(rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o// ri gi A ra lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po snga pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong
92b6(rgyud): shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra A ra li ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje A ra li zhes bya
92b7(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i b+ha ga la bzhugs
92b8(rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba btab par rig cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang mkhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs
93a1(rgyud): te/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni// sman ni bza' bar byas nas su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// he ru ka nI rab
93a2(rgyud): bsgrub bya// rang gi snying khar re pa ni// sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar 'bar sgom// de byung rdo rje nyi ma ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas yang dag khyab// de yi steng du hUM nyid de// bskal pa'i me ni lta bu nyid/ 
93a3(rgyud): do rdi rje d+har yang bsams nas// dzA rje las byung he ru// bgegs ni rten pa mnanan ston// skul bal bas blugs pa dang / phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzas/ 
93a4(rgyud): in+d+ranI la'i 'od lta bu// dbus ser po stobs byin/ dkar dgu'i ri dang ldan pa ni// rol pa'i gar gyigar mdzad cing // ri rab rgyal mtho na po yang // sa yi 'og tu yang dag mnan// phyag du rdo
93a5(rgyud): bsdams bsgoms nas// g.yon pas skyes pa'i thod pa ni/ bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// sha lnga yang dag ldan par sgom// kun da dang niH/ kha dang // chu skyes do shal lta bur ni// kha T+wAM ga yis drag pa/ 
93a6(rgyud): brgyan// rdo rje sA ra li las lha'i le'u ste dang ba'o// de nas phyagan rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / dbang po la sogs pa rdo rje na mkha' la gnas pa thams cad
93a7(rgyud): dang / glang po che'i rna ba la sogs pa zhing skyong ba thams cad dang / kun dar la sogs pa'i yi dgas thams cad dang / de dag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi chos nyan pa'i sbyor ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams
93a8(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po rdo rje A ra li chen po la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ bder gshegs kun gyi ston par yis// gtor ma'i las
93b1(rgyud): ni rab tu phye/ phyag rgya yang ni khyad par du// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// rdo rje thal mo gyon phye nas// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA// 'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid// de bzhin du ni gtor ma'i sngags// las ni
93b2(rgyud): thams cad pa yi sngags// yin pa nyid du the tsom med// rdo rje A ra li las gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming
93b3(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu phye ba// gdong ring sna ni mthong ba dang // de bzhin dpag bsam shing nyid dang // tshangs par spyod pa mang ba nyid// dam tshig 'dir ni dngos grub sbyin// glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// khyi las
93b4(rgyud): ba med pas mtshon po bsregs nas ni// tshangs spyod 'ji ngan pa mchod par bya// de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags pas dad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyis ma byin
93b5(rgyud): par yang long // gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis// ma dang srid mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// de nas dbang bskur
93b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni// de nyid 'di ni rab tu dbye// 'di nyid bde ba chen po ste// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas 'di
93b7(rgyud): nyid ye shes chen po ste// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// de nas sbyin sreg bka' stsal pa// khru gang tsam pa'i tshad dang ni// khru phyed sa la bskor bar bya// rdul chen dkar po ldan par ni// rnam par mkhas
93b8(rgyud): pas thab khung bya// gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni// der ni sha sogs sbyin sreg bya// me ni lha yi spyan nyid de// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
94a1(rgyud): kha rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod sol ba so phag dang // ldong ros phye ma nyid dang yang // ljang gu
94a2(rgyud): yi yang phye ma nyid// dkyil 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsngags// dbus su gsum la rdo rje bri// shar gyi sgo ru mgo chen po// lho ru rdo rje dril bu nyid// de bzhin nub tu dgra sta ste// byang du gri gug dge ba nyid// rdo
94a3(rgyud): rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri// chos don 'dod dang thar pa la// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu dbye// dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas nas ni// der ni slob ma gzhug par bya// ras kyis gdong ni bcings nas ni// dkrol nA/ 
94a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// rdo rje A ra li las la sa Thadams cad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / mngon par shes pa bka'astsal pa// lha yi mig dang rna ba dang // de bzhin gzhan sem
94a5(rgyud): shes pa nyid// sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa dang // de bzhin rdzu 'phrul mngon shes nyid// he ru ka yi dbyibs bsgoms nas// yo gI mngon she sa lnga ru 'gyur// shin tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
94a6(rgyud): he ru kar ni ngang gis 'gyur// bsam gtan la sa ni nus skyes nas// yad ni brtan nam g.yo ba 'am ci// rang gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir// klu ni sna tshogs len pa dang // de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid// sna tshog
94a7(rgyud): rim gro byed pa dang / lus la rgyan ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba yi// gzugs su de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya yang dag brtsam// de nas las rgyas bka' stsal pa// re'u mig brgyad bris nas ni// 
94a8(rgyud): rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya// las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye bas// de bzhin zhi rgyas la sogs kyis// oM ni dbang ldan la ni mer// de bzhin bden bral nyid du la// rlung gi mtshams su hUM nyid de// shar du dzA ni rnam par gnas// 
94b1(rgyud): lho ru dz+wa yi rnam pa nyid// nub tu b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste// byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yin// dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas// ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming // rdo rje A ra li las rnga le'u bzhi pa'o// 
94b2(rgyud): de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka' stsal pa// che ge mo 'di sod cig/ che ge mo 'di dbang du mdzod cig/ che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig/ che ge mo rmongs par mdzad cig/ che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig/ che ge mo lkugs
94b3(rgyud): par mdzod cig/ che ge mo khug shig/ che ge mo snod cig/ che ge mo la sdang bar mdzod cig/ che ge mo chings shig/ che ge mo ma ning du mdzod cig/ che ge mo spung por mdzod cig ces sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams kyi ngos
94b4(rgyud): gnyis su bris te/ gro ga'i mdab mar gur gum gyis bri ba/ ra bya zhing 'di dpung pa'i rtsa bar gdags par bya'o// dgug pa la ni bla mtshan zag ngas pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bri bar bya'o// bsad pa
94b5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i las la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / tsi tra ka yi khu ba dang / yungs mar dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka/ yi khu ba dang / rus pa'i sbrug gus so// dgug pa la ni skyu ru
94b6(rgyud): ra'i tshe rams so// rmongs pa la ni d+ha ru ka'i shing gis so// rengs pa la ni paTa'i smyug gus so// ma lus pa la ni bo de tse'i shing gi smyug gus bri bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ bas mtha' dang ni
94b7(rgyud): dben pa dang / bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang // lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du// lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang // nyi shu rtsa ldam mchod bya// ba dang de bzhin ma he dang // spre'u mo dang khyi mo dang // bong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang // sha ba
94b8(rgyud): dang ni ram nyid// phag dang ba men las byung ba// gzhan yang he ru ka mchod ma// 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med// nya dang zla ba 'pho ba yi// tshes ni mu stegs can gyis brtag/ dri ma bzhig par bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni/ 
95a1(rgyud): myang bar bya// srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya// brdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya// ma byin par ni blang mi bya// pha rol bud med sten mi bya// nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo lang // shin tu mnyam par
95a2(rgyud): gzhag pas 'dug/ sha chen dang ni rus pa dang // khrag ni chen po btung ba dang // khu chen yang dag bza' ba dang // de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid// bram ze ma dang g.yung mo nyid// gar ma deng bzhin btso blag ma// thod can
95a3(rgyud): ma dang ko lpags mkhan// gdol pa de bzhin phyag dar ma// rtswa 'tshong ma dang shan ma nyid// de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang // smig mkhan dang ni chang 'tshong ma// gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid // ma
95a4(rgyud): dang sring mo bu mo dang // sring mo las byung bu mo nyid// gzhan gyi rang bu mo spang mi bya// rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste// 'grong bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas// bgrod min mkhas pas bsnyen par bya// rdo rje A ra li las
95a5(rgyud): le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas dam tshig gi bag dbab pa bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos skal ba ngan pa la// bag ni dbab par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang / 
95a6(rgyud): ral ba can ni thams cad la// dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya// snying rje yi ni bdag nyid can// gal te yin na bza' bar bya// grub kyang lta ba dman pa ni// sems can don byed skyes pa nyid// skal ba ngan pa zhes byar brjod// bram ze
95a7(rgyud): dam tshig rnam par snang // de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang // bzod ldan dal ba mi slu ba// bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan// rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags// de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid
95a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas// de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas// de nas thun chod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' stsal pa ji ltar
95b1(rgyud): sgom pa'i sbyor ba des// dang po thun tshed byin gyis brlab// des ni ci srid nyi byed na// nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa// dus dang bral nas nam phyed na// thun tshong byin brlabs rab tu grags// thun tshod byin rlabs rnal 'byor
95b2(rgyud): gyis bdag gis rnal 'byor ldan pas 'grub// de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dog dang ni ser sna nyid/ bcom ldan he ru ka la med// yod na
95b3(rgyud): rnam par dag pa nyid// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ bgegs dang gtsugs pa'i shing la'am// ljon shing btags shing 'phyang ba dang // g.yul bu mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid// bdag nyid rnal 'byor
95b4(rgyud): ldan pas sgrub// de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa/ rabatung ba rin po che yi chu// gang zhig bza' de don yod nyid// khrus ni dpag med rdo rje da yis// dril sogs rim pa rnam snang mdzad// dam tshig rmo
95b5(rgyud): kyi de bzhin spyad// btso ni gang zag mnyam pas ni// dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni// gang zhig klu yi rang bzhin nyid// mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste// bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa// khro bo yin
95b6(rgyud): bsnyen bkur ba/ bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur// brjod pa bzlas pa yang dag bshad// yan lag nyid sogs phyag rgya ste// lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni// gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas// mang du brjod pas ci zhig
95b7(rgyud): bya// gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob phyir// rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid// ri dgas shor sogs bya ba ni// 'jig rten du ni mi shes pas// mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur ba// rnam
95b8(rgyud): dag dag pa dam pa ni// de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod// de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa// rdo rje dril bu bzung bya zhing // bdud rtsi mkhas pas bza' bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya rtag bsten cing // spyod pa 'da' ba nyid mi bya// 
96a1(rgyud): de nas lha'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ chu klung tshal gyi gnas su ni// bdag nyid lha ni mchod par bya// bdag gi sngags ni brjod par bya// me tog la sogs byin gyis brlab// rdo rje A ra li las
96a2(rgyud): le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka' stsal pa// mkhas pas phru ba chags par ni// rigs bzhi ru ni spongs mas rgyu// chu bo'i 'gram du bza' bya zhing // gtsang sbrang nyid ni rab tu
96a3(rgyud): dbye/ byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyi ni// khams ni blo dang ldan pas blang // bye btab bza' bar mi bya zhing // mi ster ba la rtag tu blang // g.yas su rab tu skye bo ni// g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni bya// nges pa med par khyim du
96a4(rgyud): gnas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rdo rje shang dge sbyongs byas dang // de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag/ he ru ka ni rab grub phyir/ bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar bya// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'i sgras
96a5(rgyud): pa bka' stsal pa// ser skya'i khrum blangs nas ni// sngags ni 'dres ni bzla bar bya// srung bar byas shing bskams byas nas// de la gu gul bsre bar bya// mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon du// des
96a6(rgyud): ni 'dug pa sbyin par bya// shin tu mdzes shing gos mdzes pa/ khris skur gnas pa legs grub phyir// 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya// khris sku nyid ni gnod sbyin mo// staH/ 
96a7(rgyud): byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi rgyan ni thams cad ni// gang zhig cung zad rkyen rnams kun// snga b.ru ni blang bar bya// gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la// me tog gis ni mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi sgrub pa bka'/ 
96a8(rgyud): stsal pa// mchad rma med gang ba ni// lags par brtul zhugs dkyis bkra// mar khu chen pos byug pa dang // dug pa chen pos bdug par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su// mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul// 
96b1(rgyud): nga yis khyod la ci gsungs pa'i// de la dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya// yungs kar rol brdeg bya zhing // sgra ni ri bor yang dag brjod// de la mkhas pas 'jigs mi bya// oM dz+wa ma dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM brjod par bya'o// des ni
96b2(rgyud): ci zhig sbyin zhes smra// sgrub pos de la blang bar bya// rkang byug dang ni mig sman nyid// ral gri dang ni sa 'og dang // ril bu mkha' la spyod pa nyid// thams cad sbyin par the tshom med// de nas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
96b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// gong gi bsam gtan byas nA ni/ de la sngags ni bzla bar bya// rang gis he ru ka yi ni// rnal 'byor gyi ni bdag nyid du// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dang
