119a4(rgyud): chen po rnal 'byor pas// shel dang 'dra bas longs spyad bya// rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni// de yi sa bon bzung bar bya// shel gyi sems kyis longs spyod na// rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur// 
119a5(rgyud): dag pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te/ de yi yan lag la sbyar ba// hUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis// lcags kU ru ni sbyar bar bya// gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni// gri
119a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid// rab tu sbyar nas bsams nas su// rnam par rtog pa ring du spang // rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa// thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor pa yis rdza zhes pa// dag pa'i shel/ 
119a7(rgyud): ltar bsams par bya// rdo rje lcags kyu byin rlabs pas// rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste// srid zhes bya ba bkod de bza'// rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byung ngo // bcu bzhi dang ni bcwo lnga dang // khyad par ru ni tshes brgyad la// 
119a8(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin// sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la// rtag tu mchod pa'i las byas na// spyod dang grol ba gang 'dod dang // las rnams thams cad 'grub par
119b1(rgyud): 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang // myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar// mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbul po nor gyis phongs pa dang // khyim ni 'byor zhing
119b2(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa// bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa la// yi ge bcu yi sngags dag ni// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// 
119b3(rgyud): / rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te/ mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin rlabs la// sgrub pos 'di yi du bas bdug/ 'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// gur gum dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcud phan tshun ldan pa
119b4(rgyud): yi/ rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya// skyes bu 'gro la/  skal bzang 'gyur// tsan+dan dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcud dag ni ldan pa yi// yan/ nga lag dag ni byugs nas su// reg na shi yang mi gtong ngo // 
119b5(rgyud): dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru// bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas na// dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang // mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma
119b6(rgyud): byin rlabs nas// de dag las su sbyar bar bya// ngas bstan pa la the tsom med// gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni// thig le byas na go char 'gyur// de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir// 'khor ba las ni rgyal bar
119b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzang ma// sems can rnams la sdug par lta// bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed me// de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes// thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma// mi brtson ma dang
119b8(rgyud): brtson sems can// skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma// kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni// blo ngan srid pa'i ngo bo 'joms// lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni// yid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grags ma// yon tan ldan
120a1(rgyud): pa'i lha mo nyid// lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni// spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol// de ltar yon tan ldan lha mo// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// pho nyi'i las kyis bya ba yis// grub
120a2(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni// bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal// pho nya'i lus su sbyar ba yis// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// las ku rnams kun gyi snying po bas// 
120a3(rgyud): rab tu 'bad de pho nya sgrub// shing gcig gi ni drung ba ru// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas// khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi// thang ka la ni bri bya ste// 'theb sor bcu gnyis tshad du ni// kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes
120a4(rgyud): phyag gnyis mgo bor thal sbyar ba'i// 'od zer me 'bar lha mo bri// sgrub pa'i mdun du bkram nas su// 'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam// dri dadang me tog dmar po dang // sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya// 
120a5(rgyud): shwa dang nya sha btsong la sogs// nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma spyi na// rdzas lnga dag ni dngos po lnga// mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste// gnyis pa la ni nya dri mnam// gsum par
120a6(rgyud): shing ni 'gul 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang // dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// oM dI pe shwa ri hUM phu// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// spyi bor bzhag ste
120a7(rgyud): brjod par bya// dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang
120a8(rgyud): gnyis med par/ byin gyis rlobs la bdag bsgrubs shig/ de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas// bzla' dang btung sogs ston mo dang // g.yer la sogs pa ci yang rung // bka' bzhin myur du ster bar
120b1(rgyud): 'gyur// thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad// 'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la// gal te grub par ma gyur na// de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla// sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis// 'bar byed ma yi spyi bo 'gems
120b2(rgyud): sems can don 'bad sgrub pa pos// 'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya// grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// thang ga khru gnyis dman pa la// mchod dang gtor ma byin rlabs
120b3(rgyud): te// de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya// dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gso// phyag na bstigs mdzub lcags kyu
120b4(rgyud): bsnams// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer dme ltar 'bar zhing gsal// mig g.yon ha ha ra bzhad pa bri// dur khrod kyi ni das phyogs su// sgrub pa po yis dris sku dgram// kun/ 
120b5(rgyud): tu khrag gis byugs nas ni// me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod// me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor sbyin
120b6(rgyud): cing // rnal 'byor skem pas bzlas nas ni// 'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su// kha ru bcug te bgad par bya// oM DA ki nI hu phu phu// sgrub pa'i sngags
120b7(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'o// dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te// gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrogs// gsum pa mdun snang gyur nas// bzhi pa la ni bka' lung nod// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par bgyi// dam tshig 'bad
120b8(rgyud): de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams bsad cing rtse ba dang // yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i// las la sogs pa thams cad ni// g.yog me'i wa kyai/ 
121a1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla// ra dag gi ni lpags pa la// 'bad
121a2(rgyud): de thang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon pa bri// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / g.yas
121a3(rgyud): su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs byas la// me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun
121a4(rgyud): gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong // bza' ba/  dag dang sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin// 'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla// oM tsu Shi Ni A kAR+Sha ya phu phaT// lag
121a5(rgyud): gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni// snyim pa'i tshul gyis gar ba skyong bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas// 'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po khyi ni ngur ba'i sgra/ 
121a6(rgyud): gnyis pa la ni gang bar dgod// gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed// bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam
121a7(rgyud): tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so// de nas nyi ma re re zhing // gser srang phyed byed ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na/ 
121a8(rgyud): ro langs snying po gzir te bzla// sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis// 'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so// chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kam po tsi ni bsgrub par bya// ba lang la sogs ko ba ni/ 
121b1(rgyud): brkyang ste 'phrog byed 'dri ru bzhug/ lus ni sbrul gyis rgyan pa ste// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar dgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ ral gri dang ni zhags/ 
121b2(rgyud): pa thogs// ha ha bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa// khrag gi sa maN+Dal byugs nas ni// dri dang me tog bdug pas bdag/ rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya// sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor
121b3(rgyud): ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing bzlas// 'bum gcig gi ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen
121b4(rgyud): 'bebs// gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te// bzhi pa la/ ni mdun du gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ oM k+Sha klu hUM phu phaT// lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// 
121b5(rgyud): de yi sngags ni brjod par bya// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur// ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni// rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni
121b6(rgyud): 'ong ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan yang rung // nga 'dod pa de khrid de shog/ gser dang dngul dang bangs la sogs// bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong // lha mi'i chung ma gang yang rung // 
121b7(rgyud): te se gangs kyi rtse ru ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyi ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de yi rkang
121b8(rgyud): ba g.yon pa yis// mnan te lnga rgya bzlas nas ni// gdon ga mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na// dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni// dum bur dum bur btub par bya// kri zhes bya dang gsod pa/ 
122a1(rgyud): // mtha'/ hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cadadu ni bza' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma 'ang // gal te ma 'grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan
122a2(rgyud): pa'i las kyis ma grub na// b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing // me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nyi ma phyed na hUM zhes ni// brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na// mkha' 'gro ma rnam
122a3(rgyud): 'chi 'gyur 'am/ chongs 'debs shing 'ongs nas su// nges par las rnams bsgrub par byed// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste// khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong // nor bu rin chen
122a4(rgyud): ches bcings pa'i// dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste// dbadag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir// dpa' bos gnang gis btang du gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su// bzang po sde 'di
122a5(rgyud): byed ste thong // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gsang che// gsang de nga gsang bas shes bya ba// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nyid
122a6(rgyud): ji bzhin rdo rje sa nyon// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de// sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// g+ho g+ha 'bar byed ma yi
122a7(rgyud): mtshan ma yi// ga g+ha/ mthe'o 'chir bar byed pa yi// 'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// mu g+hu/ lag pa rna bar rdebs pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lup+na sna rtser sbyor mo rdebs pa ni// thugs bde mi bde
122a8(rgyud): 'dri ba yin// DaSh+Ta/ sha pa'i mgo ltar stong byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// gan+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa// nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'chir byed pa// 
122b1(rgyud): lus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// b+hak+Sha so// lag pa sba la 'ju byed pa// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// de ra ti/ lag pa snying kar reg byed na// da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o// ru tsa pa ta pa/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang
122b2(rgyud): ba ni// med do zhes ni ston pa'o// shu na ta/ lug pa brkyang ste lhor rdebs na// pun sum ldan pa ra yod zhes pa'o// kri ka ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na// kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o// tsan+d+ra li ka/ mdzub mo mdun
122b3(rgyud): du ston byed na// nye gnag gtum la drag pa yin// ni la tan+ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni nga lta ston// a nam ga yu da// lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag/ da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o// dur ka ti/ 
122b4(rgyud): kun tu lta bar byed pa ni// tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o//  ha ra ga na/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams su// mthe bong ri mo bri bar bya// nyi tshe da yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg
122b5(rgyud): gau ti to// steng du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin phyed dga' ba ra rol pa'o// sa mtsha ya// 'dzum dang bcas pas blta byed cing // lag pa lag pa bzung nas su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor bzang
122b6(rgyud): byin zhes bya ba'o// dzIn pa ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ ap+ta pa ta/ mthe bong gi ni srin lag la// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// som/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs// su ra bad// rnal 'byor pa dang
122b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa dag gi phyag rgya dang brda'i mtshan nyid do// gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// / mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni// bcom
122b8(rgyud): ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu// shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// 'khor ba la sgrol mtshan nyid ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dang po de nyid rdo rjes ni// dril bu yang ni
123a1(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// bgrang ba'i phreng ba gsum pa ste// ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// de nyid bzhi yi rba rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol rgol// dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// 
123a2(rgyud): thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa// lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung // nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod// byang gi phyogs su don yon grub// rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so// pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad
123a3(rgyud): ji bzhin sa ru bzhag par bya// phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang // nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang // gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid// 
123a4(rgyud): shas sogs par ji bzhin bsam// dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru// ye shes lnga ni thim par bya// pad+ma brgyad pa lha mo brgyad// ji bzhin gan ngas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du// zhags pa/ 
123a5(rgyud): lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste// de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag/ de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin// mtshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir// mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba// bskul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang // rdo
123a6(rgyud): lcags sgrog meng can de// gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya ste// mtshams kyi mdab ma kun la dgod// rtse mo lnga ni mkha' 'gro ma// snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag mo zhes
123a7(rgyud): bya ste/ nub tu de bzhin ro langs ma// lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje de kho na yi lha// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// cha gsum gsal bar bzung ba la// ska
123a8(rgyud): rags kyis ni shin tu rgyan// ud pa la ku mu da ltar mdzes// rin chen pad+ma yang dag gnas// phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni// dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu// rtse mo'i dgu yi lha nyid de// lha dgu
123b1(rgyud): yis ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las ni byung ba yi// rtse mo 'od zer bzlas par gnas// rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba// ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol// rdo rje'i de nyid gang yin pas// bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam
123b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje yi ni sems su bya// rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas// chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med// thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin// rdo rje las kyi snying po yi// rdo rje 'phro ba sbyor ba'i
123b3(rgyud): bdag/ rdo rje 'khor bsgrol bar byed// rdo rje 'gugs pa sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor bar ldan// bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan// rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni// ye shes rdo rjes bcom
123b4(rgyud): nas su// phyogs kun du ni snang bar byed// rdo rje'i sgrub/ rapa la sogs kun// rdo rje'i bdag nyid lta bar bya// chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste// thar dpa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o// rdo rje pad+ma bzung nas su// de nyid
123b5(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub par bya// rdo rje pad+mor zhugs pa ni// mkha sa pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni// zos pas srid pa
123b6(rgyud): las sgrol ba'i// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa// byang chub snying por rnam par gnas// thams cad rig pas phyogs kun tu// gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams mthar thug/ phyogs brgyad zhes ni bya ba
123b7(rgyud): rnams// lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags// yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni// phyogs brgyad tu ni dgod par bya// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo// nub kyi phyogs su mA ma ki/ lho yi phyogs su
123b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan// mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang // bzhi pa rdo rje phreng ba mo// dbus su na mkha'i rang bzhin la// gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes// pad+ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung // 
124a1(rgyud): gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni/ shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra// shes rang 'dud rtsiganas dga'/ de 'i dbus kyi stan dag la/ shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas/ 
124a2(rgyud): steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste// thams cad spro dang sdud pa'o// a li ka li'i rab sbyor gyis// phyogs brgyad du ni bskyed par bya// a li ka lilaM
124a3(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// 'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste// rdo rje dril bu'i thabs yin te// thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so// g.yas pa nyi ma bsams nas su// g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgod// lag/ 
124a4(rgyud): pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// pad+ma'i rnam par lag tu ba skor// lus rnams la ni thabs dang sbyar// rang 'dod lha rnams bsams par bya// rdo rje gser bas sgrol ba ste// 'khor ba sgrol ba yang
124a5(rgyud): dag byung // hUM zhes bya ba'i klu yis ni// sangs rgyas tha/ mas cad rjes chags bya// rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis// sems can thams cad mdzes par bya// rnam thar chos su bya ba ste// rdo rje shin
124a6(rgyud): tu snying po mchog/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De ho hUM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li te/ pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA dA swa b+hA be na badz+ra d+harma hri da ya a ba san+to Sha Ni hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho// a a a swA hA/ shes/ 
124a7(rgyud): rab thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// shes rab thebs kyis dgrol bar bya// shes rab thabs kyi chos kyis ni// 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs bya ba'am// mi shes 'dam du byung ba yi// sems can don phyir
124a8(rgyud): bkrol bar bya// rdo rje de kho na yis bzung // chos kyi dril bus dkrol bar bya// sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas// shes rab thabs su blta bar bya// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// glang chen dril bu'i sgra dang
124b1(rgyud): mtshungs// rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi// dngos grub ring bar shes par bya// de nas gsang dang phra ba yi// rdo rje'i mtshan nyid bzung ba ste// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed
124b2(rgyud): pa dbu ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la// gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya// de nyid kyis ni cha gcig gi/ phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag/ spyi gtsug lag pa la sogs pa// rtag tu dag byed khu tshur bcang // slob dpon rdo rje
124b3(rgyud): brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog/ bgrang phreng la sogs bzung ba ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// 
124b4(rgyud): shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang // gzhan yang ni bu dkar/ dpo sogs// zhi sogs las la khyad par gyi// bgrang phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni/ gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // pad+ma sa bon khyad par
124b5(rgyud): du// rgyas pa yi ni bgrang phreng ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya// gur gum la sogs dri zhim pa'i// dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las// ril bur byas te dmar por btsos// dbang du
124b6(rgyud): sdud par rab tu grags// ru rag sha dang lung tang dang // mi yi rus pa de bzhin te// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la// bo de tsapa ni las kun byed/ 
124b7(rgyud): sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste// dbang la de yi phyed du bya// zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te// rgyas pa la ni brgyud lhag pa'o// mngon spyod la ni drug cu'o// las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar// las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du/ 
124b8(rgyud): bgrang phreng dag ni brtag par bya// phyogs dang phyogs mtsham brgyad du ni/ dbu ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu// lha dgu yi ni skud pa la// lha dgu byin gyis brlab par bya// gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang // gtsang zhing dang ldan
125a1(rgyud): snun par smra// de yis bkal ba'i bgrang phreng gis// grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// skud pa thams cad sangs rgyas tshul// ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom yin// 'og ma mchod rten du
125a2(rgyud): ni bstan// steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin no// mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o// lag par nyi ma bsams nas su// dbyangs kyi dang po yi ge ni// lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu// dmar po la ni dmar po sgom// g.yon
125a3(rgyud): pa zla ba'i dbus su ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsam bya ba// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam// g.yon pa pad+ma'i mdab mar sgom// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis/ 
125a4(rgyud): kha sbyor dbus su phreng bzhag la// de nyid thams cad bsgoms/ pa yis// bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya// sor mo dag gi bye brag gis// de nas/ sngags pas bzlas pa bya// rdo rje ma dngos g.yon pa ste// g.yA
125a5(rgyud): pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o// dkar po dud pa dung dang ni// pad+ma g.yas kyis ra mo ste// gi wang dri gsum 'jigs pa dang // sa gdugs g.yon par dgod pa dang / ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis// lag la sogs pa
125a6(rgyud): las can ma// zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang // rgyas pa la ni gung mo ste// srin lag la ni dbang du bstan// mtha' mar mngon par spyod pa ste// mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni// lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin// mnyam par
125a7(rgyud): gzhag ste bzlas bsgoms na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de nyid med pa'i sngags bzlas dang // de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril// phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba/ rnal 'byor pa yis grub
125a8(rgyud): pa med// rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni// de nyid thams cad kun bya'o// yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos// sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzlas na// rnal 'byor ma yi snying po 'grub/ 
125b1(rgyud): bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs gcig/ rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub// oM pa de pa de ma hA pa de dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma b+hA be hUM hUM hUM/ ho ha ho// a swA hA/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyang byas na// bgrang phreng gis ni lha rnams
125b2(rgyud): 'grub// las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur// ye shes de dag bye brag dag/ yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon// ye shes bye brag ring du gnas// thun mongs ye shes brjod pa ste/ 
125b3(rgyud): dman dang rab dman dman pa can// gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po// klu dang byol song gsang ba pa// lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci// mi dang yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma// dmyal bar 'tshed pa'i sems can dang / byol
125b4(rgyud): song gzugs su brjod pa ste// phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// de bzhin du ni sa yi khams// bstan pa la sogs tham ngas cad dang // rtsa dang mdab ma phra ba dang // bong brdo dang brag
125b5(rgyud): la sogs// thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs/ ye shes med na skye mi 'gyur// ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o// ye shes thar par gang gis ni// ye shes thun mong byin rlabs pa// bye brag
125b6(rgyud): gzhan ni ji lta bu// lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas// gong nas gong du nyis 'gyur te// 'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag/ gong ma'i ye shes
125b7(rgyud): ye shes 'phel// gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste// lha min ye shes khro bo'o// yi dgas ye shes zhan pa ste// dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing du// byol song ye shes glen pa ste// bstan pa rnams ni sems
125b8(rgyud): med pa'o// mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang // bud med ye shes bslu brid do// byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ rnal 'byor/ 
126a1(rgyud): bstan bcos kyis sbyangs pa// skye ba bye stong phrag tu// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas// 'bad de dad pas bskyed par bya// sgra sgrogs phyi
126a2(rgyud): rol bstan bcos ni/ gang kyigs dang mtshungs pa ste// blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob// snying po snying po bstan bcos te// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no// sbyor
126a3(rgyud): ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o// / 'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang // srung dang
126a4(rgyud): mngon par spyod pa dang // re mig dgu sogs 'khor lo ni// phyi rol mu khyud bskor bar bya// 'khor lo las kyi kha dog gis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// sa bon
126a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad ni// phyogs 'tshams tha ma dbus su bya// dbus su ming dang srung ba yi// tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chus// bdag gis las ni bkru bar bya// 
126a6(rgyud): mnyam nyid thams cad rig pas gnas// srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// ye shes can gyis srung bsgoms na// 'jigs pa kun las ring bar 'gyur// sems can dngos po med par ru// sbyor ba'i
126a7(rgyud): dngos po 'jigs pa la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya// sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgoms pa yis// bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul// oM tA re swA hA// mgo la'o// 
126a8(rgyud): oM tut+tA re swA hA/ mig la'o// oM tu re swA hA// sna la'o// oM tu swA hA// rna ba'o la'o// oM re swA hA// lce la'o// oM tA re ni swA hA/ snying kar ro// yan lag drug tu rtag tu dgod// 'phags ma
126b1(rgyud): sgrol ma bsam bya ba// phya ga gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni klubs// kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang // gzhan gyi sna ru ud pa la bsnams// thams cad 'od
126b2(rgyud): zer rnam bsgoms nas// khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya// thams cad yon tan can du sgom// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ srung ba'i las thams cad kyi sngags so// rgyal po'i btson ra dgra phyogs dang / 
126b3(rgyud): nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang // yan lag sna tshogs rims dang mi/ chu dang dug gis 'chi la sogs// gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas// de dang der ni bsam par bya// shes rab gzhan dang le lo sogs/ 
126b4(rgyud): 'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya// srung ba bzang po 'di yis ni// 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// srung ba 'di dag thams cad ni// de nyid sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// 'khor lo mdab ma brgyad
126b5(rgyud): pa la phyi rol mu khyud bskor nas su// dbus su thog ma tha ma ste/ bzlas pa thams cad bzhag par bya// mu khyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su// 'khor lo dkar po bsam par bya// yan lag thams cad phye ba yis/ 
126b6(rgyud): mnyam nyid steng par bsam nas su// sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis// las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur// oM prad+d+he pradz+nyA ma hA
126b7(rgyud): pradz+nye swA hA// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba su// dngos po bsgoms pas bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su// phyag gnyis sems pa'i skyil krung / 
126b8(rgyud): bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar// shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su// sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas// shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// glen dang snyoms
127a1(rgyud): las blun po yang // sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel// snying po mig dgu ru// bya/ de bzhin par ma bcu gnyis te// phyi rol re mig bcu drug go// mthar thug mu khyud de bzhin te// phyag
127a2(rgyud): 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i// dbus su bdag gi sems bzhag la// sgra dang thig le ldan pa yi// yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod// bcu gnyis pa la dbyangs sa bon// ma ning spangs pa bri bar bya// 
127a3(rgyud): sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams// yi ge lhag pa gcig dang bcas// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag/ bcu drug gnas su bzhag par bya// gsod pa'i yi ge mu khyud la// thams cad rig pas kun
127a4(rgyud): tu bskor// dang po dkar por bsam bya ste// gnyis pa ser por bsgom par bya// gsum pa dag ni dmar po ste// de bzhin bzhi pa sngon po'o// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// mnyam nyid stong pa
127a5(rgyud): yang dag gnas// mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su// 'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya// mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms pa yi// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// kun nas thams cad 'bar bste// de lta #
127a6(rgyud): 'dos ni 'dud rnams thams cad sreg par byed// ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis// kun nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su// 
127a7(rgyud): bdag nyid na mkha' bsgoms byas la// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni bzung bya ste// sde tshan dang po gang yin po'i// yi ge dang / 
127a8(rgyud): po bzung nas su// lcags kyu yi ni gzer bya ba// rtsi bar re pha sbyar bya ba// bdud rtsi'i thig le stong du dgod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni// shin tu mnyam par
127b1(rgyud): gzhag pas sgom// rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang // yid can gyis ni bsam par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thigs pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig
127b2(rgyud): gis dbang du sdud// bu mo rnams kyi gang bsams pa// ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni// bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// ngas bstan pa la the tsom med// sngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni// 
127b3(rgyud): sngar bzhin du ni ston pa nyid// thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro// 'od zer ser po shin tu
127b4(rgyud): mdzes// gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsam// rin chen nga la sogs gang 'dod pa// thams cad rang gi dbugs kyis dgug/ sgrub po po yil/ sa la ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rlung gi
127b5(rgyud): sa bon gyis bskor ba'i// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ kha dog la sogs dmar bsam zhing // gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por skem zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes mkha'
127b6(rgyud): 'gro bsgom par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa rgya ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyis ni// yid ni 'gugs pa bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgoms pa yi// 
127b7(rgyud): mdzub me lcags kyu bskyod par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thigs pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub// de ltar sgom zhing bzlas nas su/ 
127b8(rgyud): sor mo yang ni bskyod byas nas// bsgrub bya'i yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo mdab ma med pa la// mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// 
128a1(rgyud): / mu khyud mkhas par bskor bar bya// sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// i dang re ba sbyar nas su// 'bad pas dbus su bzhag nas bya// ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di
128a2(rgyud): sgra yi bdun pa dang sbyar la// mdab ma rnams la'ang de nyid bya// mdab mar 'di nyid bzhag par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod pas// 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas// gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya// 
128a3(rgyud): sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ra/ sngar bstan bzhin du mkhas pas sgom// de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi// gzugs su bdag nyid bskyod par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam pa
128a4(rgyud): klubs// thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin// g.yo/ na pa 'bras kyi snyem bsnyems// dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni// phyag 'tshal sre dag pa'i mtha' sbyar te// de ltar bsgoms shing bzlas pa
128a5(rgyud): yis/ rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur// lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis// rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin// bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag tu// rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no// bdag nyid
128a6(rgyud): sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// stong pa'i de bzhin bsgoms nas su// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sa yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gar+tha
128a7(rgyud): par ye shes rnam shes dngos po sgom// dab ma brgyad pa'i 'a'od lo ni dbus sus don bsgoms nas ni/ phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la// dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya// phyogs kyi mdab mar bdud rtsi bzhi// gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya// mtshams kyi/ 
128a8(rgyud): mdab ma bzhi la yang // sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can// rin chen bdun bgyis mdzes pa ste// rang gi lus la bsgom par bya// gang
128b1(rgyud): 'dod yid ni rtogs bya'i phyir// de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med pas// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// rmugs dang glen dang snyoms las dang // shes rab zhan cing lta ngan
128b2(rgyud): rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis skad cig la// snyoms las la sogs ring du spang // mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su// rdul phran dkar po spro bar bya// phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas ni// thams cad
128b3(rgyud): rim pas kun snang bya// ye shes sems la bltas nas ni// rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur// sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su// mnyam gzhag 'khor lor blta bar bya// mnyam nyid ye
128b4(rgyud): shes mthong ba yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyurar// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sa bon gyis bsrungs pa// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom
128b5(rgyud): par bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyani rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// snying ka'i phyogs su 'tsher bar mdzad// kha dog dkar po mdzes pa
128b6(rgyud): yi// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro// spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas// sems can khams ni sgrol bar mdzad// shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba// dbyangs yig dang po
128b7(rgyud): mchog sa bon// mtha' ru tsheg drag sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su// mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas nas ni// byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur// sbyor/ 
128b8(rgyud): ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // byin rlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag/ gang gis sems can rnams la bstan/ byin rlabs rim pa ji lta bu// lha las gzigs mo nyan
129a1(rgyud): par 'tshal// sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir/ byin gyis rlob pa'i chos bstan pa// yang dag 'khor bsnol ba yi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// snying kar yang dag bsams nas su/ 
129a2(rgyud): hUM gi sa bon dbus su bsam// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// nyi ma'i dbus su gzhag par bya// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// me yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// gnas rnams
129a3(rgyud): thams cad 'bar ba yis// kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi// dang po stong pa nyid du bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas lnga ni
129a4(rgyud): bsam par bya// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgo/ dan// gya gyur phyag na rdo rje ste// lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no// mgo dang / bum pa byams pa ste// steng du 'bar ba'i ma yig ni/ 
129a5(rgyud): 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba'o// 'jig rten gsum gyi grub 'dod na// sa bon de ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa yi// nyi ma 'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas su// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i
129a6(rgyud): rang bzhin du// bdag nyid ye shes kyis srung ba// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// steng gi rdo rje cod pan la// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM ka
129a7(rgyud): dang rnal 'byor snod// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbugs kyi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// rdo rje dbyugs pa gug skyed bcas
129a8(rgyud): ska bo che la sogs pas dkri// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni// de yi 'og tu las rnams bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa
129b1(rgyud): la/ brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya// de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur// babs nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya// rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod// zhan dang / 
129b2(rgyud): drag po sbyor ba yis// thams cad kun nas khyod kyis gsol// skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral// glu 'di yis ni gar byed// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ oM tiSh+Tha yo ga ma hA kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM swA hA// 'di
129b3(rgyud): ni tshim bya thams cad bya// rnal 'byor ma kun bstan par bya// dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la// de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya// oM yo ga A be sha ya// shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pos// 'di yis/ 
129b4(rgyud): sngon du bsnyen par bya// gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis/ nga rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar dang // hUM gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis// sgrub pa po/ yis 'dis gdab bya// sngar gyi smos pa'i sngags kyis ni// 
129b5(rgyud): bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// oM ma na g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+histi tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na// bltas pas 'be byas par 'grubs par 'gyur// mchod cing gang la bltas
129b6(rgyud): pa yi mthong bar byas te gar byed do// oM ma la ma la hUM phaT// 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur te// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// oM ma hA tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phruM phaT// 'bum phrag gcig/ 
129b7(rgyud): ni bzlas pa yis// skyes sogs ring po nas kyang 'bebs// oM ba ta li ba ta li hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// yi dgas 'byung po gsang ba sogs// lha rnam
129b8(rgyud): thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// oM pa ta ni pa ta ni hUM phaT// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig/ bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen par bya// chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni// shing rnams kun la 'bebs par byed// 
130a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis// sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni// shin tu dul zhing brtags pa yis// de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam// lha ni mnyes par ma byas
130a2(rgyud): na/ bdag nyid la ni co 'dri yin// oM b+he ta laM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM pru pru phaT/ thal ba ra lan bdun bar du ni// mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor// nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang // ces kyang za bar mi 'gyur
130a3(rgyud): ro// oM pu ru pu ru/ me tre dzaHhUM pu phaT/ skud pa dmar lo brgyad brgya ru// yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yis// gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na// lce spyang bzhin du 'khyam par 'gyur// sbad pa dang ni dral/ 
130a4(rgyud): gyur na// bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du byed// byin rlabs ri dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mnyam par gzhag pas sgom zhing bzlas// zla ba'i da dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma pas// 
130a5(rgyud): bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// 'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bya// mngon du 'grub pa bya bar bsam// rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni// 
130a6(rgyud): sa bon stan du bsgom par bya// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni// rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par// rlung gis bskor bar snying kar bzhag/ thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam// rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi// rlung
130a7(rgyud): gi brda ru sbyar bar bya// oM yuM pre ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT// rnal 'byor pa yi gsang sngags 'di// brgyad brgyar bzlas nas 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro bar la sogs bzung nas su// dug dang khrag gis
130a8(rgyud): bri bar bya// rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas su// thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yi// skud pa dmar pos dkris nas ni// shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya/ rlung gis skur bar sgom
130b1(rgyud): pa ste// gang du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba// de yi phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar
130b2(rgyud): bsams te/ bdag gis lus ni bsgoms nas su// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas na// gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma ni// de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra DA ki nI ne sa kaN lA kak+Shak+Sha hUM hUM pre pre phaT// maN+Dal dam
130b3(rgyud): pos phyugs nas ni// seng ldeng pur bu brgyad kyis gdab// dbus su ming ni bris nas su// gtor ma yongs su gang bar ldan// skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang // lan bdun bskor bas drang bar bya// rdo rje lcags/ 
130b4(rgyud): kyus drangs nas su// gsang sngags 'dis ni bzlas byas na// dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas// las 'dis zlog nas 'gugs par 'gyur/ maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu// las 'dis 'grub 'gyur// 
130b5(rgyud): the tsam med// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ mkha' 'gro drag por bsam bya ba// rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// nya mo gcig ni bzung nas su// 
130b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab// sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la// nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni// rkang pas mgo ni ra ba mnan la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// oM phruM phruM a mu ka s+ya mu khaM be d+ha bA d+ha/ 
130b7(rgyud): hri hri hri// puM phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/ thams pad rdul bya ba ste/ las gzhan chog ga zhad par bya/ sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni// bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya// gang du nya ni gnas pa yi/ 
130b8(rgyud): nya yi kha ru gzhug par bya// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin rlabs te// ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni// lan re bzlas te zar bcug na// bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag
131a1(rgyud): // tsaN+Da li yi gzugs// gzugs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni// de'i dbus su rab tu bya// lci bas pad+ma'i gzug/ 
131a2(rgyud): byas la// ming dang sngags kyis bzhag par bya// oM stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM// b+ha ga na mu traM phru phruM phaT// gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su// lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas
131a3(rgyud): nas su// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// chung ma shin tu g.yon can rnams// las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya// mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis// bkrus nas bcings pa las grol 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus
131a4(rgyud): gnas par// lha mo rdo rje ma ru sgom/ kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes// 'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar// yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes pa ra ldan pa/ rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// yi dgas kyini
131a5(rgyud): gdan la bzhugs ha ha ra bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma yi// las ni de ru byas nas kyang // 'bras phye la sogs khyad par las// pad+ma'i dbyibs ni byas su// khyi yi spu yis dgang bar
131a6(rgyud): bya// ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni// las der byin gyis brlab par bya// oM kro d+he shwa ri phru phruM phaT/ brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// rdo rje gsang bar gzhug par bya// las 'di sbyar
131a7(rgyud): zhing gzir ba yis// b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur// las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste// phyung na de las thar bar 'gyur// chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la// las ni de ltar sbyar bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par
131a8(rgyud): lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge skom// rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya// ban d+ha'i me tog rgyas pa yi// dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ge ste// kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar// gsang zhing gas
131b1(rgyud): bas bsgom par bya// kho bo'i sor mo'i sor mo ru// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya// sbyor ba gsum ni bsams pa yis// de yi dbus kyi gnas rnams su// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag
131b2(rgyud): par bya// chu ma shin tu 'dul dka' la// 'di yis b+ha ga brtag par bya// 'od zer can dang bla ma bya// smyo byed yan lag lnga dang bcas// gu gul chen po'i cha dang bsres// mar nAg chen pos bskol bar
131b3(rgyud): bya// sngags pas bdud rtsi'i chu dang ni// lce yi dang pos myang bar bya// 'dir ni skyo 'gyur the tsom med// mar zos pas ni grol bar 'gyur// yi dgas gos ni ma ltung bas// mar me yi ni sdong bu bya// klu dbang
131b4(rgyud): ge ni gong du bzung // rkang gi mar gyis sbar bar bya// gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis// du bdag ni dbab par bya// dur khrod du ni gtor byin la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas
131b5(rgyud): nas su// lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung // gang la du ba byugs pa des// mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar 'gyur// lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis babu nga la// dur khrod kyi ni sol ba yis// tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas
131b6(rgyud): ni// bya rog sgo rtsas bri bar bya// oM ki ri ki ri kro d+ha a mu ka phru phru phaT// snod ni gnyis la so so ru// gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris la// gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni// khro bos bkang te drud par bya// oM
131b7(rgyud): ki li ban+d+ha li baN+Da li kro d+ha mu khe a mu ka s+ya hi li hi li badz+ra tiSh+Tha mu khi phu phreM phreM phaT// brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// myur du 'thab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi// dbang bskur/ 
131b8(rgyud): ba ni zhi bar 'gyur// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste// gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin// sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam
132a1(rgyud): bgyi ba// rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal// gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ so sor bzung ba'i de kho na// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid
132a2(rgyud): dang / chos kyi dril bu lha mo'o// kha sbyor sbyor ba phyag rgya ste// thabs ni de ru thim pa'o// dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// dag pa rnam gsum/ 
132a3(rgyud): brjod par bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma swa b+hA shud+d+horahaM// oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsar+b+bad+har+m+ma badz+ra shud+d+ho&haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho&haM/ gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol bas// sbyin pa'i rabs sbyin par
132a4(rgyud): bya// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// thams cad rtsa bzhin blta bar bya// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// 'gro rnams gtse bur mi bya sogs// sems can don ni dgag mi bya// steng du/ 
132a5(rgyud): tshul khrims dra ba'o// gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs bzod pa'i phur bu 'og tu gdab// phur bu rab dra ba yis// snang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad// bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur// rang
132a6(rgyud): gi sems kyis bsdams pa'o// rang gi rang sems btul ba na// bdud kyis 'tshe bar ga la 'gyur// mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni// gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya// lus la ste 'jog tsan+dan byug/ sems ni mnyam par
132a7(rgyud): gnas pa ste// bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas// 'bad dang ldan pas bgram par bya// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis// rang bzhin dag pas bdud par bya// shes rab mer me'i snang ba ste// khams
132a8(rgyud): gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams// mar me 'di yis bcom nas su// ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya// sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bya// mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du/ 
132b1(rgyud): gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su// bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni// shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul// bar du khru gang bzhag nas su// mnyam/ 
132b2(rgyud): nyid lta bas blta bar bya// snying kar hUM ni bsgom byas la// thams cad rig pas kun stong bya// khams gsum zad par byas nas ni// thams cad na mkhar yang dag gnas// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// 
132b3(rgyud): mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// pho brang yangs par ci 'dod par// ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya// lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// rdo rje sngon du bstan pa bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yin// hUM gi thig le
132b4(rgyud): las byung ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mi g.yo/ rdo rje bsgoms nas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du// bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya// yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas su// mkhas pas/ 
132b5(rgyud): go cha byaHsa nas hUM// sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ gangs dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis sems dpa' skyil krung bcas/ rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag rgya chen po snying
132b6(rgyud): por bcas// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba la// sangs rgyas sbyin ni rnam par 'phro// dngos po sgom pa bsgoms nas su// hUM gI sgra yis dgang bar bya// rang nyid ji ltar 'dod
132b7(rgyud): sems kyis// ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya// btso ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar// sems can kun gyi don la chags// de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
132b8(rgyud): gnas par// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyis// dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par spro// de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnam ni/ 
133a1(rgyud): // shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku// sangs rgyas lha yis/ 
133a2(rgyud): mngon par brgyan// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni// yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya// phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// a li ke li las byung ba'i// de yi sa bon
133a3(rgyud): bzlas par bya// 'dod chags sems ni stobs kyis ni// btso ma gser gyi 'od dang bcas// sems can bsgral phyir kun tu 'khyud// nu ma 'khyud cing zhal gnyis 'jib// rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mor ni// bdud rtsi'i
133a4(rgyud): yi ge bsams nas ni// lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni// bas+t+ran pa'i rtse mor bzung bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni/ kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas pa// mdzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis/ 
133a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur// gnyis kyi kun spod pa tang nas su// shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod// rol pa'i stobs kyis lha mo ni/ rdo rje rkang pa'i stobs kyis mnan// dril bu g.yon gyi rlung
133a6(rgyud): mnan pa// nu ma lag pa gnyis kyis gzir// sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can te// 'og mas gnon po btsir bar bya// dril bu lag gnyis gsang bar sbyor// de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas// shar phyogs
133a7(rgyud): su ni bskyod pa yis// sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su// lho ru kha ni blta bar bya// rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su// rkang mthil gnyis kyi de bzhin btsir// dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyi
133a8(rgyud): ni/ rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang // de bzhin gsang bar brtse bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni// yang dang yang du sbed par bya// sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis// lho phyogs
133b1(rgyud): sems can sgrol bar 'gyur// nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis// lha mo nub tu blta bar bya// rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis// g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya// mgrin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis 'khrud de// dril du'i/ 
133b2(rgyud): lce ni bskyod na su// rdo rje lce la reg par bya// de bzhin sbyar nas gnyi ga bzlas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bsdam pa'o// dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang // rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par
133b3(rgyud): / bya// gnyis ka'i mnu ni kun sbyar nas// de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog
133b4(rgyud): gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ 'gyur cig/ skad cig tshul gyi rnal 'byor dang // skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can/ kun nas kun tu skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang
133b5(rgyud): sngags 'don// dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni// gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de// rang nyid lha mor bsam pa dag/ slar yang 'di nyid
133b6(rgyud): rang gos rjes su chags pa'i sems// de nas rdo rjes kun tu 'khyud// de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru// kar nar bcas bsam par bya// rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod// chu las byung ba'i
133b7(rgyud): me tog ni// gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las// rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste// ban du ka ni rgyas pa 'dra// thong ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams// sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no// 'og tu chu yi rang bzhin la// myug gu co yi sa
133b8(rgyud): khon no// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can// skra bo che la sogs pas dkri// lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas su// sa yi nang du thim par bya/ 
134a1(rgyud): dus me'i yi dgas mer sbyor cing // yi dwags me dang dus me sbyor// lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba// mthe chung mthe bos mnan nas su// gsum po dag ni rtse mor sbyor// phyag rgya gnyis kyi
134a2(rgyud): mgor btsugs nas// bdud rtsi bzla' ba'i bsam pa yis// gnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas// dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar bya// g.yon gyi tshan ban du ka/ chu 'dzag pa yi
134a3(rgyud): cha byad can// chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la// der ni phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul du bya// thong ga la sogs gnas
134a4(rgyud): kun tu// de nas sor mo gdab par bya// de nas rdo rje rtse mo na/ phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya// gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni// rdo rje pad+mo bskul bar/ bya// hUM gi sgra yis bkang nas su// lha mo thams cad tshim
134a5(rgyud): par bya// dril bu yi ni dngos po yis// a li sa bon kun tu sbyin// ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse// bdag nyid lha ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje dril bu lus yin te// phyag rgya khe sbyor sbyar bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang
134a6(rgyud): de kho na yA so sor bzung // rdo rje de kho na bskyod la// dril bu rang dag dkrol bar bya// rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor te/ phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin// lus ni gnyis ka mnyes pa yis// sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// 
134a7(rgyud): gnyi ga yi ni bdag nyid sems// chu de byin gyis brlab par bya// sgeg cing bskyod par gnas pa ste// bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rol pa'i rkang pa ste// dril bu g.yon gyi brla yis ral// lag g.yon
134a8(rgyud): 'khyud cing nu ma bzung // g.yas kyi rdo rje gser bar bya// bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// brla yi stan la 'dug nas su// rkang pa g.yas pas dkri nas ni// 
134b1(rgyud): dku yi gnas su bzhag par bya// mgrin pa gcig gis 'khyud nas ni// g.yon pas dril bu bsil bar bya// ngo bo mtshar bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du spang bar bya// de nas rdo rje glu brang zhing / sku
134b2(rgyud): tshogs hUM zhes bya bar 'dod// bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su// slar yang glu ni blang bar bya// 'khor lo stong pa snying po med pa ni// snying po dag ni shin tu bsams pa ste// rnam par thar pas rab tu bsgral ba ste/ 
134b3(rgyud): ngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub// phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa// de yis don ni yang dag byed par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa la// rnal 'byor dbus su snying po 'grub// rdo
134b4(rgyud): rje dril bu'i sgrar bcas pas// de nas de ltar glu blang bya// mnyam gzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// las ni gang zhig bsam pa rnams// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 
134b5(rgyud): sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams// bskyod pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya// gur gum dang ni gi wang dang // ka ra sbrang rtsi ba la sha// yung ba/ ru rta cha mnyam pa// sbyor ba'i gnas su bzung bar bya// rdzas
134b6(rgyud): de dag ni bsgos nas su// rtag tu thig le byas gyur na// rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas// thams cad du ni dga' bar 'gyur// dbang po lag dang ru rta dang // rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma// bdag gi lnga dang yan lag lnga// lnga po
134b7(rgyud): thams cad cha bsnams la// bza' dang btung dang so rtsi dang // zhib tu btags te sbyar la sbyin// thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te// 'chi ba na yang gtor mi 'gyur// khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbang la sogs
134b8(rgyud): pa'i las rnams 'grub// sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// bdag gis lus la gshegs gsol ba// bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya// sems can don phyir/ 
135a1(rgyud): / blo ldan pas// thams cad dbang du 'du bar sgrub// brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos// zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos// rgyas pa'i las ni/ 
135a2(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// rje rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis// dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya// lha ma mkhan shan pa nya ba mos// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// kla klo gdol pa chos mkhan mas// sbyor
135a3(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor bstan bcos bzung bar bya// gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing bar bya// sems can bsgral ba'i gnas yin te// gnyis ni kun
135a4(rgyud): tu 'dus nas bskyod// de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya ba cing / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang // dbye ba'i stabs dang / zlum po'i stabs dang / gsu dam gnon pa'i stabs dang / ru sbal gyi stabs dang // g.ya
135a5(rgyud): brkyang dang // g.yon brkyang dang // gnas gcig pa dang / 'du ga pa dang / bung ba'i tshogs dang // rgya mtsho'i rlabs pa dang // ri bo dpung ba dang / sarga nga ba'i 'phen pa dang // mchod sdong gi tshul dang // pus mo// 
135a6(rgyud): btsir ba dang // bsdu ba'i tshul dang / anyam du gnas pa dang / dus kyi med/ snying po dang / dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu bsdu ba'o// rkang stabs skyod pa bco brgyad ni// mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya// yon tan thams
135a7(rgyud): cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya// snying kar btsir ba dang // rkang pa sbyar ba dang / phreng ba'i tshul dang / nu ma'i tshul dang / gnyi ga sbyar te bza' ba dang / phyed kyis 'khyud pa dang / 
135a8(rgyud): gsang bar reg pa dang / lus gnye ba dang / kos ko steng pa dang / zhal bzhad cing sgeg pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa yis// de yi las rnams 'grub por bya/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ de kho na yis so so/ 
135b1(rgyud): bzung / gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na// dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'bras// rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na// rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring bar 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ dmigs na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ 
135b2(rgyud): mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang // nyin mo zla bas ci zhig nus// de nas rdo rje dril bu dang // mnyam pa de nyid gsal bar byed// a li ka li mnyam sgom nas// rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa pos// a li rdo rje zhes
135b3(rgyud): khyar brjod// ka li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// a li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// sems can don rnams ma lus pa// lha yi gzugs kyis bri bar bya// phyi rol shre
135b4(rgyud): rab thabs rnams kyis// ji ltar 'khor bsgrol bar 'gyur/ rmongs pa phyi rol sems ldan pas// de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin// gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba che// rtag tu gab cing gsang ba yin// 
135b5(rgyud): gang zhig lu rang ni shes gyur pa// de yi rnal 'byor pa ru grags// shel ltar dag pa'i sems la ni// de yi chos ni bstan par bya// gal te sems ni the tsom na// skad cig gis ni dmyal bar ltung // 'dod la/ 
135b6(rgyud): dga' ba ma yin cing / longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya// sems can don bya'i phyir du ni// rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs// gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa// thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin te// rang dga' skad cig
135b7(rgyud): yang dag 'byung // rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba'o// skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod// gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par// a li'i sa bon bzung bar bya// bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni/ 
135b8(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla// gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag/ lho yi sbyor bar thim par bya// tha laM sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson// dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis// 'gro bathar
136a1(rgyud): / pa de ring thob// e ma chos kyi mchog gi lam// e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa po// e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas// e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam// tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ srung
136a2(rgyud): pa med par bstan pa ste// 'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod// bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed// las kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rnams// sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par
136a3(rgyud): drag mo'i gzugs su sprul bar bya// de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni// sngon bzhin de nyid bsgom par bya// sngags pas sum 'bum bzlas nas su// phyi nas las ni bsgrub par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang / 
136a4(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar gzhag rkang pa// rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni// de nyid la sa rnams 'bod de sgrub// yi dgas gos la sogs bzung la// 
136a5(rgyud): lha mos ser mtshan ci bru~M// phyag gnyis rol pa'i rkang stabs ca na// dkar dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus// ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste// sgra ni lcug pas rnam par brgyan// yi dwags kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ 
136a6(rgyud): skyes bu'i lpags pa'i na bza' bsnams// don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyun can// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klub// glang po'i lpags pa'i sham thebs can// kha T+wAM mchog gis brgyan pa ste// g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsnam
136a7(rgyud): hUM gi sgra ni 'jigs par mdzad// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya// sa yi dbus sogs sbyor bar bya// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// gnyis med
136a8(rgyud): gtor mas dgang bar bya// gal te 'byor na yi dgas mo// tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni// yam shing thang shing las byas pa 'am// zho can lnga yi shing las bya// mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang // sha chen la sags
136b1(rgyud): bsreg par bya// sbrang rtsi khrag la sbags pa dag/ brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin sreg bya// de ltar bsregs pa tsam gyis ni// des ni mtshan ma ston par 'gyur// oM s+tha phruM pu phaT/ sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so// 
136b2(rgyud): thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya// dang po sa ni 'gul 'gyur te// gnyis pa la ni bris gzugs 'gul// gsum pa la ni dri chen 'byung // bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te// lnga par sgrub pa'i grogs por ni// se
136b3(rgyud): ge'i tshul du babs nas su// drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed// dam tshig phyag rgya sogs byin nas// gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// ji ltar 'dod pa'i// 
136b4(rgyud): gnas rnams dang // stan ni bdag gi mdzad du gsol// de nas lha mo dngos bstan nas// bdag gis bu la ci zhig sgrub// 'bad de dam/ tshig byin nas su// de la phyag rgya bstan par bya// dpa'
136b5(rgyud): de ltar byin nas su// da ltar bdag gi 'dir mdzod cig/ khade ga nyid la nyid la ni lha mo 'grub// oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hUM hUM hUM dza dza dza swA hA// spyi borare lag pa bzhag nas ni// gsang sngags 'drir ni brjod par bya/ 
136b6(rgyud): sha dang khrag dang sran chan bcas// gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin// yi dgas bgrod par gnas nas su// rtag pa'i dus su byin gyis brlab// lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo// dri ba mi 'am ci dang ni// yi dgas mi mo gang / 
136b7(rgyud): 'dod pa// bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na// phran tshogs mi mo smos ci dgos// bka' ni bsgo ba tsam gyis su// lha min klu yi gnas dag kyang // gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams// myur du khrid nas
136b8(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra rnams bsad pa dang // bka' bzhin du ni skrod par 'gyur// las rnams kun byed lha mo ste// mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub par bya// stag mo lce spyang 'ug pa mo// las de nyid kyis/ 
137a1(rgyud): bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub de ltar shes byas la// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin nyid kyis so sor bzung // rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing // dril bu chos
137a2(rgyud): kyi lha mo'o// phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin// kun rig pas ni thams cad sgrub// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i// slob dpon dag
137a3(rgyud): ni bzung bya ba// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor sogs ldan// 'khor ba las sgrol mnyam nyid kyi// ji bzhin lam gyi 'khor ba las// sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje nyon// slob dpon yon tan ji 'dra zhing // bla ma the
137a4(rgyud): bgyi ji ltar lags// slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ bcom ldan ji ltar blta bar bgyi// thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi// de nyid phyag na rdo rjes nyon// byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan
137a5(rgyud): nyid dang // lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// cha sha sa byang chub yan lag gnas// da bu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de// ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom mo// 'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan// 'od zer
137a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gsang la sogs// de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i skur// rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta// ye shes can ni shes bya ba// mtshan nyid gang yin bstan par bya// shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs// sems
137a7(rgyud): can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas// rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig/ thams cad du ni snyan par smra// sems can kun la bu bzhin lta// sbyin pa la sogs rtog tu dga'// rnal 'byor
137a8(rgyud): bsam gtan mngon par brtson// snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pas na// sems can rnams kyi mgon skyob yin// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa/ 
137b1(rgyud): 'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod// gzhan yang slob mas spyod pa yi// de nyid mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba lta// dam tshig spyod pa dang lha nyid// gtor ma gsang ba la sogs ldan// 
137b2(rgyud): slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya// smad na myur du mnar med 'gro// kun tu dam tshig med pa dang // stan dang mal dang lham sogs dang // gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams// grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya// bzlog
137b3(rgyud): dang gzir ba'i tshig brjod min// 'das na de ni dus kun tu// gdon gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang // nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur// bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed// de yi grib ma 'goms gyur na// 
137b4(rgyud): mchod rten pa shig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod// slob dpon smod pa dar gang byed pa// rmi lam na yang dngos grub med// slob dpon yon tan bzung bya yi// 8skyon rnams nam yang bzung bya min// sngags dang phyag rgya// 
137b5(rgyud): sbyor la sogs// de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro// bslab pa sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas// de nas ma N+Dal la sogs bya// sngar bstan yi grwa gcig pa yis// sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya// de yi rnal/ 
137b6(rgyud): 'byor ldan pa yis// las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis// yi ge brgyad rta po bsgom par bya// gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur ba'i// de yi ches
137b7(rgyud): ni shes par bya// sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la// ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya// slob dpon dbang ni bskur nas su// thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan// dang por slob mas bya ba ni// bla gos
137b8(rgyud): phrag par gzer nas su// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dag/ sa la legs par gtsugs nas ni// thal mo snying kar sbyar bar bya// bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni// rang gi lha ru rab bsgoms la// lag pas/ 
138a1(rgyud): lag pa bzung nas ni// mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// theg pa gsum po thams cad dang // rnal 'byor gsang
138a2(rgyud): sogs mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa rin
138a3(rgyud): chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang // don yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus tshod 'di las
138a4(rgyud): bzung nas su// byang chub snying por mchis par du// ma hA sbal ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// de lta/ dar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir// bdag gis chos khrims 'di
138a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du// mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod// oM sA b+hA ba shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM// oM ba dz+ra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harma badz+ra shud+d+ho \u0f85haM// oM yo ga shud+d+haH
138a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho&haM// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// lus bsdams pas ni dam tshig srung // sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su// 
138a7(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya// de nas ras kyis mig bkab nas// gtor ma'i gnas su gzhugs par bya// lag pas lag pa bzung nas su// slar yang bslab pa bstan pa rgya sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ 
138a8(rgyud): slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi// sbyar ba'i gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal// don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnam shes nas// rnal 'byor ldan pas sgribs g.yogs
138b1(rgyud): rnams su dral ba'i phyir// srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyod pa'i nyon mongs bcom nas su// rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de nyid rgyal por 'gyur// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rjer byin
138b2(rgyud): gyis brlab// hUM ni nyon mongs sreg pa ste// thugs kyi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste// sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// de nas mig phye mthong ma thag/ kun la yan lag lngas btud
138b3(rgyud): nas// bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid// sbyor ba'i gdan du gding bar bya// de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar// lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar bstan bzhin mtshan
138b4(rgyud): byas la// de nas bslab sogs yang byas ste// ji ltar ba dastan pa'i yid kyis brtag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin// ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog/ ho yis dri ni 'jom
138b5(rgyud): par byed// hri yis nus pa bzhom bya ste// la lar sngags ni bzlas par bya// bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni// mgo bos btud de dbul bar bya/ oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU dza u pas+thA nA ya At+ma na nir+yA ta yA mi/ 
138b6(rgyud): oM A tsAr+ya pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+mA naM nair+ya yA mi// oM sarba satwA ya pa ri tA Na aR+tha ya At+mA na nir+yA ta yA mi// nga rgyal dang ni khro ba dang // brlang dang tshig rtsub la 'bar bya// sdig pa'i grags po spang bya ste// srog
138b7(rgyud): gcod rku ba de bzhin no// longs spyod kun la mi chags shing // bdag nyid nges par tshig shes bya// gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra ba'i// phyi rol bstan bcos zhes mi bya// sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hoHa A/ aM aHhUM
138b8(rgyud): dzaHrdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis// yan lag drug gi sa bon bzung // gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad kyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas// rtag tu bla ma yon dbu la bya/ 
139a1(rgyud): rang gi bu dang chung ma dang // gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang // glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu// rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas// gser dang dngul dang zangs dang ni// gos dang 'bru la sogs
139a2(rgyud): pa'i nor// stan dang mal cha lham la sogs// gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul// mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang // bla ma'i yon du phul nas su// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa nyid// dngos po'i
139a3(rgyud): rang bzhin med pa ru ka rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can rnams la gzir mi bya// gzhan la tshig rtsub sgra mi bya// thams cad mi dgar bya ba min// tshul
139a4(rgyud): khrims sdom pa srung ba dang // skye bo rnams la gnod mi bya// srog chags bsad par mi bya ste// de bas shi bar 'gyur kyang bla// rab tu 'bar/ me mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya// 
139a5(rgyud): dngos la sred pa'i blun po rnams// bdag nyid srid pa mi bzod ltung // rags dang phra mo tsam la yang // rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun srung ngo // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// de la brdzun sgra yod

139a8(rgyud): cad mnyam par blta bar bya// rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya// rnal 'byor bsam gtan 'bad par bya// sems can smin la sred pa'i gzhis// tshang byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te// de yi myu gu ljon shing gis// 
139b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gogs par byed// mtho ris longs spyod 'dod pa yis// lus can rnams ni byams pas na/ dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis// bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur// mchod rten
139b2(rgyud): las ni mi bya// zhing // glegs bam bklag par mi bya'o// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing zhing // sngags kyi ye shes bzla mi bya// bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste// de yi sbyor ba rnyed pa dka'// slob dpon dag gi lam gyis ni
139b3(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya// bdag gi lha dang gzhan las ni// bdag gi lha ni lha yi mchog/ bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar bya// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu phye ba las rim
139b4(rgyud): par phye ba dang po'o// / der ni sbyor ba re/ da dka' ba// nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso// de nyid med pa'i sngags pa rnams/ srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung // lus po ngo mtshar skyes
139b5(rgyud): gyur pas// de nyid chos ni stan du gsol// rnal 'byor gyi ni tshad ma ci// sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu// chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi// lus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor pa yi gtor ma'i las
139b6(rgyud): rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma gang // gang gis 'gro ba sgrub pa yi// mtshan nyid tshad mas ji ltar lags// mtshon bya'i lus dang sems kyi tshad// ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon// bdag gi khams ni bstan pas na// 
139b7(rgyud): gtor ma'i las dang bzlas pa dang // dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las// phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi// 'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang // srid pa'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes/ 
139b8(rgyud): yang gsol pa// srid pa so sor 'byung ba rnams// gang gis de yi tshad ma ste// sems ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi// yid ni the tsom skyes par 'gyur// 'khor ba khyod kyis dris pa nyon// sems ni yid kyis bkrus/ 
140a1(rgyud): gnas su// rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa// mkha' 'gro rlung gis bcings pa yis// sems ni gzugs dang gzugs med par// bsdam gtan dmigs pas 'grub par 'gyur// 
140a2(rgyud): 'dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams// rtag tu 'dod yon spyod pa ste// de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams ni// rang 'dod sa la sogs pa 'grub// de las sgrol ba'i dngos po rnams// rdo rje 'dzin gyis mdor bsdus
140a3(rgyud): nyon// rnal 'byor can gyi rnam shes dang // lhan cig 'gro bas 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam shes rnam par shes pa yis// phyogs kun gyis na gsal bar 'grub// sems kyi ngo bo the tsom pas// bcom ldan de yang
140a4(rgyud): bshad du gsol// shes rab rnam shes dngos rang bzhin/ mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags// rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis// the tsom gyur pa nyan par 'tshal// shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i
140a5(rgyud): sems// sems la skyon dang yon tan med// yul rnams dang ni sprad pa yis// srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin// gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos// yul gnas pa yi zhi gyur nas// ji ltar gnas bzhin rab
140a6(rgyud): sbyor ba/ khu ga'i sgo gzer bar bya// de yi dbus su shes bya ba// rtag tu rnam shes na mkha' 'dra// kha dog med cing thams cad 'tshed// mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste// gzugs med pa ni kun gyi gzugs// de
140a7(rgyud): bzhin thung ngu ring po min// sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis// dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan nyid thams cad ster ba'o// dngos po med par sgom pa yis/ 
140a8(rgyud): sgom pa dag ni mtshon par bya// gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni// sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste// thams cad kun nas dmigs pa yis// rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med pa'o// gsang las gsang ba gsung chen po// rnam
140b1(rgyud): shes ye shes gsang ba dag/ bstan bcos klog la sogs sras shing // yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang ring // mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni// bla ma'i lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// sems drang lus su
140b2(rgyud): bcas mnyam zhing // sems kyang gdung bar mi bya'o// lus ni gdung bar mi bya'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// sems pa'i
140b3(rgyud): skyil krung bcas nas ni// lag gnyis gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag/ mig ni sna rtser bltas nas su// dbugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung // thong ka kun tu spangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar bya// 'bad de mnyam nyid
140b4(rgyud): sems kyis ni// de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la// yid kyi dri yis dbyug pa dang // yid kyi me tog mchod par bya// rang bzhin dri yis byugs nas su// shes rab sgron mas snang bar bya// bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i
140b5(rgyud): lus// kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya// kha dog ser po'ib rtser ba'i 'od// ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste// drag mor ldan pa'i sa bon nyid// tshang sa pa'i sgo ru shin tu srung // thams cad gzugs kyi 'jig
140b6(rgyud): byed pa// dril bu chu yi yi ge ste// stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni// sna dang rna ba dag la dgod// bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni// lce dbang rtse mor bzung bar bya// seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis// rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar
140b7(rgyud): bya// stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis// zong ka kun tu bzung bar bya// lce sbyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni// snying ka'i gnas su bzhag par bya// lte ba'i tshigs ni gdan gyi sgor// phyug kyi sa bon gyi srung ngo // lha mo
140b8(rgyud): brgyad du sbyar nas ni// sa bon brgyad po bzung bar bya// de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste// lus kun du ni shin tu 'bar steng gi mtshe ba gnyis las ni// dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab// 'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba
141a1(rgyud): yin// 'jug pas rlabs pa'i mdog lta bu// steng gi mche ba gnyis kyi ni// lce yis bstan pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu// lce chung gsang ba'i nang du dbab// dpral ba'i sde dang sna dang ni// rna ba
141a2(rgyud): gnyis kyi rgyab dag tu// kha zas lta bu'i dngos po ni// kun nas drangs te bzhag par bya// mchod rten sgo ru sa bon ni// hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog/ bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkrus nas su// lhag ma 'og tu
141a3(rgyud): thim par bya// 'og tu rlung gi sa bon gyis// 'khrul 'khor lta bur kun nas drangs// chu ni 'jug de rtsibs legs dang // de bzhin mchan khung gnyis dang ni// dus dang yi dgas me rkang pa// tshig
141a4(rgyud): rnams kun dang snying ka nas// bdud rtsi btung ba gang yin pa// ba lang rmig par thim nas ni// sgo gcig nas ni sgo dgur bzhag/ luH kun la ni gnas pa yi// bdud rtsi gang gis shes pa dag
141a5(rgyud): lus rnams thams cad skye 'gyur bas// de yi rnal 'byo ra brtags pa yin// snying dbus zla ba bsam bya ba// mdangs ldan shin tu ma dzes shing gsal// gangs dang kun da zla ba 'dra// zla ba de
141a6(rgyud): dbus 'o ma'i rgyun// bdud rtsi'i kun rig gug skyed bcas// bdud rtsi'i 'od ni shin tu bsil// ma ning rnams ni spangs pa yis// dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos rnams kyi// gnas rnam
141a7(rgyud): kun tu bskor bar bya// ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni// rtag tu bdud rtsi bzhag nas su// gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa yi// ye shes lus su bsgom par bya// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// dngos po dngos po sgom byas la/ 
141a8(rgyud): 'o ma'i zla ba sa bon dag/ phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa// mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsam med// dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang // bkres skom la sogs med par 'gyur// 
141b1(rgyud): lo ni brgya phrag du mar 'tsho// gzugs dang gzi brjid na tshod ldan// rims dang dug la sogs pa dang // grangs dang tsha sogs gnod pa rnams// ye shes can gyi ye shes lus// yan lag kun la gnas mi 'gyur// bdud
141b2(rgyud): rtsi'i rtsa ba dmigs pa yis// myu gu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// de dang de ni 'phel 'gyur bas// gzugs dang ye shes bdag nyid che// de yi rnal 'byor gnas rnams ni// stong pa'i brag la sogs par brten
141b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi gang gis shes pa yis// bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur// ji ltar bdag nyid kyi ni sems// ye shes can gyi de kho nas// dag bya 'khor ba'i pha rol mtshan// ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ 
141b4(rgyud): gnyis med sngon gyi sems kyis ni// 'dod chags nyon mongs rgya mtsho yi// rang gi lus ni bkru bya ba// ye shes sems dpa' mnyan pa dar gyis// rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yi// stong nyid ye shes de
141b5(rgyud): nyid kyis// phyi nang dri ma bkrus pas na// lus ni shel dang mtshungs par 'gyur// shel dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi dngos// dri med dung dang kun da 'dra/ ye shes dbang po sna tshogs kyi// chos kyi tshon gyis ba
141b6(rgyud): bar bya// rang bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pa// nyes byas legs byas las byung ba// gang gis rang bzhin las rgyal ba// ye shes kyis ni snang bar bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid stong pa yis// 'gro ba'i dngos kun zad/ 
141b7(rgyud): par bya// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pa yis// gzugs sogs thams cad zad pa na// de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba// zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon te// A li ka li rab sbyor bas// de yi dbus su btu bar bya// 
141b8(rgyud): de yi sa bon de nyid kyis// 'od zer phreng ba bsam par bya// sa bon de nyid gang gis ni// myur du ye shes snang bar 'gyur// gzugs mdzes yongs su mdzes pa yi// ye shes sku ru de nas sgom// phyogs bcu'i
142a1(rgyud): 'jig rten khams su ni// sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i// sa bon gang zhig bzla ba ni// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum
142a2(rgyud): pa gzung bar bya// dbyug pa spyi mo rdo rje dang // ska bo che la sogs pa dkri/ sems ni mnyam nyid bsgoms nas su// rnal 'byor can gyis bzlas par bya// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// dngos pos dngos po sgom
142a3(rgyud): byas la// rnal 'byor bsam gtan la 'bad pas// 'og min la sogs snang bar bya// 'od zer 'phro ba spros pa yis// sa 'og rim pa bdun yang bsam// rnal 'byor snang bar 'dod pa yis// rtag tu sems
142a4(rgyud): kyis bsgom par bya// snying kar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nA par// hUM zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog/ sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// thams cad kun nas zad par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gran/ 
142a5(rgyud): par/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshags 'bar ba yi// ye shes sa bon de bus bsam// de las byung ba'i ye shes lus// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid te// zla ba'i dkyil
142a6(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa ste// sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// yan lag rdzogs pa'i skur bsgoms la// snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon bsam
