142a7(rgyud): kun nas mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni// rtag tu de dag bsgom par bya// kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar las// kun tu rdul phran dkar pos dgang pha rol dngos po dmar po ru// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par
142a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpar bsam nas su// gang gi snying gi dbus su ni// de yi rnam shes bzung bar bya// hUM zhes bya ba'i phyogs brgyad du// kha dog dmar po bsams nas ni/ 
142b1(rgyud): U da / rgyum nu mas sa/ nas g+sa da sa su byung skrun dang dusmra ts+tsha / na
142b2(rgyud): ston par 'gyur// gal te pha rol cha yis ni// sems kyi mtshan nyid shes 'dod pas// gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa yis// kun nas thams cad shes byas la// dpa' bo sems can kun don phyir// rnal
142b3(rgyud): 'byer 'di yis sbyar bar bya// de nas me yi las kyi bdag/ sbyor ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// ye shes me yi bdag nyid la// sbyin sreg mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// thams cad sems kyis byin rlabs pas/ 
142b4(rgyud): skye bo'i lus can migs de/ mas pa mege rjid rgyam pa nyid ma nyan par gyis// bdag nyid sems kyis bsregs pas ni// rnal 'byor can gyi sa sbyin sregs bya// mdud pa'i lte ba'i dbus gnas nyid
142b5(rgyud): kyi// dngos su sor ni bdun pa ste// me yi thabs kyi gan sa yin la// klu dbang 'khyil pa'i bskor ba yin// yi ge thams cad 'bar bar bya// de dbus pad+ma rig pa yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
142b6(rgyud): dbus gnas par// ye shes lus ni 'bar bar gzung // mdud pa'i me la dkar po ru// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thim par bya// g.yas kyi cha yi logs su ni// drag mo thim bya me dang 'dra// lte ba dmar po 'bar ba la// lha mo'i
142b7(rgyud): rtse mo ro langs ma// g.yon phyogs cha ni sngon po la// drag tu 'bar bag tu ma mo ste// me lnga yi ni bdag nyid rnams// gzugs mdzes mthe bo'i tshad du blta// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// sa dang ye shes rnam pa lnga
142b8(rgyud): lha mo lnga yi bdag nyid la// sbyin sreg cho ga'i mchog yin no// bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas// dus su bdud rtsi dmigs par bya// ba lang rmig pa'i dbus su ni// 'dzag pa der ni thim par bya// me yi dbus
143a1(rgyud): su sreg pa'i gzhi// dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon// 'di ltar de kho na bsgoms nas// bdag nyid rgyas phyir bsreg par bya// cung zad bza' dang btung la sogs// rung bar byas
143a2(rgyud): nas khaza' bar bya// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bu lon du yang mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // spre'u 'dra bar mi gnas pa// mnyam
143a3(rgyud): nyid gang gis sbyar bar bgyi// lus kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams// lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal// 'byung ba yi ni khyad par dang // gsang ba rdo rje chen pos nyon// sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste// nye ba/ 
143a4(rgyud): / zhi nas kA lIr 'jug/ lus las spu rnams skye ba ni// kun tu chu yi tshad ma ste// chu la lus ni ma yin te// lus la chu yi tshad ma yin// lus kun la ni khyab pas na// blo ldan chu ni tshad ma'o// lus ni
143a5(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo yin// lus kyi yan lag thams cad la// me 'ab shar lte bur dro ba ste// kha zas smin pa'i tshad ma yin// me ni tshed mar rab tu grags// yan lag thams cad khyab pa yi// me ni kun rig dmar/ 
143a6(rgyud): yin pas// lus ni drag mor bstan pa ste// bdag nyid tshad mar rab tu grags// bu gar zla ba 'dra gnas pas// rang gi lus kun khyab pa ste// dbug rgyu ba yi tshad ma yis// mkhas pas sems ni tshad mar grags// 
143a7(rgyud): lus la rten pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni gang gis shes nas su// thams cad lha mo ro langs mar// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// sa ni kun gyi gnas yin te// gzugs sogs dbang po yon tan ldan// gzugs
143a8(rgyud): la sogs pa snang ba na// sa ni tshad ma'i gnas yin no// mdzes ma zhes bya rab tu grags// de ni lha mo gtum mo ste// kun gyi gtso mor rab tu grags// yid ni the tsom gcod pa ste// khyed po sdud po za po'ang yin// dbang po kun gyi
143b1(rgyud): sems rnams kyis// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid shes par bya// dbang rgyal nyer sbyor longs spyod pa// yul la sogs pa nyer spyod kyi// rnal 'byor chad mkhas pa yis// lus la ye shes bsten par bya// sems
143b2(rgyud): las chu ni byung bas na// rnam shes chu ru gyur pa ste// gal te chu ni gzhan yin na// ci phyir zhe na chu mi 'byung // lus la nges par drod yod na// chu ni nang du bying mi 'gyur// lus la tshad ma lnga yod pas// lnga po gci
143b3(rgyud): gi bdag nyid 'gyur// mtshan nyid gcig tu shes byas nas// rnal 'byor pa yis 'gro ba brtag/ de yi mtshan nyid shes bya 'i phyir// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya// de nyid rnal 'byor grogs kyi ni// 
143b4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur// yul dang dbang po'i ye/  shes ni// gzir dang bcas pas sdom par 'gyur// sgong skyes khyim gyi gnas su ni// dbus su gnas par bcing bar bya// 'byung dang 'bru
143b5(rgyud): min sems kyi ni// g.yo ba'i dngos po bskor bar bya ba kha ci nga ba'i gnas dang stan dag ni// rnam shes pad+ma'i stan la'o// rnal 'byor pa yis de yi phyir// rnam shes rang bzhin mtshon par bya// gzugs
143b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dngos po yi// rnal 'byor grub par bya ba'i phyir// rang bzhin zhes bya'i dngos por 'gyur// lte bar chu shing me tog ni// snying kar yang ni 'greng ste gnas// rtag tu stong pa'i sgo yin te// mkhas pas
143b7(rgyud): rtag tu bzlog par bya// ge sar dang ni ldan pa yi// rtag tu mdab ma brgyad du 'gyur// de dbus rtag tu gsungs pa ni// ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba ste// sbyor ba yi ni shar phyogs char// de dang 'thun pa'i sor drug
143b8(rgyud): pa'o// mdud pa yi ni nub phyogs char// 'og tu sor ni lnga pa'o// zhing de la ni sa bon dang // 'od zer tshogs kyi myur gur 'gyur// sa bon de yi 'od zer gyis// chu shing lta bur bskor bar bya// rgyas pa
144a1(rgyud): lnga yis bon la// lho yo 'og nas dgar bar bya// pad+mo mdzes pa bkas pa yis// mdab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyam/ bad+mod yi stan la ni// skong skyes ye shes gnas dag la// dbus su shel
144a2(rgyud): ltar dag pa yis// ye shes rnam shes dbu ma nyid// mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sa bon rnams// phyogs kyi mdab mar gnas pa ste// dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon// mtsham su sen mo la sogs pa'i ma ning yi ge
144a3(rgyud): sngar bstan bzhin// snying dkar dngos po dngos po yis// snying dkar yi ge blta bar bya// ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni// sgo dgu pa yis bdud rtsi yis// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bkru// yi ge dkar po brgyad
144a4(rgyud): po rnams// bdud rtsi'i yi ge dkar po yi// 'od 'bar ba spu'i khung nas sngo// rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad du// 'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang // nyal ba la sogs dus kun du// ye shes
144a5(rgyud): rnam shes sa bon bzla// shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni// rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom bzlas na// ye shes las byung rnal 'byor pa// 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing
144a6(rgyud): 'tshe med par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid// ji bzhin rdo rjes mnyan par gyis// lam bzang po yi rnal 'byor pa// 'gro ba mdzes pa blta bar bya// sgo dgu po ni ji
144a7(rgyud): lta bu ye shes sgo yi bye brag gis// yon tan skyon rnams ji lta bu// ye shes dbang las mnyan par 'tshal// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshad ma rnams// yang dag par sbyor mnyan par gyis// lam bzang po yis mdzes
144a8(rgyud): pa'i gnas// lamangon srid pa'i skyon gyis gos// thig le lte ba spyi gtsug dang // mig dang sna dang rna srid so// chu dang chu min sgo yin te// sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid yin// lte ba 'dod can mtho ris te// thig les
144b1(rgyud): gzugs khams kyis lus can// steng nas steng du gnas de ru// mi gdung la sogs de ru 'gro// snga nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste// rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha// gal te mig las ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni
144b2(rgyud): bdag par 'gro// srid pa'i sgo yis yi dgas te// de bzhin gcibs dud 'gro'o// chu min rnam shes myur ba ru// domyal ba brgyad du shes par bya'o// sgo rnams kyi ni bye brag gis// 'khor ba'i bye brag 'byung ba yin// 
144b3(rgyud): de bas sgo yi bye brag las// sgrub pos lam ni bzang po ste// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang // 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na// rims la sogs pas ma phog par// gong du 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mchog/ sngon du bum pa
144b4(rgyud): brtsams pa yi// sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ 8/ rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten gyis// sgon dgag pa bsgom byas// de la 'og gi sgo ru ni// chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam// chu dang chu mini sgo la
144b5(rgyud): ni me yis bon 'drar ba ste// de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// dbugs ni bum pa can du skem// lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste// sems ni rlu nga gi dkyil 'khor la// rtsa ba rlung gi sa bon no// rlung gi mtha'
144b6(rgyud): na rtsa ba can// thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi// rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya// rdo rje'i sa bon drag mo yis// lcags kyu la sogs sbyar bar bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs rnams kyis// gnas nas drag tu drang bar bya// 
144b7(rgyud): gnas na gnas nas steng du dbye/ tshigs dgu las ni steng du bya// steng du smin pa'i sa bon dang // yi ge byed dang gnyis kyis sbyang // drag mo'i nga ror brjod bya ste// brgyad kyi mtha' yi sa bon la// sngo tshan dang pi'i dang
144b8(rgyud): po ni/ yi ge byed du sbyar bar bya// 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sgra yi dbye bas bskul bar bya// rlung gi sa bon ldan pa yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas rnams
145a1(rgyud): nas/ gong nas de bzhin steng gnas su// rnal 'byor pa yis smin byas la// steng gi rtsa tshig bzla bar bya// tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis// mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste// nyin re bram ze
145a2(rgyud): gsod pa dang / mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa dag/ lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing // sred pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro// ji ltar 'dam nas skyes pa
145a3(rgyud): ye pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba// de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni// ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro// dus la bab na 'pho bya ste// dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ de bas lus la mtshan ma rnams// mthong nas
145a4(rgyud): mkhas pa sbyor ba brtsam// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis nga// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ mnyam nyid se/ dmas ni bsgom par bya// snying ka'i dkyil 'khor dbus
145a5(rgyud): gnas par// sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon bsam// de 'odanyi mar 'bar ba yis// gzugs rnams zad par bsams nas ni// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// sngar bstan stong nyid bsam par
145a6(rgyud): bya gzugs sogs thams cad bcom nas ni// hUM zhes bya ba gnas par bsam// sa bon gyis ni skyed bya ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/ ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag
145a7(rgyud): nyid ni/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ spyan gsum co dran gyis brgyan zhing // bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa yi/ kun da zla ba ltar dkar zhing // shin tu mdzes pa'i na
145a8(rgyud): bza' bsdams// sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas ni// sangs rgyas sprin rnams spo ba mdzad// g.yas kyi dang po mda' yin te// gnyis pa yis na lcags kyu rnams// gsum pa na ni rdo rje nyid// 
145b1(rgyud): g.yon pa khro ba'i bsdigs mdzub ste// gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i zhags pa thogs// go cha'i gzhu ni steng na bsdams// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// yan lag brgyad du
145b2(rgyud): rab 'bad nas// sa bon brgyad kyi yi ge dgod// a li ka li rab sbyor bas// sa bon ji bzhin btu bar bya// 'od zer ldan pa'i sa bon rnams// kun tu kha dog dkar por bya// chu shing me tog pad+mo la// snying kar
145b3(rgyud): sgong skyes bzhag par bya// de yi dbus su rnam shes dang // ye shes lhan cig ldan par ni// mig g.yo 'chi ba med pa ru// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni bzung bar bya// 
145b4(rgyud): gnas gnyis dag ni bsams pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su me yin te// me yi dbus su nyi ma la/ a li ka li nga ldan pa yi// de yi sa bon dmar por dgod// rnal 'byor pa
145b5(rgyud): yis khyad par du// 'byung dang 'jug par bzlas par bya// 'byung nga ba ye shes sa bon gyis// dbus su snun dang ldan par bya/ 'jug pas snying gi rnam shes la/ me tog lta bur bsnun par bya// 'byung ba 'jug
145b6(rgyud): min bzlas bya zhing // 'jug pa 'jug pa min la bzla// rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung 'jug dang // bdag nyid dang ni phyi rol bya// 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang // 'jug pa yis ni mtshon byas la// rnal 'byor pa/ 
145b7(rgyud): yis 'byung 'jug dag/ de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom// mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de nas phyi rol lus la ni// sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul// 
145b8(rgyud): pha rol sems dang rjes 'thun par// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// bsgoms dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// shin tu mnyam par gzhog ste bsam// gang gi lam nas bsams nas ni// 'grub
146a1(rgyud): 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par bye ba gsum pa'o// / gsang ba'i gdon gyis gsang ba nyid// sems dang ye shes 'dres pa yi/ rdzogs pa'i
146a2(rgyud): byang chub rim ci 'dra// ye shes dbang las mnyan par 'tshal// gsang ba'i gsang ba chos kyi don// byang chub rim pa rdo rje nyon// 'dod chags la sogs rims spangs nas// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed par bya// 
146a3(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// khams dang sems ni bde ba yis// snying rjes phan pa bsam par bya// yang dag bstan bcos de nyid thos// slob dpon lung gi rjes 'gro zhing // gsang
146a4(rgyud): chen de nyid don sgom pa/ gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid can/ 8/ thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas// thams cad stong pa nyid du bya// dri ma bkrus pa'i lus la ni// byang chub rim pas gtso bar
146a5(rgyud): bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes ma kha' 'gro bsam byas te// zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yi// kun da zla ba ltar dkar mdog/ zhabs gnyis sems pa'i skyil krung bcas/ 
146a6(rgyud): pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// nyid kyi thugs kar 'chir bar mdzad// gzugs mdzes
146a7(rgyud): shin tu rdzogs pa ste// ye shes sems dpa' bdug ces brjod// chu shing me tog lte ba nas// snying gi bar du bgreng ste gnas// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis bzlog nas// sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par bya// 
146a8(rgyud): gesar dang ni lte bar bcas// mdab brgyad shin tu mdzes pa ste// dbus kyi sgong skyes la gnas par// yi ge'i dgod pa dgod par bya// kha dog dkar po dag cing gsal// dbus su bsgom bya zhu ba'i gtso/ 
146b1(rgyud): de yi dbus su rnam shes dang // ye shes dag ni sbyar bar bya/ shar du byams par ldan pa yi// mi bskyod pa yis bon bsam// lho yi sgo ru snying rje ste// rin chen sa bon de nyid do// nub kyi sgo yi mdab ma la/ 
146b2(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyi sa bon dgod// byang gi cha yi mdab ma la// don yod gtso bo bsam par bya// dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon// thig le dbyug par ldan rim bzhin// 'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa ste// 
146b3(rgyud): yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya// phyogs mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru// sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod// de yi dbus su de yi sems// yi ge ru ni mtshon par bya// stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las/ ji ltar yi ge
146b4(rgyud): sbyar bar bgyi// sems ni ya mtshan skyes par gyur/ bcom da ldan bdag la gshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// da stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las// chu shing snyi ma'i dadud
146b5(rgyud): rtsi bzhin snying po med pa'i snying por gyur// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dbus na gnas pa ye shes te// ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med ci dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can// dri ma med pa'i
146b6(rgyud): ye shes su// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// yi ge gzugs ni yi ge med// gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni// rnal 'byor can gyis de nyid bzung // gang gi mtshan nyid shes byas nas// mnyam nyid ye
146b7(rgyud): shes pa dang // de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam// myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// bla ma nyid kyi lam gyis ni// ye shes rnam shes rang bzhin nyid// bstan bcos la ni mtshan nyid bstan// de kho na nyid dpa' bos
146b8(rgyud): bshad/ 'od zer dkar pos rgyas pa ru// 'di ni kun tu rab bsgoms pa// rgyas pa'i lnga yi mchod rten te// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsam nas ni// 'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs// bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag pas
147a1(rgyud): bkru thigs pa'i dbus sus bon mi// mtho bong tsam gyi zlum por ga/ de yi dbus kyis ngon na// a li ka le dag las 'byu// khadog dkar po shin tu mdzes// zla ba'i 'od rjer kun tu 'gro// de yi dadu/ 
147a2(rgyud): kyi sa bon ni// thig le bsam par rab tu grags// skra yi rtse mo brgya yi cha// rdul phran gzugs su kun tu bsam// rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi// mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can// sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes
147a3(rgyud): pas thig le gnas kyi go 'phang blta// snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo nga ni// thigs pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu// bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis// rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya// phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang // bstan bcos
147a4(rgyud): las kyang ring ba yin// bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste// / de yi sbyor ba rnyed pa dka'// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la gus pa'i// thabs dang ldan da na sgrub pa po// bla ma'i lung gi lam gyis ni// mkhas pa
147a5(rgyud): yis ni blta bar bya// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// mnyam par gzhag pas dngos po sgom// chos kyi sngon 'gro yod yin te// yid kyis 'ju gcing yid kyis 'dag/ de bas thams cad yid rang
147a6(rgyud): bzhin blo ldan yid las 'byung zhes bya// gal te bzlas 'dod rnal 'byor pas// snying gi sdom pa bsam par bya// sa bon gyi ni rgyur gyur pa/ de kho nar ni gzugs min no// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni// 
147a7(rgyud): de kho na nyid mthong ba min// gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la// sa bon dmigs shing bzlas par bya// kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang // 'og dang 'og min yang dag gnas// rtsa bar rtag tu gzer bar
147a8(rgyud): bya/ ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni// thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan// srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis// phyi rol dag ni spangs nas su// yid kyis bzlas dang ldan par bya// rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis// 
147b1(rgyud): mi g.yog 'bang rgyun du gnas// rtag tu dra zhing gos med pas// ye shes la ni rnam shes thim// rnam shes ye shes nyid gyur nas// byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur// mang me lta bur thams cad du// snang gyur
147b2(rgyud): mtshan ma dang po ste// srin bu me khyer lta bu'i rdul// mthong ba'i mtshan ma gnyis pa yin// gsum pa la ni rnal 'byor pas// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan ma ste// rdul phran dkar po'i tshul gyis ni// de bzhin
147b3(rgyud): phyogs bcur mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa lha yi longs spyod rnams// sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste// mtho ris gzugs kyi lha rnams ni// sems kyis mthong ba lnga pa yin// gzugs med longs spyod drug pa ste/ 
147b4(rgyud): bdun pa chos kyi sa la'o// sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste// rnal 'byor pa ni rang dgar spyod// mchod rten gzugs kyi khyad par la sa// dbyibs kyi gzugs ni ji lta bu// lha yaM rnams
147b5(rgyud): dag bsgoms pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// lus can rnams la yang dag blta// yang dag de nyid shes nas su// de nyid sbyor ba tsam pa yi// rab sbyor rdo rje mnyan par gyis/ 
147b6(rgyud): snying kar zla ba bsams nas su// dbus su hUM ni bsgom par bya// me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gsal/ spyi gtsug dkar por yang dag ldan/ me lce 'bar bas bcom nas ni/ thams cad kun nas zad par
147b7(rgyud): bya sngon gyi mtshan nyid de kho nas/ de nyid stong pa nyid du bya'i// de nas zla bar sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas su// mched rten po brang gnas nyid ni// de la sems kyis bskyed par bya// 
147b8(rgyud): gya gyus zhes brjod pa ste// phyogs brgyad dag ni khams yin na// dril bu nam mkha'i dbus gnas par/ lhun po'i lha yi gnas nyid do// 'dod na spyod pa'i lus can rnams/ bre ru nges par brtag
148a1(rgyud): par bya/ 'og dang steng dang dbus nyid kyi/ dbus su gnas pa bdag med chos/ gzugs khams zhes bya'i mtho ras rnams/ 'khor lo'i bring bas rnam par brgyan/ 
148a2(rgyud): gzugs can bcu dang brgyad par ni/ go rims ji bzhin rnam par gnas/ gzugs med srid pa'i sems can mi/ chos kyi srog shing nyid du thim/ lha rnams kun gyi pho brang ni/ gzugs su mchod rten
148a3(rgyud): bskrad par bya/ steng ge slong skyes gnas su ni/ bdag gi sems ni mnyam bya ste/ sems dang ye shes 'dres pas na// gnyis med mnyam pa'i khyad par gyis/ gzugs dang sdong pa'i mtha' dang ni/ 
148a4(rgyud): debazhin dngos dang dngos med nyid/ gzung dang 'dzin pa la sogs gzhan/ legs byas dang ni bzlog pa rnams/ mtshan bzhi ma tshan nyid ston pa'o// de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ 
148a5(rgyud): sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sogs pa'i/ rdzas 'di yis ni mchod nas su/ mig yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya/ mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ 'grub 'gyur
148a6(rgyud): 'dir ni the tsom med// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ de nyid bstan bcos lung la sogs// rnal 'byor dmigs pa goms byas pas/ slob ma chen po'i lus can rnams/ gdan bzhi pa yi de kho na// 
148a7(rgyud): bla ma'i man ngag ldan pa yis/ rim gyis rang dgar longs spyod de/ bdag med blta zhing myang bar bya/ bdud rtsi myong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ ye shes sku ni myur du thob/ ye shes sku yi rnal 'byor pas/ 
148a8(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan don mchog tu 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag po yi/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam 'byor ro// gsong chen sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi/ de nyid de nyid mchog de nyid/ gang gis byang chub la ma gyur
148b1(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas/ bdag nyid rang dgar byed pa yi/ nargod lta bu'i sems de nyid/ mkhas pa yis na
148b2(rgyud): bsdam par bya/ ji ltar bung ba me tog bsrung ba yi/ chang gis myos shing sems ni bstan 'gyur te/ longs spyod zhugs shing sdug bsngal rmongs dang bral// de bzhin skem pa'i lam gyis yid bcing bya/ yid bsdam
148b3(rgyud): papa'i 'grub 'gyur bas/ dang po yid ni bsdam par bya/ yid kyis sgrub pa'i bye brag gis/ byang chub ye shes mtshon par bya/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul bya ste/ 
148b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po snying kar bcing // sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon rnams/ yi ge'i gnas su dgodang par bya/ rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ ske ni dgag par/ 
148b5(rgyud): bsam bya ste/ bdud rtsi'i sngags kyi yi ge yis// rgyas pa'i sgo na bsrung bar bya// me yi yi ge 'bar ba yis// chu dang chu min de bzhin sru nga / chu shing me tog pad+ma ni/ mdzes shing 'khyil ba rgyas pa/ 
148b6(rgyud): dbye/ de yi dbus kyi sgo ngar ni/ dung dang zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyogs phyogs gnas su sa bon de/ phyogs bzhir khams ni bzhi pa yi/ phyogs mtshams sa bon brtsegs pa bzhi/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag
148b7(rgyud): pas bsgoms// 'od zer kun nas dkar zhing dag/ lha mo'i yi ge bsgom par bya// ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'o// de nyid dbus su dmigs nas ni/ sems ni rang dgrar bsgoms pa yis/ phyi nas gzugs
148b8(rgyud): ni gzhom par bya// phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu/ phyogs phyogs gnas su bzhag nas su// rang bzhin thams cad bcom pa yi// lhag ma rnam shes ye shes nyid// shar gyi phyogs su
149a1(rgyud): chu yin te/ kha dog dkar po kun da 'od// me ni ser po 'od 'bar bar/ rtag tu byang du bsam par bya/ rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni// nub kyi phyogs su brtag par bya/ sa yi sa bon ldang
149a2(rgyud): kun ni/ lho yi phyogs su bsam par bya// phyogs mtshams 'dres pa'i kha dog gis/ grwa bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/ lhag ma dbus kyi ye shes te/ sgong skyes bcas pa gzhom par bya/ 
149a3(rgyud): de yi mtshan nyid mtshon par bya// mtshon bya mtshan nyid dngos med pa'o// sems kyi dngos po stong pa bas// rang bzhin gnas rnams zad par bya/ rnam rtog stong pa'i dbus dag tu/ rdul phran tsa
149a4(rgyud): na lta bu'i gzugs/ a l-i ka li sa bon no// rdul phran zhes bya dbus su ste/ rnam pa med cing brjod du med/ thams cad rdul zhesad bya ba la/ stong nyid du'ang mi dmigs te/ gzugs la
149a5(rgyud): sogs par mi lta'o// rdul ni sa bon ma yin la/ rang bzhin med cing mtshan nyid med// rlung dang nam mkha' ma yin te/ mnyam nyid da bu mar mtshon par bya// gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/ 
149a6(rgyud): de bzhin rnal 'byor can gyis gzung // bla ma'i lung gis rtogs bya ste/ lung gi dam pa dag dang ni/ bstan bcos mtshan nyid dpyad nas su// lung dang bcas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ mi g.yo'ang 'tsho
149a7(rgyud): ba med pa ru/ dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ mnyam gzhag dngos pos dpyad nas ni/ byang chub rim pa 'grub par 'gyur/ ye shes thim pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ sems can don byed
149a8(rgyud): mchog tu bcom/ kun rtog lus dang sems kyi no// gang tshe yul 'khor srung 'dod na/ ye shes dbang po'i longs spyod can/ rang 'dod lus kyi dngos grub kyis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras 'dod cing / 
149b1(rgyud): khams gsum ye shes kyis blta dang / rang 'dod yid kyis gnas dang na/ na mkha' rgyu ba'i lus can dang / sems can kun gyis gzhan don gnyer/ mchog ni myur du ster bar 'gyur/ lus dang dbang po
149b2(rgyud): don gnyer bas/ bdag med pa yis rang dgar bya/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ sbyor bas 'khor bsgrol bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams kyi yang / sbyor ba gzhan ni don gnyer
149b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ sbub po 'du 'dzi med pa dang / sna spogs skye bos dben po yi/ tshal dang ri sul brag phug tu gnas nas de ru bsgom par bya/ na gamul pa la sha rta ru cha ni gsum po dag ma gad ni srang gcig
149b4(rgyud): ste cha bstims phye mar byas nas ni/ ba yi 'o mar yang dag bcas/ phye ma bzhi char bsres nas su 'di ni nyin re rnal 'byor pa/ mkhas nga pa yis ni bza' bar bya/ rnal 'byor can gyi lo brgya ru// 
149b5(rgyud): brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ nges par shin tu smi na pa yis/ grangs dang bkres skom la sogs grol/ sman 'di dag ni ldan pa ru/ brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ 'dul ba srung ba'i
149b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa/ lus ni rtag tu bsrungs par 'gyur// ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / gnyis spong gtam tu smra zhing ston pa ste/ de ltar lam bshad mchi ba yod ma yin/ rnal 'byor lam
149b7(rgyud): ngan de ltar bstan pa min/ rig byed chu dang de bzhin dur ba rnams/ bram zer spyi bzhag sangs rgyas pas gzung min/ dbang bskur sngags sogs nyams kyis 'jigs pas ni/ gnas ngan lnga tshogs
149b8(rgyud): rigs la phyag mi bya/ de nas rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba phrag brgyad cu du ma'i 'khor rnams sems tshim
150a1(rgyud): nas thams cad kyi ye shes thob par gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems can rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te glu blangs pa/ rang dgar sems can sgrol ba yi/ 
150a2(rgyud): rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi/ tA na hUM twe na hUM te na te te hUM/ ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing / dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ te na hUM te na hUM te na ten ta te hUM/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ gnyis su
150a3(rgyud): sbyor ba 'dzin pa po/ te na hU~M te na hUM te na ti te hUM/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi/ 'gro ba mdzes pa rgyu med dngos/ te na hU~M te na hUM te na te te hUM/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ 'od zer
150a4(rgyud): rnon po stong phrag nyi ma stong 'drir ldan/ rnam mang sku dang cha byed rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog/  rol pas gar mdzad ces bya ba'i// bkra shis sna yis/ 
150a5(rgyud): bkang nas su// thams cad kun nas glur blangs so// ji bzhin 'am ni rdo rjes nyon/ bstan bcos shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ gang zhig su yang rung ba las/ yi ge 'am tshig tsam nyan
150a6(rgyud): byed na mtha ris longs spyod thob 'gyur te/ yang na 'khor lo sgyur bar ro// 'dri'am 'drir 'jug klog pa dang / shin tu dad ldan sngags zlos pa'i/ rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ srid pa'i gzugs
150a7(rgyud): kun bsam bzhin 'grub/ rnal 'byor bsam gtan byed pa rnams/ myur du byang chub rim pa thob/ ces bdag nyid kyis bka' stsal pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnal 'byor pa dang / 
150a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa de dag dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad
150b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis dga' zhing mgu nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das rdorje/ 
150b2(rgyud): 'dzin pas 'bum phrag bco brgyad pa las snying po lta bur gsungs pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya ng+ga ra dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus/ 
150b3(rgyud): te gtan la bab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ man+ta a~Ms tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ 
150b4(rgyud): sngags kyi chu'i rgyud kyi rgyal po nas byab/ thugs rje chen mad po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ gdun bzhi pa yi rgyud kyino/ gsum pa yin dang po'o// 
150b5(rgyud): de yi sbyor ba nad nas ni/ sngags kyi de nyid khyad par nyid// sring po yi ni snying po'i chos/ rab snor gisang zhing gsang ba yi/ de nyid de nyid de las mchog/ snying po'i di nyid bsdus pa'o// bla ba'i ma
150b6(rgyud): ning gnyis bzung la/ rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya/ spyi bor 'od dang zla ba'o// sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin/ zla ba dkar dang kun da'i mngag/ gtso bo'i sngon du sbyor bar bya/ sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs bya
150b7(rgyud): zhing dbyangs yig mngon par mthong ba ni/ las rnams gsum gyi sngon du ni/ bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o// dkar dang ser dang dmar po'o// bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod/ myu gu'i gnas ni gtso bo nyid srid pa mchog
150b8(rgyud): na sgrol ba'o// dbyangs yig dbyangs kyi sgom pa ni/ rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/ don grub 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yi/ ban du ka yi me tog 'dra/ rdo rje dbyug pa la rtag tu/ de nyid du na rna ba thim/ dkar po// 
151a1(rgyud): / zlabs mnan pa yi/ gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya/ pad+ma rdo rje zla ba dang / bdud rtsi yis ni bkru bar ldan/ dang po'i sa bon gtso ba yi/ dbyangs yig kun la khyab pa po/ dkar zhing
151a2(rgyud): dag la mnyam pa'i 'od/ gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni/ bzhi par nam yang ma yin no// ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i// khyad par dbyangs yeg sa bon nyid// mtha' yi sngon du sa bon nyid// 
151a3(rgyud): de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ne/ mnyam par gnas su sbyar bar bya/ bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ mgo smos go ba'i lus nyid de/ yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid ni/ rang ba'in/ 
151a4(rgyud): gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos/ lus dang lus sogs yi ge Dad ni/ lcags kyus yos ni mnan par bya/ dmar dang gnag sogs sa bon ni/  rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ lnga pa drug pa'i sa bon ni/ 
151a5(rgyud): thams cad sma yi yi ge'o/ dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad/ dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang / zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa ni/ kun kyang sgra yi dbye ba'o// thams cad las la sgra yis ni/ kha dog bzhi
151a6(rgyud): ru rab tu grags/ bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa don gyis/ skyes bu rang 'dod pa yi las/ nges par lus ni sdom pa dang / gnyis pa'i sa bon gyis mnan pa'o// yang bas dmar dang gnag la sbyar/ rnal 'byor
151a7(rgyud): pa yi khyad par du/ mtshams ni bcad cing mnan pa'i las/ gnyis pa lcags kyu'i yi ge ni/ rang bzhin yige ming gi ni/ de nyid las rnams 'gugs pa dang / sa bon 'di ni dbye ba'o// 'dog dmar
151a8(rgyud): po mchog gi 'od/ thams cad 'dres pa'i sa bon ni/ dbyangs yig bskyed pa'i sa bon ni/ las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// mning gis bskyod sa bon ni/ brtan zhing rtag pa'i sa bon no// bud med dang / 
151b1(rgyud): / niskyes pa 'am/ 'di nyid kun nas rab tu sbyar/ sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni/ tha ma bzhini rnams spangs pa/ dkar dang kun dazla ba'i mdog/ nyi ma'i yi ge rnam par shes/ tha ma bzhi dang lnga pa dang / sde chan
151b2(rgyud): drug pa yang dag ldan/ kun nas mtshan mo'i stong par ni/ khyad par du ni shes par bya/ bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/ dkar zhing shel ltar mnyam pa'i 'od/ de nyid kun gyi de nyid ni/ kun nas bdud rtsi'i grub pa'o// 
151b3(rgyud): lha min grub pas 'gugs pa dang / lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin dang / thams cad las rnams grub pa ni/ sa bon 'di ni khyad pa nyid/ sbom po ma ning gnyis kyi sa la/ lcags sgeg bzhin du kha sprad pa/ rtsa bar
151b4(rgyud): yang ba nyes 'gyur ro// spyi bor bdud rtsi rnam par dgod// steng du thig le 'bar ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin sku/ sa bon lnga yi/ ngo bo nyid/ rnam bzhir phye zhing phye ba yis// lce rtsa lde rtser gsung
151b5(rgyud): pa ni/ kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od // zhi dang chu yi bye brag la/ hUM gi rnam pa rkan la sbyar/ rtsa bar sgra dang 'od bral ba/ bar ma yi ni dbyangs su gsungs/ gal te 'dod na lha yi lus/ khyad par du ni
151b6(rgyud): zhi ba'i las/ snying ka'i rtsa bar gsungs pa ni/ kha dog ser po'i 'od mnyam pa/ sbom po'i sgra dang thig le dang / rgyas pa dang ni me yi las/ lte bar sgra dang 'joms pa ni/ kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ sbom po'i
151b7(rgyud): sgra dang ldan pa'i 'od/ dbang gi las la rab tu sbyar// sna rtser sbrid pa gsum pa ni/ kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od// yang ba'i sgra yi 'od du ni/ ldan par blo nang ldan par bskul/ bskrad dang bsad dang bcing ba dang / 
151b8(rgyud): mnan dang gdug sogs bskrad pa dang / gtor ma la sogs nag po'i las/ hUM gi rnam pa sbed par sbyar/ de nyid de nyid bzhi par ni/ hUM gi rnam pa nye bar mtshon/ sa bon thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/ hUM gi rnam pa dbang
152a1(rgyud): / phyag mchog thams cad 'byin pa'i ngo bo bas/ hUM gi yi ge mchog gi lha/ stong nyid yi ge'i hUM gyur pas/ hUM gi rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ stong pa'i gzugs dang rab ldan pa/ dngos dang dngos
152a2(rgyud): med 'byin mdzad pa/ btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan/ ri rab rgya mtsho ri ni grags// brtan pa dang ni g.yo bar ldan// lha dang lha min grub pa dang // mi dang gnod sbyin rnal 'byor
152a3(rgyud): pa/ lha rnams kun nas g.yo ba ni/ gsungs pa'i sa bon gyis 'gugs byed/ sde tshan dang po'i sa bon ni// rtsa bar re ba mnan pa dang // lcags kyus mgor ni rnam par dgod/ steng du zla ba'i 'od dang btsos// 
152a4(rgyud): kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ ljags kyu yis ni snying da po sgrub/ lcags kyu yi ge sa bon bzhin/ lcags kyu yis ni kun 'gugs pa'o// nga stong par rlung gi sa bon ni/ sde tshan brgyad kyi dang po la// 
152a5(rgyud): rtsa bar sgra yis dkri bar bya/ spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / rlung gi kha dog drag po yis/ lus can kun ni bskul bar bya/ bskul ba'i las kyi sa bon gyis/ sa bon de nyid kun tu sbyar// lnga pa sde tshan gnyis
152a6(rgyud): pa yi/ gsum pa'i yi ge gzung byas la/ yi ge gsum pas mnan par bya/ re pha rtsa bar sbyar ba dang / steng du bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'o// kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od / dgyes pa la sogs sa bon gyis/ 
152a7(rgyud): lha sogs kun nas mnyes par byed/ sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ gsang ba'i sgra ni rtsa bar ro// steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le dang / dkar zhing yid 'ong shin tu 'bar/ mchod pa'i sngags kyi dus dang ni/ gter ma
152a8(rgyud): sbyin sreg phyag rgya sogs/ rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad la/ rgyas pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ dang po'i sde tshan bzhi pa la/ rtsa bar re pa sma dang ni/ spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o// kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i
152b1(rgyud): 'od zhi ba'i las ni rnam spangs pa/ las rnams kun gyi sngon du'o// rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pa/ rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / gnyis pa'i sa bon blang byas pas/ 
152b2(rgyud): mtha' ru stong pa gnyis kyis so// dedag dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ lha dang lha min gsang sogs/ rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bzhag bzhag pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ blo ldan yi ge 'di yis bzhag
152b3(rgyud): sdong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la/ de yi bzhi pa gzung bar bya/ rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang / steng du bdud rtsi thig le'o// 'jigs bsrung ba'i las nyid la/ kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od// rnal 'byor
152b4(rgyud): de nyid 'dod pa yi/ so bon 'di nyid kyis srung ngo / srog dpa'i yi ge sngags nyid ni/ dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ dkar dang ser dang dmar sogros kyi/ las gsum gyi ni mtha' ru'o// 
152b5(rgyud): bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung la/ brgyad pa gnyis pa yi ni gdan/ bdud rtsi yi ni gdan du chu/ kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ ma ning sde tshan gyis bskyed pa'i/ me ltar dmar ba mnyam pa'i 'od// 
152b6(rgyud): legs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o// zhi ba la ni sreg pa'i mthar/ bdud rtsi sa bon kha dog ser/ chu yi sa bon dkar ba'i gdan/ logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o// brgyad kyi mtha' ma kun nas 'bar/ 
152b7(rgyud): / rdo rje 'od bzhin 'bar ba'i me// sa bon 'od bzhin 'bar bcas pa/ dbyangs yig dbyug pa'i sreg pa'o// rgyas pa'i sreg pa'i mtha' mar ro// de yi bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i ni/ brgyad mtha'i logs su dbyug pa'o// kun nas
152b8(rgyud): dmar dang dmar ba yi/ mthar ni dbyug pa lcags kyu'o// dbu mar drang ba'i sems kyis ni/ dbyug pa'i dbugs kyi zla bar bya/ chags pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ sreg pa'i yi ge rnam pa gsum/ rnam pa bzhi
153a1(rgyud): // las don gnyer bas/ 'joms pa'i yi ge gnyis su shes/ bskad dang bsad dang dbye ba dang / mnan dang nye bar bzlog pa la/ stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni/ dbyug pa glo ru rnam par sbyar/ 
153a2(rgyud): nyin mo'i sde tshan gsum pa las/ dang po gnyis pa'i glo ru'o// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ 'od zer me bzhin kun nas ldan/ rdo rje sa bon mnyam 'bar las/ lus kyis dbus su dbug par bya/ gsang
153a3(rgyud): dang gdug pa bslad la sogs/ drag po'i las ni thams cad la/ dngos grub 'dod pa rnal 'byor pas/ 'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' mar ro// de yi sa bon ldan pa ni/ sngon gyi dbyug tshogs rnam par spangs// 
153a4(rgyud): dang po dbu yi steng rnams su/ kha dog sngon po rabarno bas/ bsad dang dbye dang gdug pa ni/ khro bo'i lha yis bskrad par bya/ 'joms pa'i yi ge'i mtha' mar ni/ sa bon 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ dkar
153a5(rgyud): po'i sde dang sde tshan gyis/ dang po'i dang po blang byas la/ kun nas rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/ sa bon yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ 'pho bar sbyor ba'i sngon dus su/ rnams shes gong du bskul ba'o// lte bar rtsa ba'i phyogs nas
153a6(rgyud): nineniyi ge phyed dang gnyis kyi drang / brgyad pa'i mtha' ni sngon du'o// ma la ta yi sbyor dus su/ 'pho bar sbyor bas sngon du'o// 'pho ba'i dus kyi sngon du ni/ rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyang / u la pa li ta sa bon/ sbyang bya'i
153a7(rgyud): yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ dngos dang dngos med sa bon la/ sgra dang thig le rnam par sbyar/ rlung gi rtsa ba'i gnas su ni/ sgra dang sgra yis bstan pa'o// chu shing me tog lte bar gnas// sa bon 'di yis bsgyur bar bya// 
153a8(rgyud): sngon du sbyor ba'i bsam gtan dang / mnyam par gzhan pa'i sems kyis bcing / bdun pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ bdud rtsi'i sa bon sa bon gyis/ bzlog byas rgyas pa'i gnas su ni/ chu shing me tog lta bur
153b1(rgyud): gyes/ ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa ni/ yi ge gsum pa gzung byas la/ dbyug par phyi ma'i sa bon dang / 'od dpag gis ni sngon dkris pa/ de nyid de nyid kun dang ni/ sa bon sa bon mchog gi gtso// theg pa rnam
153b2(rgyud): gsum dag byed pa/ a l-i'i sa bon rab tu grags/ sde tshan brgyad pa'i gnyis pa la/ ljags kyu yis ni spyi bor gnas/ spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/ sems can kun nas rmongs
153b3(rgyud): byed pas/ yid dbye ba la kun nas sbyar/ kun tu rmongs ni sa bon no// rmongs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon no// spyi bor lcags kyu 'dren pa dang / rtsa bar re pha'i sa bon no// kha dog
153b4(rgyud): sngon po 'bar ba yi/ dri dang me tog ro sogs meng / da las kyis kun nas 'brog par byed/ 'phrog byed ming gi sa bon gyis/ 'brog dpa'i las la kun tu sbyar/ bdun pa dkar po'i saben
153b5(rgyud): ni/ dung dang kun da mnyam pa 'od/ bdud rtsi chu'i sa bon no// chu yi yi ge ming can no// ko shar ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ kha dog ser po 'od mnyam pa/ me bzhin 'bar ning 'bar ba yi// me yi yi ge
153b6(rgyud): rnam par grags/ sna tshan brgyad kyi dang par ni// de nyid stong pa'i dngos po dang / rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/ rlung gi sa bon du ni grags/ brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ kha dog sngon po'i 'od mnyam pa/ snying kar sa yi
153b7(rgyud): sa bon no// de nyid pa yi sa bon no// 'di rnams sa bon sa bon la/ thig le yi ge rtsa bar ro// rtsa bar nyis 'gyur re pha dang / rlung gi sa bon gsum par ro// rtsa bar sgra ni bzhi pa'o// steng du thig le sbyar ba dang // 
153b8(rgyud): de nyid bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ bzhi pa'i yi ge drug pa'o// rmongs pa chu yi sa bon ni// g.yo ba'i rlung gi sa bon dang / sa ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ro// phyugs ni me la kun tu sbyar// yi ge brgyad pa'i sa bon ni/ rnal 'byor/ 
154a1(rgyud): // ma dud sems dang / bdag nyid de nyid gtso bo yi/ 'khor ba thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ thams cad kun nas spyi bo dang / yi ge kun nas gnas pa'o// sa bon 'di ni kun nas bzung / ye shes
154a2(rgyud): sa bon zhes bya 'i ming // rtag pa'i rtsa bar mnan pa dang / sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ dkar po kun da zla ba'i mchog/ ye shes rnam shes sa bon nyid/ rgyu ba'i gzugs kyis ban ni/ sa bon sa bon de bas
154a3(rgyud): mchog/ ye shes rnam shes bya ba'i ming / las kun la ni rab sbyar bya/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba ni/ zhi ba'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/ mthar ni swA hA ring por ldan/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i sngags pa yis
154a4(rgyud): gnyi ga lus la bsgoms nas ni/ yid 'dis lha mo sbyar bar buM/ sngags pas sreg pa'i sngags la ni/ sngon du dbyug pa med pa'o// lha mo 'am ya ngan lha ma~M la/ khro bo'i gzugs 'joms la sogs pa'i/ 
154a5(rgyud): 'joms pa'i yi ge mthar bzhag ste/ bzlas shing bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ gzugs dang gzugs can dngos po yis/ khro bo khro mo khyad par nyid/ bsregs dang 'joms pa'i sa bon ni// 
154a6(rgyud): khyad par dang ni khyad par can/ de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni/ rab tu spyad cing blta bar bya/ de nyid med pa'i sngags pa ni/ dngos grub ring du bstan pa yin/ sgrub pa'i dus su lnga nyid kyi/ sa bon mtha' ru bzlas pa
154a7(rgyud): bya/ mchog tu zhi ba'i de nyid la/ dang po dbyangs yig mtha' ru'o// khro bo khro mo'i lha la ni/ rdo rje'i sa bon mtha' ru ni/ lha mo kun gyi de nyid sa/ bdud rtsi yis ni mtha' mar ro// dang po sngags kyi sa bon ne/ 
154a8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal gcig ni rnams spangs nas/ bdag nyid ming gi sa bon dang / gnyi ga yongs su 'jigs pa'i rgyu/ stong dang stong pa'i sa bon ni/ bar ma sgrub pa'i lha nyid do// nyin mo'i yi ge dang po ru// bsgrub
154b1(rgyud): byasgrub pa'i ming nyid ni/ de yi sgrub pa'i las rnams ni/ rnal 'byor ma yi rnam par mchon/ sngags pas sngon gyi dus su ni/ rab tu lta zhing spyad par bya'o// nyin mo stong pa'i sgrub pa ni/ 'chi bar yang ni the tsomam/ 
154b2(rgyud): nyon mo nyin mo nyin mo sgrub/ stong pa stong pa bar ma'o// go bzlog pa yi sa bon no// lhag ma'i yi ge rtsi bar bya/ nyin par bsgrub bya lhag pa ni/ sgrub pa po la bu lon ni/ bsgrub bya stong pa lhag pa ni/ dgra nyid pas
154b3(rgyud): na 'bras bu med/ rab tu lta zhing spyad pa yis/ sngags kyi sgrub pa shes pa yin/ sngon du ma ning sa bon dang / de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma ni nga nyid/ dbus su ma ning yi ge mi/ dngos grub stong par bshad pa
154b4(rgyud): yin de nyid 'dasos bon gyis/ rang 'dod la nyid bsgrub par bya/ theg mthe ma khyad par du/ dbus su bsgrub bye'i ming nyid do// mtho dang dma'adang bar ma dang / khyad nyid kyang ni khyad par
154b5(rgyud): / ro/ zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs la/ khyad par sa bon ldan pa nyid/ stong pa'i sde tshun gnyis pa la/ rgyu bar re pi sgra nyid dang / steng du chos thig le dang // kha dog ser po kun 'od la/ lha mo rnal 'byor/ 
154b6(rgyud): ma kun gyi/ snying po yis ni snying po mchog/ gong du phyag 'tshal yi ge dang / 'dod bzhin ming ni dbus su'o// mtha' dang mtha' ni sreg sogs nyid/ thams cad du ni kun nas ldan// stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis
154b7(rgyud): pa la kha spyi bor e yi rnam pas mtshan/ rtsa bar ra da thig ler bcas/ kha dog dkar ngo mnyam pa'i 'od/ dga' byed las kyi sa bon gyi/ rnal 'byor ma kun dga' bar byed/ de nyid kun gyi sa bon ni/ 
154b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor na kun gyis rab spyad / de nas sman sogs rim pa ni/ khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya/ bla re bla re nyid dang ni/ spos dang bdug pa dri la sogs/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga yis// mkha' 'gro'i gtor
155a1(rgyud): / ma byin rlabs pa/ sngon du gnyis med gtor mA ldan/ dri yi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa/ dbus su rnal 'byor pas brib/ gur gum shin tu dri zhim ldan/ re mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ blo dang ldan pa gru bzhi
155a2(rgyud): bri dbang po la sogs re mig nas/ blo dang ldan pas yi ge dgod/ dngos dang dngos dang ldan pa yis/ de yi sa bon spang dbus so// nyin mo'i yi ge thams cad nyid/ ldeg ma'i sde tshan brgyad pa yis/ 
155a3(rgyud): sa bon mnyam pa gzhag pa dgod/ skra dang thig ler yang dag ldan/ kha dog dmar po 'ang mnyam pa'o// gu gul dbang po'i lags pa dang / rmongs byed rings byed de bzhin ste/ satwA si twe tsam pa ka ku tu ru dang
155a4(rgyud): ko l-i kaM son cigaka dang ba tha dang / gu gu la ru rta dur ba kar/ da ma dang dri dang gur gum dang / tsan+dan gi zang yang dag ldan/ sha khar dang li shi dang 8// pr-i yang ku dong gi sar dang / chu srin sder mo nub phyogs ma/ 
155a5(rgyud): re mig kun dang gnas kun tu/ dbang po la sogs sman re/ mas bzhin/ rdzas ni re re re re dang / cha la sa bon bzlas par bya/ phyag 'tshal dang po sreg pa mtha'/ brgyad dang brgyad du bzlas pa byed/ 
155a6(rgyud): tsha ngasan lo sogs bon no// sman dang ldan na de bas mchog bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ gu gul la sogs sbyar byas nas/ rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal dbang la/ mkhas pas byin pas dbang du byed/ bdag nyid
155a7(rgyud): lnga yi lnga dang naM/ sha da wa sogs sbyar byas nas// re pa'i rdzas la bsgoms byas na/ ji ltar sngon dang sngon bzhin nyid/ rje rigs bram ze dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa 'am yang na bud med la/ bza' ba'i dngos po
155a8(rgyud): byin pa yis// dbang du 'gyur bar yongs su grags/ smyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga/ son rtsi ke yen dang sbyar/ brtul zhugs dman pa'i rigs rnams ni/ bdog nyid kyis ni// dbang du byed// med la sogs sman/ 
155b1(rgyud): rims dang / mi yi mar khu yang dag ldan/ mkhas pas dpyad cing brtags pa yis// mnyam pa'i cha dang cha ru bya/ thig le ru ni sbyir byas na// rgyal po'i rigs la 'gro ba dang / tha snyad la ni rnam par rgyal// 'gro ba yang
155b2(rgyud): ngag rmongs par byed/ dang po sha kha ra sogs dang // tsan+dan dang ni rnam par sbyar/ sde tshan gcig gi cha dang ni/ tsan+dan gyi ni cha nyid dang / byams pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa/ yan lag nyin lag byug byas nas// dri ni sa
155b3(rgyud): la mnams tsam gyis/ nges par dbang du byed pa'o// mtshams dang mtshams kyi sha khar/ sbrang rtsi'i cha dang sbyar nas ni/ mchog tu bsgoms shing bdug pa yis/ kun nas nges par dbang du byed// mtshams kyi nang gi
155b4(rgyud): kun bzang nas/ sha kha ra yi cha dang bsre// bdug pas bdug cing bdug byas nas// mi ni kun nas rmongs par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul nas ni// sa bon so sa/ 
155b5(rgyud): sa bon nyid/ kun nas brgya phrag gcig tu'o// de bzhin du na de mar po'i las/ de yi rjes ni kun bzung la/ bdag nyid ye shes lnga ru'o// nyi ma'i la ga pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ 
155b6(rgyud): de nyid sa bon bzlas pa yis// g.yo ba dang ni ltung bar byed// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// de yi dbus su sa bon ni// bskyed par re pha thig le can// khri phrag gcig tu
155b7(rgyud): bzlas pa yis// gnyis kyis ltung ba 'am g.yo bar byed// phyi nas gtor ma'i las kyis ni// g.yo dang mi g.yo grub par byed// gu gul la sogs srin bu lngas// rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar byas nas/ phra ba'i sgong tsam zos pas/ 
155b8(rgyud): mod la myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ sha ta tsa sogs srin bu ni/ 'o ma bdun par sbyar byas pas// zhag bdun las lhag par zos na// 'tsho bo 'di la the tsom med// san rtsi kar sogs srin bu l+la/ spong rtsi spyi byed lnga pa ni/ bza' dang btung ba
156a1(rgyud): sbyin byas nas// smyo byang myos par 'gyur ba'o// med la sogs srin bu lnga// sbrul gyi sgo ngar bzlas byas nas// thig le tsam zhig zos pas ni// skad cig de la mdze yi 'dzin// kha ra'i sde tshan srin bu ni// 
156a2(rgyud): mgo la sgong dang ldan par// de yi phye ma zos pa yis// mi ni dbyangs dang bral bar 'gyur// 'tshams kyi khar kun bzang la// sbrang rtsi mar gyi cha dang sbyar// de yi phye ma bza' byas na// de yi mang la gzir bas 'dzin// 
156a3(rgyud): mtshams kyi nang gi yang dag bzung // sbrang rtsi lhan cig bsgo byas pa'i// phra rab tsam zhig zos pa yi/ mod la rims kyis gdung bar byed/ de nyid rab sbyor snying po ni// gsang zhing gsang ba'i lung gi don// ye she
156a4(rgyud): ldan zhing blo ldan pa'i/ lus kyi rim pa rnam par blta/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / slob dpon dang ni gsang smod pa/ sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi
156a5(rgyud): gsungasa' lnga pa'am lnga pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa rdzog sa so// / de nas gzhan gyi rim pa ni/ sman rnams kyi ni khyad par nyid/ de nyid kun gyi mchog 'gyur ba// mchog gi snying po snying pa
156a6(rgyud): nyid/ sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ cho ga rim bzhin sman dang sngags// de nyid gtor ma'i las dang ni/ dri yi re mig dgod par bya/ bcu dgu dang ni sum cu yi/ gru bzhi pa yi re mig dgod/ nyin mo steng pa'i sa
156a7(rgyud): bon dang / sde tshan tha ma dgod par bya/ dbang po la sogs gnas rnams su/ dang por dbyangs yig rims ji bzhin/ re mig kun gyi sa bon ni/ sman sogs bzhin du bzhag par bya/ na ki b+ha la bde ling ga ma ru rta
156a8(rgyud): raM b+ha sa ka/ ka sa la sogs bdun pa ni/ dbang ldan la sogs gnas su dgod/ dbang po'i lag pa shu dag dang / rmongs byed dang ni tsan+dan dang / tsan+dan dang ni gur gum nyid/ bdun pa'i gnas su bzhag par bya/ 
156b1(rgyud): cha mnyam pa ni gnyis pa'o// ga bur sa li shu dag dang / gur gum rkun mo ga wang dang / sbrang rtsi bdun pa yi ni cha/ gsum pa'i re mig sde tshan mo// sa rdzar gu gu la ru rta dang / g+han d+hi kha ra ku tu ru/ me tog phreng ba bdun
156b2(rgyud): pa ni// bzhi pa'i re mig gnas su'o// ka ko la dang sha ta dang / ge sar son rtse rgya skyegs dang // pa tra bdun pa'i cha nyid ni/ lnga pa'i las su yongs su grags// dri dang bcud lan k+Sha ra dang / yang ba dang ni kha ra tra/ k+Sho'u
156b3(rgyud): dri pi pi ling gi cha// drug pa'i re mig yin no// dan ta dan ta ku sum ma/ rams dang gar sma be ta ki/ sa ra la bdun pa yi che// bdun pa'i sman gyi rim pa'o// brgya phyed gcig gis ma tshang bar// re mig kun sogs sman nyi/ 
156b4(rgyud): do/ re re la yang sngags 'di ni/ brgya phrag mngon par rab tu sngags te/ dang po chu srin sde tshan sogs// bdag nyid bdun gyi bdun pa ni// mthar ni daphye ma sbyar byas te/ shin tu zhib mor mkhas pas brtag/ 
156b5(rgyud): 'dus pas rgyal po rgyal dbang ni/ bza' dang btung dang ldan par sbyin// thams cad bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin// kun nas thams cad dbang du' gyur// dbang po la sogs sde tshan ni// phra zhing zhib par rab tu
156b6(rgyud): bya phye ma kun nas blangs nas ni// bdag nyid mchil mas de bzhin bdun/ bza' dang ston mor cho ga bzhin/ rab tu mnyam par gzhag pas bya// skyes pa 'am ni bud med dam// thams cad kun nas 'ong 'gyur ro// / 
156b7(rgyud): dang por shol gyi sde tshan ni/ mnyam por chu de byed mar bya// mi yi snum dang kun tu sbyar/ grib ma dang ni grib mar bskams// cho lor 'jug cing dga' ba dang / snga dro thig le sbyin byas na// rgyal po'i rigs la nyer 'gra
156b8(rgyud): ba/ skye bo skal can myur du 'gyur/ sardza sngon sogs dang por sbya raM/ phye ma zhib du byas nas ni/ sbrang rtsi kha ra'i cha nyid dang // rang 'dod spos chu rab sbyar nas/ mi dga' ba kun dga' ba dang / ngag gi 'dren pa nyid
157a1(rgyud): du 'gyur// de yi bdug pas bdug pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ ka ko la sogs dang ldan pas// phye ma mnyam por char byas te/ tsan+dan dang po thams cad kun// chu gsum du ni
157a2(rgyud): bya bar bya/ mi byams sman zhing bkur ba ni/ skal ldan mdzes par 'dod 'gyur na/ de yi yan lag la byugs la/ 'gro ba rnam par rmongs byed yin/ dri yi sde tshan bdun par ni/ ka ko la sogs dang ldan
157a3(rgyud): por mar dang 'o ma dang bsres nas/ kun gyi dang na sbyar byas nas/ grib ma'i grib mar bskam par bya/ rigs dman klaklo la sogs kun/ yid mi 'ong ba byams par 'gyur/ 'di yi sbyor ba sbyin byas nas/ 
157a4(rgyud): rang gi 'dod bzhin byed pa'o// stan ni mnyam pa'i cha nyid dang / rgya skyegs la sogs kun gyi tshe/ me la bsro bar rab tu sbyar/ ka ran dza/ yi rdog ma tsam/ yid du mi 'ong ba yi gnas/ khar bcug
157a5(rgyud): kun tu de yi dag/ tshig gsum tshig tu brjod pa yis// bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed/ mtshams kyi ta ni la sogs pa/ spro byed chu ni lnga pa dang / bdag nyid bcings par sngon ldan pas// 
157a6(rgyud): mchog tu bsgoms na 'dug par bya/ bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas na// sgrub pos sna la mnams tsam gyis/ de yi rang 'dod su la ni/ dbang du gyur par yongs su grags/ 'tshams kyi sar la sogs
157a7(rgyud): blang / phye ma zhim mor byas nas ni// bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang ni/ kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la// phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan/ 'di yi sman dang ldan pa yis/ sgrub bya'i lus la reg byas na// nges par dbang du
157a8(rgyud): byed pa'o// cha dang cha yi bye brag ni// mkhas shing bzo bar sbyar bar bya// khyad par sman gyi las nyid ni/ cho ga bzhin du rnam par blta/ rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba ni// bad+ma'i gad cigadan la bzhugs// kun nas/ 
157b1(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ bcom gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ a ni thig le yang dag ldan/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba yis// bsgrub bya'i sems ni 'gugs par byed// 
157b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang // rtsa bar sgra yis rab tu sbyar// mthar ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ming // 'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu sgrub/ sman gyi sbyor bar ldan pa ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kun nas bya/ gtor ma de nyid
157b3(rgyud): byin rlabs nas/ 'bum dang 'bum du bsnyen pa bya// sngon du dan ti'i yan lag dang / thig le brgya par kun nas ldan/ bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas na/ mi yi skad cig rnam par spungs// dan da la sogs srin bu dang / 
157b4(rgyud): ri yi 'o mar bsres byas na/ gang gis zas pa tsam gyis ni/ zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi/ ku gsum srin bu bdun dang ni/ smyo byed chu ni rna/ dam pa lnga/ bza' bar zos pa tsam gyis ni// smyo zhing
157b5(rgyud): smyo bar 'gyur ba'o// rams kyi lam sogs sde tshan dang / dkar por srin bu sbyar nas ni/ bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas nas// thams ca da kun nas 'thab par 'gyur/ ka mi srin du'i sde chen dang / 
157b6(rgyud): mo yi mar khu dang sbyar nas// bye mas yan lag la reg na// skal ngan mi byams pa dgra ni/ rtsi te sde tshan bdun pa ni/ nor bur sgong ldan bzas nas/ thig le tsam zhig zos pa yis// mod+ma la tsher ba mi bzad/ 
157b7(rgyud): 'byung / sa la la sogs sde tshonA dang / nyi shur ra yi chu yis spangs// cung zhig tsam zhig zos pa yis/ nyi ma nyi shu na de 'chi/ dan ti 'tshams kyi srin bu dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar nas ni/ bza' btung ba
157b8(rgyud): yis zos nas ni// mdze nad kyis ni yan lag gzir// 'tshams sogs thang chu'i srin bu ni/ bza' dang btung bar rab byin na/ rnam par rmongs cing dran pa nyams// de nyid med cing mnyam gzhag med// 
158a1(rgyud): rab sbyor snying po bsdus pa nyid/ gsang zhing gsang bar byas pa yi/ rmongs shing blun pa'i sems can sogs// sbyor ba 'di yis longs spyod ldan/ dkon mchog gsum la brnyas pa dang / 
158a2(rgyud): slob dpon dang ni gsang sprod dang / sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ba// rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs// nyon mongs rmongs sogs bag chags dang / shes rab zhan zhing yid mi gzhungs/ sngags kyi snod min
158a3(rgyud): snying rje med/ sman gyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni/ gsum pa yin gsum pa'o// de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni/ brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o// le'u bzhi pa ces bya ba rdzogs so// 
158a4(rgyud): de yi rtsa ba'i snying po'i don sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yi//  de nyid bsdus pa'i 'grub pa'o// de nyid sman pas lus nyon mongs/ shes rab tha/ dpes ni rgyu gyur pas/ rang 'dod las ni bsgrub par bya/ shesar
158a5(rgyud): ye shes snang ba'o// thabs ni rigs pa'i tshul nyid do// rnal 'byor shes rab rtsa ba 'di/ tha bas ni de yi grogs nyid de// gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ nyon mongs lus las rnam par rgyal// srid
158a6(rgyud): pa'i nyes sbyin du ma yang srid pa dang ni rmongs pa bzhi/ dngos po'i gnas ni mi rtag pas/ de phyir shes rab yongs su spangs/ dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/ skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med// dngos po yongs su gnas pa
158a7(rgyud): med/ 'jig pa yi ni rnam pa med/ dngos dang dngos med la sogs mtha'/ dag dang ma dag dbus su ni/ de yi mtshan nyid ston shes nas/ mnyam pa'i lta ba ljon par gzung // bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i/ dngos
158a8(rgyud): po'i 'du shes rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas kyis rtogs bstan bcos las// yongs su brtags nas snying po blang // dngos med dngos por gzung bar bya// dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par spangs// dngos dang dngos ma
158b1(rgyud): mnyam byas pas// 'o ma bsrubs pa las ni mar/ mchog gi snying po yang dag blang // mnyam par lta ba 'ba' zhig go// bstan bcos bstan zhing yongs shes na// de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med// yang dag
158b2(rgyud): lam la dmigs pa yis/ dngos po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub ji bzhin gnas kyi rim pa rten// ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong // gzhan gyis gnas las 'phangs pa yi// mda' yis mda' ni bsnun par
158b3(rgyud): byang gong na gong la sogs par blta/ rang 'dod dngos por yang dag blang / bdun pa'i sgra las rnam par rgyal// 'khor ba'i dgra yi g.yul nyid ni/ gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ dgra ni dngos po gang du
158b4(rgyud): gnas/ le lo gnyid dang 'dod pa dang // khro dang rmongs pa da sred pa dang // khro ba yis ni yan lag gzir/ thabs kyis bdud ni rnam par spang ngas/ le lo nyes skyon kun gyi gnas// gnyid kyis dge ba rnam
158b5(rgyud): par 'joms/ khro ba yis ni srid pa 'dren/ 'dod pas dran pa rnam par nyams// rmongs pa yis ni gnyid kyis non/ bsred pa yis ni 'khor bar 'jug/ bkros pas dman zhing sngar ba yi// bdud bdun
158b6(rgyud): pon yongs su spangs/ kun nas bdud kyis 'bigs pa yi/ lus ni nyon mongs sdug bsngal gnas// rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis ni/ dul bar bsrub cing mnan par bya/ gang dang gang gi lam du ni// rang
158b7(rgyud): 'dod sems kyis 'bad pa yis/ thams cad snying po bsdus nas ni/ rnal 'byor mchog ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// smon lam bla med rgyu yi ni/ oM swa b+hA ba shu d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba
158b8(rgyud): shud+d+ho&haM/ yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho&haM/ badz+ra shud+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho&haM/ smon lam kun mchog don du ni// lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/ rnam shes rang 'dod par byas pas// sred dang rmod/ 
159a1(rgyud): pa rnam par spangs/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ bdag nyid lus ni rnam par rgyan/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// dung dang kun da mnyam pa'i 'od// bdag nyid sems dpa'i
159a2(rgyud): skyil mo krung // phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang / sku la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rdo rje me 'od rab 'phro ba/ 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par// dngos po dngos por bsgom par bya// a li ka li rab sbyor bas// sa bon
159a3(rgyud): sa bon byung ba yi/ phyag 'tshal sreg pa mtha' bzhag pa/ rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis bzla/ rims bzhin 'gags pa'i phyi na sa ni// bdag med shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ gzugs kun rnam par dbus
159a4(rgyud): nas ni/ khams gsum du ni mi rtog go/ zla ba ra la sogs dbadag nyid med/ kun nas thams cad stong par rig/ stong nyid stong pa stong chen dang / dngos med dngos por bsgoms pa yis// bsgoms
159a5(rgyud): nas lhag ma'i mtha' ru ni/ rnam shes sgron ma lta bur 'bar// de yi 'od zer snang ba yis/ khams gsum mun pa bsal nas ni// 'bar zhing ra ba tu phra ba'o// rnam shes ye shes snang ba nyid/ dngos dang dang
159a6(rgyud): po med pa'i dbus/ gzugs dang gzugs med dbus nyid dpa 'du shes 'du shes med par ldan/ yud tsam lta bar reg pa'o// gzugs dang stong pa la sogs dbus// 'di yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid// 'gog/ 
159a7(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba'i rim pa ni/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ yan lag gzir ba med pa dang / sems kyi skyo ba med pa yis/ rim dang rim pa brtsam byas nas// 'khor ba gcod cing gcod pa'o// rtag tu
159a8(rgyud): nyid kyis sems kyis ni// yang dag byang chub rim pa bstan/ shin tu bcad cing bltas nas ni/ rnal 'byor 'di ni blang bar bya// oM ba ta li ba ta li pe ta mu khi hUM phaT swA hA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor gyis/ 
159b1(rgyud): brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ gzugs kun rdzogs shing mdzes pa yi/ btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni/ rdo rje 'od zer kun nas 'phro/ ye shes sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ 
159b2(rgyud): sngags pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/ 'dod dang grol ba rgya chen po'i// phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/ dur khrod thal ba sogs blangs la/ snod la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ de yi sol ba'i phye ma yis// 
159b3(rgyud): gang du dkyil 'khor sprul pa yis/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ de yi dbus su pad+ma br-i/ thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ dri dang bdug pa mar me dang / gtor mo'i de nyid de
159b4(rgyud): nyid dang / kun nas nya phyis dngos po yi// sna tshogs mchod dpa rgya chen po/ ye shes mkha' 'gro dgug pa ni/ po nya bzhi dang kun tu ldan/ seng ge stag mo lce spyang dang / 'ug pa mo ni phyogs bzhir ro// thams
159b5(rgyud): cad kun nas kun tu ni// mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis mchod// de yi shar gyi gnas su ni/ me yi las ni rab tu byas// dur khrod shing gi lhag ma dang // de yi shing gi ba dan gsum/ de 'am 'on te rdol pa'i me// 
159b6(rgyud): 'bad pas me nI rab tu sbar/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgya chen po/ mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres byas pas/ mchog gi sngags ni bzla bya zhing / bsregs pas lha mo tshig par 'gyur/ thams cad gnas dang phyogs nas ni/ sna chos
159b7(rgyud): gzugs ni 'jigs pa dang // mi bzad ku tso rab sgrogs na/ 'jigs par mi bya 'joms par 'gyur// dpung gi tshogs ni yan lag bzhi/ rgyal po myur du 'ong 'gyur na// de la tsham ngam sbyin par bya// ri rab ri la sogs
159b8(rgyud): pa dang / sa gzhi 'ur 'ur 'gul ba dang // sna tshogs mi bzad dri dang ni/ 'dren pa'i sems ni 'jigs mi bya// sems can chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// khri phrag gcig tu sreg byas na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdun nyid ni// 
160a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'di la the tsom med/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya ba dang // gtor ma'i las dang las nyid dang / lus la ltos pa med pa yis/ 'grub par 'di la the tsom med/ phyi nas ye shes lha mo ni/ 
160a2(rgyud): me yi dbus su ston par byed// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ gtor ma dang ni arga dbul/ zab cing rgya cher sgrogs pa yi// de la lha mo tshig tu brjod/ sems can chen po ci zhig 'grub/ gang 'dod dngos
160a3(rgyud): grub rab tu spros/ de la sgrub pos smras pa ni/ dngos grub chen po grub ldan pa'i/ gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod// grub pa brgyad ni gsol ba gdab/ bdud dang nyon mongs gza' sogs kyis// gal te
160a4(rgyud): yid gnyis skyes na ni/ til mar chen po dang ldan pa'i// lhag sa kyu chen po sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// 'grub pa 'di la the tsom med/ dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// mchog
160a5(rgyud): gi lha mo sgrub po ni/ lus dang srog la mi ltos par// mkhru pas yis ni bsgrub par bya/ de nas ye shes de nyid mchog/ shin tu phre la rab zhi pa/ gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ 'byung
160a6(rgyud): ba kun la 'dis khyab pa/ 'od kyi bdag nyid gnas pa'i me/ ma rig nyon mongs gcod byed pa/ srid pa la sogs nyon mongs rnams/ gang du gnas kyi rnam pa 'byung / lus la sems shing sems dpa'
160a7(rgyud): dang / bcu gnyis dus kyi gnas su yang / gzugs med sems kyi longs spyod pa'o// rmongs pa'i gnas dang gnas su ni/ srid pa'i ngo bo nyid du mchod/ rmongs pa gcod sogs rnal 'byor pa/ srid pa
160a8(rgyud): 'dam sogs rgal dka' ba/ dag pa'i chos kyi sgrol ma yis// sgrib pa'i mtshan ma 'joms pa yi// chos dag pa yi thabs kyis ni/ dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa'o// dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ 
160b1(rgyud): legs byas nyes byas 'du shes can/ 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dag/ rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka'/ bcu gnyis lus kyi bdag nyid can/ rmongs pa ye shes rnam par gnas// dag pa'i
160b2(rgyud): chos kyi chu yis ni/ lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma 'khru/ rang bzhin pad+ma'i dbye ba yis/ nyon mongs la sogs gdung ba gcod/ rnam rtog 'jigs pa chen po ni/ srid pa'i rgyu ste me bzhin no// de phyir rnam rtog ring du
160b3(rgyud): spang / rnal 'byor pa yi 'gro ba rtogs/ mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed byas nas/ kun nas thams cad mnyam par lta/ rab tu mi gnas ming can la/ las dang las kyi mtshan nyid med/ bdud rtsi lnga yi rang
160b4(rgyud): bzhin yang / bdud rtsi lus ni tshim par bya/ rtag tu bdud rtsis mchod pa'o// dngos su med na rnam par brtag/ lcags kyu rnam pa lnga drangs/ nas/ thams cad kun nas rim pas mchod// sbyor bas
160b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro la sogs ni/ bdag nyid dbang du myur du 'gyu ra/ rtag tu de nyid kyis bza' zhing / med na gzhan las rnam par brtag/ gsher ba'i bdud rtsi kun nas bsam/ bza' ba yang na
160b6(rgyud): sha nyid du/ rtag tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis// rtag dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ rang bzhin dag pa'i dpa' bo ni/ dag pa'i lus su gdon mi za/ rtag tu rnal 'byor pa spangs pa/ bgrod dang bgrod min rnam
160b7(rgyud): par spangs// lo mo'i dang ni mdab ma'i rgyu/ snod la thams cad myu gu'o// de yi pad+ma rgyas byed pa/ dag pa'i mtshan ma dang po'o// kha dog ngan zhing dri mi zhim// btung ba dro ba rnam par spangs// dag pa'i ngo bo
160b8(rgyud): gcod byed pa// gnyis pa'i mtshan mar bstan pa'o// kun la dga' zhing byams pa dang // gnod pa nam yang mi byed cing / sems can kun la snying rtse ba/ gsum pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan// 
161a1(rgyud): rtag tu stong pa'i blo ldan pas/ zab cing rgya che'i sems kyis ni/ thams cad rtsa bzhin du ni stong / bzhi pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ dag cing bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ lus gcig la ni rab ltos
161a2(rgyud): pa/ rtag tu gsang sogs zab mi lnga pa'i mtshan ma ru ni gsungs/ brtson 'grus kun nas ldan pa dang / sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / bsam gtan mchog tu brtan byed pa/ drug pa'i mtshan ma ru ni brtag
161a3(rgyud): bzo dang sgyu rtsal nyan pa dang / rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems dang ni/ rtag tu sems can don la brtson/ bdun pa yin mtshan mar bstan// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ sems can kun gyi blo rtogs byed/ sbrid pa yang
161a4(rgyud): dag byang chub lam// mtshan ma brgyad pa ru ni bstan// 'ga' de yang nam du mi smod cing / rdzas dang rdzas min rnam rtog bcas// bdug pa'i bdud dang bgegs sogs dang // rnam par rtog pas srid par
161a5(rgyud): ltung / dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bzad pas// bsnyen pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ lus ni dka' bar spyod pa yis/ 'khor zhing srid pa'i mtha' ru'o// rnam rtog med pas mnyam par byas// dngos po
161a6(rgyud): mtshan ma'i sems dang bcas/ sbyor ba grub pa'i don du ni// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis bza'// bsrubs pa rang 'dod snying po ni/ g.yo dang mi g.yo dngos grub rgyu/ ches kyi snying po snying po nyid/ sems ni ye shes
161a7(rgyud): rang bzhin ldan/ sbyor ba'i bstan bcos na nyid ni/ de nyid de nyid khyad par ro// sbyar dang bsam gtan byas pa yis/ rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/ rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor las 'das gnas/ 
161a8(rgyud): chen po/ las bzhi dang mi rab ldan pa'i/ ye shes kyi ni 'khor bsgrol/ dang por bskyed rims spyod pa dang / dbugs kyi sbyor ba ri mo sogs dang / las la sems shing sems pa dang / dang po'i sbyor ba'i
161b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid do// me bzhin du ni zab dang / mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin du blta/ rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du/ rna bsgra yi mchod par ldan/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ gzugs brnyan la sogs mchod pa'o// 
161b2(rgyud): gtor mas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o// dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar/ phyag rgya chen po yi ni thabs/ sbyor ba las 'das 'di
161b3(rgyud): yod do// rang bzhin gyis ni legs spyad na/ thams cad bdag med pa las byung / lus sogs stong par rtogs pa ni/ bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o// 'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// chen po'i sems kyi sngam
161b4(rgyud): pa'o// rtag tu bya ba der 'jug pas/ 'byung zhing 'khor ra bar stsol ba'o// spyan ni pad+ma ltar yang shing / bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa'ang / 'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten// bde bar spyod cing bde bar mi// 
161b5(rgyud): 'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa/ bde ba'i sems kyis bslu ba par bya/ rnam par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas// srid par 'khor zhing 'jugapa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug
161b6(rgyud): nas ni/ rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms par bya// zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas/ sor mo 'brel bar byas nas ni// dri med gsum dang dud pas spel/ sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags/ 
161b7(rgyud): tsham ngam phur bu ra ba dang / dra ba thams cad las nyid do// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od// 'di yi phyag rgyar bstan par bya// kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni/ rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang // spyi bor 'bar
161b8(rgyud): ba'i re ba dang / mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag gis brgyan cing // rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi gnas/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ 'di ltar sa bon mdor byas pa/ thams cad las ni sgrub pa'o// lus la
162a1(rgyud): // dgra yis kun tu dgang / gzugs la sogs pa bad par byed/ sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni/ sa bon lhag ma bsam par bya/ go cha'i srung ba dang bral zhing // thams cad yan lag drug gis las// 
162a2(rgyud): stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni/ sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ smad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang med// ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang / dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni/ mnyam pa nyid du sems kyis bya// sngon du rigs
162a3(rgyud): pas smon lam rnams/ bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs/ gang zhig yid la 'dod spyod pa// de yi thabs ni rdo rje'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ rked po'i phyogs su bzung nas ni/ hUM gi dbyangs kyis kun
162a4(rgyud): bkang zhing / grub pa'i glu yis mnyam par bya/ dza dza dza dza/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod/ ha ha ha ha/ hUM yig ma gon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal/ ba bab pa/ 
162a5(rgyud): rdo rje sgrog gi gsang ba las byung sku 'dzin pa/ a a a a/ a ho mgu ba'i rdo rje a li gcig tu thim par hUM/ 'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po/ rnal 'byor ma kun tshim byed pa/ rtse gcig rnal 'byor
162a6(rgyud): sems bcas pas/ khu byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras// nam mkha'i khams kyis mtha' klas pa/ khams gsum snying po'i dbus su ni/ rlung gi na mkha' ltar dag pas/ sems nyid rlung bzhin na mkhar brjod/ rlung gi
162a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ a li sa bon 'od dang bcas/ las kyi sa bon mdog tu ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// 'byin
162a8(rgyud): dang sdug cing gcod mdzad ma/ a li'i sa bon rab tu grags/ ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/ yi ge gsum pa gzung byas te/ glo ru dbyug pa rdo rje dang / 'od dpag gis ni dkri bar bya/ 'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog
162b1(rgyud): sgom pa/ 'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed/ phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ kun nas chu yi sa gang bar ni/ phyogs brgyad du ni mnyam par ro// de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i// 
162b2(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon 'dzin/ gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab/ 'od zer 'bar ba rnams mang ngo po// de yis sa bon las skyes
162b3(rgyud): pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ kun da dkar dang zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis pa la mdzes pa'i brang / dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ rdo rje snying dkar
162b4(rgyud): mtha' 'dzin cing // g.yon pa dril bu dku ru bstan/ sgegad cing spo ba'i rang bzhin dang / rgyan rnams kun ni rnam par brgyan/ 'od zer 'bar/ da ba rnams mang po/ dngos po'i tshon gyis bco bar bya/ 
162b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab rgyas pa'i// rdo rje rnon po 'od 'a bro ba/ 'jigs pa med cing gnod med par/ dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ spro ba'i sems
162b6(rgyud): kyis mnyam par sgom/ dbus su mchog gi sa bon dang / phyag 'tshal a li mthar bzhag pa/ yi ge drug pa'i sngags chen po/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o// zlos dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// 
162b7(rgyud): rang 'dod las ni mngon par 'grub// 'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis// de nas de yi mngon du 'grub// de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ skye dang 'jig dang rnam bral ba/ gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas// 'dod
162b8(rgyud): bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed pa'o// rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang / ye shes sku ni gnyis kyi gzugs// rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas ni/ dril bu mnan pa'i rkang pas mnan/ pad+ma rdo rje sbyar byas nas/ phyag rgya 'ching ba'i
163a1(rgyud): / mchog tu brtson/ dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin pa/ rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg/ g.yon pas gzhung tshigs mtha' ru'o// tshems kyis ma mchu btsir mdzad cing / gnyis kyi sems kyis mchog son/ 
163a2(rgyud): par/ dngos pos dngos po bsgoms par bya// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis dang / na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni/ sems kyis rab tu spyad par bya/ mthar ni sgrol ma'i rnam pa'o// / 
163a3(rgyud): dbus su a li sa bon ni/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'phro/ khams gsum kun gyis cha dang bcas// phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa/ gnyis ka yid 'ong gzugs mdzes pa'o// dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i
163a4(rgyud): mgon/ 'od dpag shes rab kyi ni bzhi// rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor rabs/ mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ rdo rje gsang ba mtshan nas ni// gnyis ka' khyud nas bzlas par bya// phyag 'tshal bsregs pa mthar
163a5(rgyud): bzhag nas// dbus su a li'i sa bon ni// rtag pa mchog tu phra ba nyid/ bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya/ shes rab rdo rje yang dag/ 
163a6(rgyud): par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas thams cad snying po ni/ mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ gus pa yis ni bzung bar bya/ shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// dag pa'i
163a7(rgyud): dngos por bza' bar bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ dag pa'i ngo bor sgom pa nyid// de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa/ bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid/ btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o// 'khor ba'i pha rol
163a8(rgyud): rgal 'dod pas// sngon du dbang bskur dpa' bo rnams/ 'bad pas brtul zhugs bzung bar bya/ rim pa bzhin du zla ba dang / nyi ma 'am ni lo dus su// brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// yon tan de yi yongasu bcag/ 
163b1(rgyud): bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o// brtul zhugs rim pa 'di nyid ni/ nan tan gyis ni gtor ma sbyin/ de yi las rnams thams cad ni/ ye shes de nyid 'bras bu sogs// de ltar bden pa'i
163b2(rgyud): sngags kun gyis/ 'grub pa 'di la the tsom med/ bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byor pas/ zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gzung / rang 'dod chos ni rab brtags na/ thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ brtul zhugs
163b3(rgyud): ldan pa nyin re 'am/ gal te ma 'byor pa na yang // dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni/ lo yi nyi ma bzung bar bya/ mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ skyon med sngags kyis sbyin byas nas/ de yi dus rnams thams cad
163b4(rgyud): du dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas/ rnal 'byor chos cad sogs la dga' bas/ gnyis med grogs mchog rab ldan pas/ de yis chos/ da la bsten nas ni/ mchog gi go 'phangs bsgrub par bya// 
163b5(rgyud): stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing // blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed/ thams cad sdom pa na mkha' ni/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam/ thams cad na mkha'i gnas su ni/ 'o ma zla ba'i
163b6(rgyud): sa bon bsam// 'od zer 'bar ba mang po ni/ dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ a li'i sa bon mchog gtso bo/ dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya// skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis// ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid
163b7(rgyud): nizhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ steng du rdo rje cod pan dang / sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la
163b8(rgyud): brgyan dgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang // spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ smad g.yogs glang chen lpags pa dang / mi yi lpags pa rab tu gsol/ mi yi yan lag lnga rus pas// rgyan kun gyis
164a1(rgyud): / ni rab tu brgyan/ skra yi rtse mo rab 'jam zhing // me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'o// dang po'i phyag na kha T+wAM ga/ gnyis pa na ni dgra sta bsnams/ gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o// g.yon pa sdig mdzub zhags pa dang / 
164a2(rgyud): gnyis pa thod pa khrag gis bkang / ral gri phyag ni steng du'o// rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med/ sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba/ sa yi dbus su rnam rol par/ dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya/ 'ug pa lde spyang seng ge
164a3(rgyud): dang / stag mo phyogs su rnam par sgom// bya rog lce sbyang bya rgod dang / tsi li ka ni mtshams su dgod/ 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs mche ba gtsigs// ha hUM rnam par 'jigs par byed/ 'di ltar mkha' 'gro rgyal
164a4(rgyud): dbang ma/ bdag nyid sems kyis bsgoms par bya/ rang gi dadabugs las phyung nas ni/ gzugs brten la sogs dgod par bya/ rnal 'a byor pa yis bris sku sogs/ do yi gnas su kun tu ngas
164a5(rgyud): 'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang gnas/ gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin/ sbyor ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa pos/ 'di yi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/ bza' dang ston mo de nyid dang / gsang ba'i
164a6(rgyud): mchod pas rab tu mchod// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyis hU~M gi sa bon las/ de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dgod// bza' ba la sogs
164a7(rgyud): khyad par nyid/ dag pa'i dngos por bsgoms nas ni/ sgrub pa shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ yud tsam gyis ni sbyor ba yis// oM ho ho hrIHswA hA/ oM gyis 'bar bar bsam pa dang // ha yi rnam pa sa so sor/ 
164a8(rgyud): rtogs sa bon ho yis snang bar byas/ hI yi rnam pas dri ma sbyong / lus kyis lha nyid tshim pa'i phyir/ a yi rnam pas rtogs par bya/ sa bon lnga yis lha nyid ni/ sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim/ 
164b1(rgyud): oM dza g+h+raM traM hUM a swA hA/ bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ sngags 'di yis ni bzung bar bya/ oM gyi rnam pas lus dang ni/ dzaM gyis rnam par bzung ba dang / g+haM gyis rnam par lto ba dang / traM gis rnam par dri med lus/ 
164b2(rgyud): hUM gi rnam pas spyad par bya// sems kyis snying kar yi ge a/ de nyid rtag tu mchod byas nas// rnal 'byor pa yis sdig sbyang bya// dri dang mar me me tog dang // lha bshos dang ni gtor ma yis// glu yi dus su dbyangs snyan dang
164b3(rgyud): po bang gling bu la sogs sbyar/ rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing / rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid brjod// 'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / 'chags dang thams cad dus nyid du/ rtag tu sems shing
164b4(rgyud): sems dpa' yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya// 8 oM a mu hUM swA hA/ ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis/ sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas/ sdig pa thams cad thag bsrings shing // 
164b5(rgyud): / rang 'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 'byung ba lnga las gyur ra ba'i sdig/ gang gis gsang ba dbye byas pa'ang / rtag tu bsgoms shingabazlas byas na// sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 
164b6(rgyud): oM ka ra ka ra pra dz+nyA ma hA tIk+ShA pany+tsa oM bud+d+he ha/ oM kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM/ a a a mu mu mu swA hA/ sngags chen po yi sa bon 'di/ sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o// skyon med sbyor ba'i sgrub pa pos// thams cad ldan
164b7(rgyud): pa'i sa bon ni/ mtshan mo yi ni mtha' nyid dang // dang por r-i hi ta dus la/ nya phyis snod du chu dang ni/ ma ga d+ha ni srang gnyis nyid/ kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan/ 
164b8(rgyud): bdud rtsi bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni/ shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas pa'o// de yi chu ni btung byas na/ sdigs pa thams cad 'jog pa dang / ye she
165a1(rgyud): / bdud rtsi ye shes sku/ yid gzhungs shes rab rno ba dang // rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing / kun nas skal ldan dag dang ni/ thos dang shes rab nor dang ni// rlung mkhris dug dang
165a2(rgyud): bad ka na dang / 'dus dang glo sogs kyis gzer dang / mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni// chu 'di yis ni nad kun 'phrog/ oM ra ta a brta ni/ sarba pA paM ha ran+ta maM hUM/ bi kr-ita krod+ha hUM phaT swAt+ma'adi sngags ni sngags chen
165a3(rgyud): posrung ba kun gyis bla na med// sngon gyi dus su bzhag byas nas/ rnal 'byor lus ni srung ba'o// lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la// gnas lnga ru ni len gsum mo/ sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsam
165a4(rgyud): nas/ spyi bo'i steng du bskur byas nas/ rgyal po seng dge dgra sogs dang // rkun mo dang ni me dang chu/ rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs na/ dad/ 'jig sa byed 'jig pa 'joms par byed// 
165a5(rgyud): oM bi mo ha ni saM mo ha ni/ sarba pr-i ye ti hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen pos/ 'gro kun rmongs par byed par gsungs/ mi byams byams pa bskyed byed cing / kun nas mdza' bar
165a6(rgyud): gyur pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa yi ni chu/ snga dro'i dus su kha bkrus nas/ rnal 'byor pa ni 'grub 'dod pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad/ snying po las na
165a7(rgyud): snying po mchog/ rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya/ gnyis su med par mnyam par 'dres/ yan lag 'di yis tha dad sgom// dug med pa yang dug gis bsnun/ shin tu mi bzad rmongs pa yis/ rmongs pa
165a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jigs// 'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni/ dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed/ dag pa'i sgron ma bltas pa yis// nyon mongs la sogs mun pa 'joms// nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la// 
165b1(rgyud): sems dang sems ni rnam par thim/ gcig sogs dngos po sgom pa ni/ 'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do// me yi lhag ma sogs lhag pa/ dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher/ de yi 'od kyis na mkha'
165b2(rgyud): khams// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas blta/ sa bon 'di yi myu gu las/ a li ka li rnam par 'byung // sa bon sa bon rab 'phro ba/ nam mkha'i khams su yang dag gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
165b3(rgyud): gnas pa'i// ro langs ma yi dbus su bsam/ pad ma'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ 
165b4(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags pa bsdigs mdzub dang / spyan gsum ra gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyis blta ba dang / na bza' dmar nga po mngon par g.yogs/ mchog gi sems dang sems pa
