165b5(rgyud): la/ bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam/ lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+ShuM/ bzlas shing 'di yis drang bar bya/ gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing / rang gi dbugs kyis dgang bar bya/ 
165b6(rgyud): oM rA ga ta rA ga ta b+ha di hUM k+ShaM swA hA/ lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'dod bzhin drang / rmongs chen shin tu rmongs pa ni/ mnyam par gzhag nas rab tu sgru ba/ gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud
165b7(rgyud): kyi ni sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las/ grub pa'i snying po bsdus pa ni/ mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o// 
165b8(rgyud): de nas ye shes lus la ni/ shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis// sbyang dang rtogs pa spyad par bya/ dngos po smad pa ma yin zhing // gang yang brtag par mi bya'o// / 
166a1(rgyud): / mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs/ mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o// gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa/ sems kyis gdon par mi bya'o// gal te gnod pa byed sems na/ rnal 'byor sdom pa ring
166a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// gang zhig che dang phra ba yi/ gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yi// rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o// rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid// brdzun dang tshig rtsub phra ma dang / 'khyal pa'i ngag ni ring du spang // 
166a3(rgyud): gzhan gyi sems la gnod byas pas/ rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ de ni dang ling ga rab sbyor bas/ sbyor ba'i chos kyi snying po nyid// rmongs pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis/ de yi rab sbyor smod pa nyid// 
166a4(rgyud): legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni/ bde ba bskyed pa'ilus kyis ni/ sems can bde ba lhur lon pas/ theg pa che la legs par bslab/ gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i// 
166a5(rgyud): mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra/ sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing / rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do// rnal 'byor 'dod dga' ma yin zhing / rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o// phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor
166a6(rgyud): bas/ ta rang 'dod kyis ni bsten par bya/ bsten cing bsten pa'i rab sbyor bas// lha nyid tshim zhing bsgrub par bya/ sems can don gyi ngo bo yis/ sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed// 
166a7(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che/ 'di yi lam gyis bsten par bya/ gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas/ de dang der ni phan pas bde/ sems can sdom pa la sogs pas/ de yi sems ni gdon mi za/ 'khor bar
166a8(rgyud): skyes pa'i dus na ni/ thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan/ dngos po dngos po med byed dang / sems can don na a lir bsgyur/ phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya/ gsang ba'i gsang ba bcings pa yis/ de yi
166b1(rgyud): dbus su bdud rtsi ni/ skye zhing myu gu 'byung ba'o// mdab ma gsum dang kun ldan pa'i/ A li mchog ni mtha' med do// gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni/ phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid/ bdud rtsi yid 'ongs skal/ 
166b2(rgyud): ldan zhing // sems can la ni snyan par ston/ sangs rgyas lnga yi kun gyis lus/ bcom gser ltar 'bar ba'o// cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang / phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par sbas/ dgod dang sgeg pa'i
166b3(rgyud): nyams dang ni/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang / gnyis pa rdo rje zhags pa'o// g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang / gsum pa lcags sgrogs 'ching ba yi/ phyag bzhi po yi phyag rgya ni/ 
166b4(rgyud): gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang / lus dang kha doga'abar ba ru/ snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag/ ha yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni 8// yi ge mchog gi dga' bar byed/ ho yi rnam pas lus
166b5(rgyud): dang lus Na rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do// sems dang sems pa bsgoms pas ni/ lha nyid du ni yongs su grags// thams cadalus dang lus can gyi/ srog dang sems ni 'phrog
166b6(rgyud): pa'o// hI yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/ phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ oM gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro/ kun na sa sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o// a yi rnam pa des tshim byed/ blo dang ldan pas yongs su bsten/ 
166b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni// de yi shes bya rtogs pa'o// bdud rtsi gang gis myang ba yis/ bdud rtsi yi ni 'bras bu thob/ de bzhin gshegs dges lha mo ni/ gzugs mdzes mchog tu yid 'ong ba'o// 
166b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis/ phyag brgya bzhi pa bcing bar bya/ rnal 'byor pa ni sgrub 'dod na/ gnyis ni gnyis su med par sgom/ gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas/ ye shes ldan pas yongs su
167a1(rgyud): gsal nga rgyal chen pos bcings pa mi/ spros bI sems dang ldan pas bcings/ sgeg dang khro dang tshul gyis ni/ lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim/ nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ zla ba'i lag
167a2(rgyud): pas reg byas la/ de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni// lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim/ lto ba'i ye shes me yi lha/ de yi gnas su tshim par bya/ shes rab thabs la thim pa yis/ gnyis med sbyor bas tshim
167a3(rgyud): par bya/ oM ha ho hrIHa/ sa bon chen po'i sa bon mi/ 'di yis sa bon bsam par bya/ rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni/ sman gyi rgyur ni ma yin no// lha mo bkres dang sdug bsngal 'phrog/ sgeg cing snyan
167a4(rgyud): par smra ba dang / nga rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed/ brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas/ kun nas skal ldan lha mo ni/ rmongs byed 'jigs dang / 'gugs par byed/ yid mi gzhungs dang ngo tsha 'jigs// 
167a5(rgyud): lha mo snyan mas 'joms par byed/ de ltar yon tan lha mo ldam/ yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo// 'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phangs gnas/ gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam/ chu skyar ne cog tam dang ni/ 
167a6(rgyud): sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan pa'o// lha min brtson 'grus bdun pa ste/ dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o// lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las/ myur du sems ni 'phrog pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yi bdag nyid sems/ 'dod pa'i
167a7(rgyud): sems kyis rnam par byed/ ji ltar gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ 'bad pas thang ka sna tshogs dgram/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/ kun nas pho nya brgyud pa ni/ 
167a8(rgyud): bud med gzugs su de yi tshul/ phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o// gzugs mdzes yon tan ldan pa yi/ dung tshan la sogs lag pa na/ gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu/ sha lnga yin snod la/ 
167b1(rgyud): sogs/ bza' dang ston mos nye bar mdzes/ de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ me tog spos dang dri la sogs// gnyis med gtor mar yang dag ldan/ dang po re
167b2(rgyud): shig dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya la sogs bcings par bya// zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ rnam shes byed pa kun tu ldan// oM hi li hi li hUM phaT/ dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya yis// mchod pa'i las
167b3(rgyud): la rab tu sbyar/ oM oM mra ta kuN+Da ha ho hrIHa swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma'i lags pa'i gdan la ni/ zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la/ snying po'i stong dang phyag rgya yis/ rang 'dod las
167b4(rgyud): / ni rab tu byed/ 'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas//  sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las/ gnyis me8da ga tor ma'i las kyis so// me thab kha ra na gsum par
167b5(rgyud): nisnang byed shing ni ra ba sbar la// lha mo'i me tog rgyas pa ni/ sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar byas la// bdud rtsi'i chu dang kun nas bsre// gang gi ming nas yang dag bzung // brgyad brgya ru ni bsregs/ 
167b6(rgyud): byas nas/ nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o// me yi lha sogs thal ba dang / bdag nyid khu ba lan lnga ru/ bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na/ bdag nyid 'dod bzhin dbang du byed/ smyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang / 
167b7(rgyud): u dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa/ bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na/ myur du spro bar 'gyur ba'o// min pa la sogs rtse mo la/ mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ me tog bdug pa dri sogs dang // gnyis
167b8(rgyud): med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ arga dkar po'i rtsa ba las// 'ab pas me ni rab tu sbar/ pad mo zhib mo phye ma ni/ 'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis sku/ brgyad brgya ru sreg byas pa yi/ lhag ma'i thal
168a1(rgyud): ba bgos pa'o// tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba'i chus/ lan bdun bgos la grib mar bskum/ mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas// de yi thal ba bdud rtsi chus/ myur ba nyid du bgos pa ni/ kha ba kun pa'i
168a2(rgyud): ma ru/ lus ni rmongs pa'i gzugs dang ni/ shin tu rmongs shing rmongs pa'i dri/ po nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni/ stobs dang gzi brjid don med pa'o// rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la/ 'di yi las kyis
168a3(rgyud): rab tu sbyar/ rmongs pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ 'gro ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur/ 'di yis phye ma blangs byas la/ dza ti mar khu lan gsum spang / bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni/ thal ba lan gcig
168a4(rgyud): bsres byas nas// thig la lce'i yis myangs pa yis// pho nya brgyad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa/  spro zhing rgyags shing rgyags pa'o// spro byed shing ni yang
168a5(rgyud): dag blang / 'bad pas me ni rab sbar la/ me tog sbrang rtsi bdud da rtsir ldan// brgyad brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ de yi thal ba blangs nas ni/ rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya/ bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su
168a6(rgyud): ni/ thal ba de yis byugs byas nas/ chu yi mdog ni gzhan du dang / de yi ro ni gzhan du 'gyur/ sbrang rtsi 'o mar ldan pa yis// de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ de yi thal ba blangs byas la/ ku sum pa yi
168a7(rgyud): cha dang bsres/ bdud rtsi yi ni cha bdun dang / ma ru rtse yi cha brgyad ni/ mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni/ de yi thal ba blugs byas na/ gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni/ bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig/ gang dang
168a8(rgyud): gang gis lam gyis ni/ de dang de yi rmongs pa rnams/ sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir// rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya/ gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya/ rang gi 'dod 'di bsdus pa'o// sman dang
168b1(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor ba yang // shes rab dman la sogs pas dman/ gang na bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni// gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ dngos grub snying po btus pa ni/ de yi dngos po bsdus
168b2(rgyud): pa'o// sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni/ gzugs bstan rab tu sbyar bar bya/ mchog gi gzugs brnyan rab sbyar bas/ byin gyis brlabs kyis rim pas sgru ba/ zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ 
168b3(rgyud): bsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni/ gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams cad 'grub/ gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ sngon du ras kyi mtshan nyid dang / gnyis pa te la'i mtshan nyid dang / gsum pa kha dog
168b4(rgyud): rim pa dang / bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sregs nyid/ gleng dgazhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni/ mnyams 'char yang dag ldan/ steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa/ ras la zhi ba'i ri mo br-i/ ma lhung ba yi/ 
168b5(rgyud): yi dgas gos/ ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya/ tshon gyis ma pog cha la ne/ rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do// yi dgas mo yi dmar po'i ras/ ma lhung bar ni rab tu spyad/ tshon gyis ma phog rab
168b6(rgyud): sbyar ba/ dbang nyid du ni yongs su grag/ ra nag po yi lpags pa dang / ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la// gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las/ mngon spyod las kyi mtshan nyid do// de yi mnan pa'i
168b7(rgyud): gnas su ni/ thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya/ cha gsum du ni rab tu bgo/ gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya/ cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o// gsum pa gsungs pa'i thig nyid ni/ tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug
168b8(rgyud): pa ni/ cha lnga la ni bdun du'o// lus ni cha gsum nyid du 'dod / zhi dang yan lag mnyam pa'o// zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do// mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o// mgo dang skra la'ang de nyid do// rna ba nyid
169a1(rgyud): nyid kyang de yi tshad/ zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid/ dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do// smin ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i ltag/ mig ni sor gnyis pa yi tshad/ bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o// 
169a2(rgyud): de ni mig gi mtshan nyid do// mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni/ brang gi cha ni gnyis kyis mnan/ snying kha'i gnas dang lte bar ni/ mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o// nu ma'i mthar ni mnan bcas pa/ brang du
169a3(rgyud): nu ma gnyis mnan la// lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni/ lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o// sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni/ brla dang rje ngar kun tu ldan/ pus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o// rkang pa'i tshad kyang
169a4(rgyud): / de bzhin no// bcu gnyis ta la'i tshad kyis ni/ lha yi ra gzugs ni ri mor bri/ lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni/ lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o// dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni/ sor mo gnyis su
169a5(rgyud): bshad pa'o// dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ kun nas na bza'i 'od zer sogs/ rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni/ ta la bcu gnyis kyis ni tshad/ 'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang / nye bar
169a6(rgyud): mdzes sogs ri mo br-i/ steng gi lhag pa'i cha la ni/ rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o// las kyi mdog sogs mdog tu ni/ 'dod bzhin lnga nyid bsgrub par bya/ gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni/ bcu
169a7(rgyud): gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o// de yi ta la'i tshad la ni/ phyag gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni/ sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la/ zhi ba'i lha yi rnam pa'o// de yi ta las zhal bzhin bya/ gsus khyim che zhing
169a8(rgyud): che ba nyid kun nas tshigs dang tshigs nyid ni/ sor mo gnyis ni dor bar bya/ khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma/ bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni/ drag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/ ta la bcur
169b1(rgyud): ni bri ba'o// dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pa yis// mchod pa'i lha mo mngon par ldam/ ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni/ ta la'i steng du dor bar bya/ dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni/ rim dang rim bzhin
169b2(rgyud): sbyar bar bya/ dbus su mnga' bdag rdo rje'i lha/ cig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri/ mgrin bkos lto/ zhabs nyid ni/ de gsum ring na nyes skyon no// sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni/ skrod dang
169b3(rgyud): gnas ni brlag pa'o// shangs dang snyan dang sor mo ni/ de gsum thung ba'i nyes pa ni/ nges par dngos grub brlag pa dang / de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid/ rje ngar zhags dang khu ra tshos ni/ 
169b4(rgyud): de gsum sgom pa nyes pa che/ nges par sgrub po'i bdag nyid ni/ bdud dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo // 'gram pa brang dang rtsibs la sogs ni/ de gsum dma' na skyon che'o// yun mi
169b5(rgyud): ring ba myur du ni/ nor ni brlag par 'gyur ba'o// nu ma rna ba dpral ba ni/ de gsum yon skyon che'o// 'thab mo yi ni dgra 'tshe bar/ myur du sgrub pa po 'gyur ba'o// brang dang lus dang brla
169b6(rgyud): gnyis ni/ de gsum dma' na skyon che'o// dgras ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / 'chi bar yang ni the tsom med/ sna zhom mig ni yo ba dang / rna ba mchu dang dpral ba ni/ bgegs dang bdud dang sems
169b7(rgyud): 'jigs shing / dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/ gyen du lta ba'i dbugs dang ni/ gdan ni yo zhing tha dad pa/ brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni/ nyes skyon grangs ni med par grags/ 'od zer yo
169b8(rgyud): zhing tha dad dang / phyag brgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni/ mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar/ sgrub po'i gzugs brnyen nyes skyon no// rgyab yol gdugs dang gdan rnams ni/ rnam gsum dog
170a1(rgyud): pa'i nyes pa ni/ 'chi zhing dpal nyams brlag pa dang / mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o// de ltar nyes skyon skyon chen pos/ dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang // sems ni shin tu
170a2(rgyud): mnyam gzhag pas/ rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bstan/ sngags grub rgyu yi don dang ni/ dbang dang
170a3(rgyud): dgug pa yi ni lha/ zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i tshul/ drag la drag cing 'jigs su rung / dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ dgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / khro bo'i gzugs kyi tshul dang ni/ bran dang bran
170a4(rgyud): po'i rnam par sprul/ las kyis gnas dang gnas nyid ra du/ bdag nyid kyi ni kha dog bsgyur/ de ltar mtshan nyid mtshan pa yi/ dang / sa grub myur du rdzogs pa dang // rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa
170a5(rgyud): las sngags pas thang ka'i ri mo bre/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ sa bo d+ha ni bi shuh+ma na maHsarba b+ha ga ha re nan+ta hU hU hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags pa yis ni sngags 'di yis/ ras dang skud pa
170a6(rgyud): bkru ba'o// thams cad las kyi sngags kyis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs/ gzugs brnyen so sor rab sbyor bas/ sgrub pos thang ka bsgrub par bya/ gzugs brnyan 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ 
170a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o// ye dgas kyi ni gos blangs la/ gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi/ nan tan gyis ni thang ka brgyad// thig skud kyis ni ri mo bya// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ zla ba'i
170a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ phyag gnyis pa la thang ka mdzes/ rdo rje cod pan thon ka'i rtse/ sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ rgyan nam
170b1(rgyud): kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang / rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing / snying khar gnon pa mchog tu brtson/ g.yon pa dril bu mngon ldan pas/ rked pa'i mtshams su rnam par
170b2(rgyud): gnan/ btso ma gser gyi kha dog dang / sgeg cing shin tu bzhad pa'i zhal/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor la bsten par/ khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro/ dkar dang zla ba kun da'i mdog/ lha mo gsang ba'i snod
170b3(rgyud): mdzad cing / rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar/ phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud/ tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ myos pas khro ba mchog gi ste/ rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/ chags
170b4(rgyud): pa'i gos dkar bsnams pa nyid/ baspu nas ni rdo rje 'phro / gdug dkar po yos mngon g.yogs pa'i/ 'di ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ pad+ma'i lus can rdo rje 'dzin/ rdo rje shar gyi cha ru
170b5(rgyud): ni/ mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni/ gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o// gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di/ rin chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ 
170b6(rgyud): phyag na gtor ma'i snod sogs pa// phyogs kyi mdog tu gtso bar bya/ dngos grub kun ster lha mo na~M/ lus ngan gyis ni sring mo'o// phyag 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni/ lha mo sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje
170b7(rgyud): byang gi cha la ni/ lha mo snyan par spro ba ni/ de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgya la// pad+ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin/ snyan pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog/ bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ rgyan rnams
170b8(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyi lta ba ru/ mkhas pa yis ni bri bar bya/ ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/ lha mo snyan pa'i dbang phyug ma/ btsom gser
171a1(rgyud): / gyi mdog dang ni/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i/ lha mo gzhon nu grub pa ni/ lcags kyu lnga sogs sdod kyis ni// gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyam
171a2(rgyud): rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni// 'byung mo'i ming ni ska rag can// sku mdog sngon mo gzugs mdzes pa'i// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyam// bdud rtsi'i bum pa phyag gnyis na// gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang // gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid/ dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ thams cad kun la gzugs / 
171a3(rgyud): pal rnam par brtags te bor bri rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang / dbang ldan la sogs rim par sbyar/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / phrag ni phyag tu mtshan ma chogs de ste rdo rje dang blag la/ rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya// lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ 
171a4(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya gtor ma'i mchod// oM sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hUM// nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ nyi ma'i lags pa rab brgya rang nas// ye shes kyi sa ni pad+ma mnan/ dam tshig sngags
171a5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'o// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// yinalegs drug tu bsrung bar bya/ ye shes khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ dkar po dang ni sa gdugs sgreng / 'khyil par se gdug
171a6(rgyud): 'khyud byas la/ dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // oM badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcings la/ dkar po dang ni gi wang spel/ zhags pa'i dam tshigs phyag rgya yaM/ kun nas lha mo bzhugs
171a7(rgyud): pa ri ldan/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM// phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags sgrog gis/ lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya/ khu ra de nyid dam bcings
171a8(rgyud): nas/ rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan/ sa gdugs pad+ma spel byas la/ kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o// spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan pas/ sor mo gnyis ka sgreng byas la/ zla ba nyi mar bzhugs
171b1(rgyud): byas la/ snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// oM su ra ta badz+ra hU dza/ khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la/ nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar la/ shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo na/ snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM shri ya/ 
171b2(rgyud): bo ti hUM phu swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings te/ ye shes dang ni rnam shes sgreng / oM su tri ye hUM pu swA hA/ byang gi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings
171b3(rgyud): nas/ dkar po dang ni ge wang sgreng / oM su ru su ru ma du re hUM pu swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas// sa gdugs pad+ma'i kha sbyin bya/ 
171b4(rgyud): oM pri ye me kha lA hUM pu swA hA// lho phyogs lha mo rgyal dbang gis/ snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gnyis med cho ga'i sngags kyis ni/ mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ bdug pa me togs
171b5(rgyud): sogs glu dang // mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shus mchod/ 'dod dang thar pa pa dge ba'i gnas/ las rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa/ rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba/ rnal 'byor sngags kyis sgrub par byed/ 
171b6(rgyud): de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ khro bo gnod byed khro mo na/ dbye ba rnam gsum sku rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag bzhi/ khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro/ 'jigs pa theg pa rnam pa gsum/ lha mo'i lnga
171b7(rgyud): bas 'jigs par byed/ bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing / bdud dang gdug paskems pa dang / gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang / 'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang smrab/ tshangs pa mnan cing nyed pa
171b8(rgyud): dang rnga tsa muN+Di ni drag pos 'gugs/ 'jigs byed kun nas sgrub pa yang / mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ re shig dang po bris pa'i sku/ mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ bye ba bcu
172a1(rgyud): / bzhi'i tshogs dang ni/ sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa/ lha mo dka' bzlogs gdan du ni/ rgyab tu kun nas rnam par mnan/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam
172a2(rgyud): par sprul/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i zhal/ rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la ni/ tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnam/ spyan gsum khro lang rgyal can/ dmar zhing
172a3(rgyud): dmar ba'i spyan dang ldan/ 'khyil zhing rnam par dgyes pa yi/ dbu skra dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ rus pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no// bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yi// 
172a4(rgyud): klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ shin tu dgod cing mche ba gtsigs/ zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa'o// glang chen lpags pa bsnams pa'o// me yi lpags pa rab tu gsol/ 
172a5(rgyud): / rkyen brgyad kyi ni gnas nyid du// dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o// sangs rgyas mgror po'i phreng ba dang / mche ba rno zhing sor mo 'ab8/ steng gi phyogs su mnga' dang ni/ gnyis pa la ni
172a6(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga/ gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba'o// g.yas pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o// gsum pa bzhu dang kun nas ldan/ rgan byed drag mo 'jigs su rung / zhags pas
172a7(rgyud): bcings shing rnam par rgyan/ drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs/ khrag 'dzag pa dang brgyal ba ni/ so sor dbus su rgyan pa yi/ so so'i pho nya rab tu sgrub/ chen bdun gyis ni gos pa yi/ rgyun mi
172a8(rgyud): 'chang par rtag tu spro/ khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i lus/ 'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can/ mi yi keng rus keng rus dang / gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag
172b1(rgyud): drag cing shin tu drag pa 'dul/ bdud rnams thams cad gnod mdzad pa/ shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas/ thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// khro bo'i gaH
172b2(rgyud): la sogs pa ba stan/ khra dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang / lce spyang srin po khyi la sogs/ 'jigs pa'i ku co rab sgrogs dang / mi yi keng rus kyis bkang ba'i/ de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas/ 'dod
172b3(rgyud): / dang thar pa don gnyer dang / thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'i/ sngags pas gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya/ oM ta hUM ma tha ma tha duSh+TAn g+hA ta ya hUM phaT swA hA/ ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis/ 
172b4(rgyud): las rnams kun nas rab tu byed/ spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun ldan pas/ dpa' bo mchod sogs yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis/ 
172b5(rgyud): cho ga'i yan yalag sbyin sreg las/ gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid/ ma rtags pa yi sha dang ni/ khrag gis kyang ni de nyid las / gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ de yi rnam pas
172b6(rgyud): tshim par bya/ oM bi dr-i d+he na ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni/ rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ dkar po gi wang spel byas nas/ sa yi gdugs dang pad+ma sbrel/ de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang / sngags
172b7(rgyud): de nyid ni rnam par sbyang / pur bu ra ba tsa ngam dang / dra ba go cha mtshon cha rnams/ las kyi gnas su dgod pa ni/ phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu grags/ phyag rgya 'di nyid snying khar btsang / ye shes dang ni rnam/ 
172b8(rgyud): shes sbyar/ oM kro d+ha ni hU~M a/ snying po mchog gi sa bon dang / phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya/ lus dang srog la ltos med par/ chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// drag cing rno ba'i lha mo ni/ 
173a1(rgyud): rno ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni/ thabs gcig gis ni mtshan nyid do// chu yi 'gram gyis phyogs su// sngon du bstan pa la sogs bya/ 'bum phrag lnga
173a2(rgyud): ni bzlas pa dang / phyis ni 'bum phrag gi cig gis so zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni// me yi las la sogs pa byas// nag po ra yi sha dang ni/ khrag dang rnam par bsres nas ni// bris sku la sogs gzugs
173a3(rgyud): brnyan mdun/ rdzogs pa'i cho gas sbyin sregs bya/ gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag dang / mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub// 
173a4(rgyud): dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis/ bum pa rgya cher mchod pa yi ra sa/ nad kyi yan lag gzir ba la/ sngon du dbang bskur byin nas/ nad kun dang ni bral ba dang / de bzhin gzar yis gnod
173a5(rgyud): pa nyid/ skal pa dman dang mi byams pas/ thams ca zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ ser po'i mtshon dang sbrul tshil las/ log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid/ mnyam pa'i gdan la thal
173a6(rgyud): mo sbyar phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par sbas// mche ba gtsigs pas yan lag rgyas/ pad+ma'i snod la gnas pa ni/ rtse gsum dang ni bza' ba'i snod/ dgra sta la pug phyag na'o// sor mo bzhi yis tshad du
173a7(rgyud): nirgyun kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ 'khrul 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya/ gro kha 'am ni shing shun la/ gi wang dang ni gur gum gyis/ sgrub pa po yi gzugs/ 
173a8(rgyud): brnyen bri/ gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa/ snying khar ming ni bri bar bya/ g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa/ lcags kyu kun nas ldan pa dang / dpral bar drangs nas bzhag par bya/ bgegs kyi
173b1(rgyud): dbang po yi ni gdan/ snying khar mnan nas bzhag par bya/ me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod// nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las/ don 'dod 'bras bu don gnyer ba'i/ rnal 'byor pas ni sngags
173b2(rgyud): yig bzlas/ oM traM tha tha tha hUM dza swA hA/ me tog dkar po la bzlas shing / re re zhing ni brdeg par bya/ brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na/ 'grub par 'di la the tsom med/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyor ba yi/ 
173b3(rgyud): sgrub pa po yi yid g.yo zhing // myur du 'gugs shing lon pa'o// rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs/ rgyal po dang ni rgyal tsha ba dang / phyug po'i byis pa la sogs dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag nyid
173b4(rgyud): lus sha ci dang ni brgya byin sogs/ gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis/ sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur/ ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar/ dus rtag tu ni rnam par 'dud/ nga rgyal yan lag gtso bo
173b5(rgyud): bas nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ khro bo'i lus ni bstan pa yis// las dang las ni myur du 'grub/ khro bo'i lus rna rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 
173b6(rgyud): spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa/ brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// / ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas/ spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ mi zad 'khor
173b7(rgyud): ba 'jigs pa ni/ chags pas srid par ltung ba'o// chags pa spangs pa'i lus kyis ni/ rgyun du btul zhugs yang bzung ngo / dben par shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ dngos po thams cad
173b8(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa'o// chags pas srid par ltung ba dang / zhan pas 'khor bar 'jug par byed/ rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring du spangs/ sems can don du chos bstan phyir/ sems can don byed/ 
174a1(rgyud): gyur pas kyang / brtul zhugs dka' thub mi zad pas/ dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ chags pa'i nyes pa rgya mtshor 'khor/ bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir/ 
174a2(rgyud): sems can don blo 'ba' zhig go/ sems can don 'gyur dus su ni/ spyod dang sdom pa'i sngon bzhin no// 'du 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni/ dga' ba ru ni lus srung ngo // dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas// / 
174a3(rgyud): bstan bcos tshigs rnams blangs byas nas/ sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ rab tu rno bas chos spyod do// gnas dang gnas la'ang mi gnas pa'i/ nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo // bza' dang bza'
174a4(rgyud): min par rtog pa'i// dman sogs nges par mi bya'o// rang 'bad pas rtag tu dga' ba yis/ lham mkhan nya pa shan pa dang / bram ze/ dmangs rigs rgyal rigs rnams// mnyam pa'i sems
174a5(rgyud): kyi lam gyis ni/ rtag tu slongs mo bslang bar bya// gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe/ gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang / mal charas dang mchil lham yang / longs spyod longs spyod yid
174a6(rgyud): 'ong ba'ibartul zhugs la gnas tsam gyis ni/ rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ spyod pa spyod dgur rnal 'byor pas/ bsod nams lag tu blang bar bya/ thams cad bslangs kyang nyes med de// 
174a7(rgyud): dngos po yang ni mi bzung ngo // sems ni rnam par dag pa yi/ thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid/ dag cing gus bcas nga rgyal gyis// de yis gnas ni yongs su spang / dad pas dkyil 'khor
174a8(rgyud): 'dri ba dang / yang na gtor ma'i las la ni/ bsam pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni/ de yi gnas su dbul bar bya/ chos gos gsum gyi lhag ma ni/ slar yang gus pa yis ni bzung // spyi bor ngur smrig
174b1(rgyud): mtshan ma dang / sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / snying po'i tshem ber chos gos gsum/ steng du rdo rje dbyug pa dang / lhung bzed mtshan khung chu tshags bcas/ de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni/ 
174b2(rgyud): glegs bam la sogs gzhan yang med/ grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin/ sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / chos don rtsa ba snying rje nyid/ de nas bslab par
174b3(rgyud): bya ba ni/ bla ma'i tshig gi sdom pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes rdzu 'phrul che/ mchog la skyabs dang skyabs su mchi/ rdo rje dbang phyug mchog gis lus/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/ lha mo shes rab
174b4(rgyud): sbyor rang bzhin/ mkha' 'gro lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mu ka sa ma yo haM sa ma ya/ oM mu ka sa ma yo/ oM a mu kaM sa ma yo haM sa da ma ya/ oM badz+ra badz+ra/ ma hA badz+ra badz+ra/ kA ya su pa ra/ 
174b5(rgyud): haM hi hi/ ho ho da/ hUM na ni pa ta daM/ 'di yis slob ma rab tu bzung / brtul zhugs rdo rje rdo rje cam/ gnyis pa'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/ sbyor dang gsang ba'i sngags rigs pas/ thams cad dus
174b6(rgyud): dang dus nyid du/ tshogs bcad gnyis ni brjod par bya/ gang zhig pa dang gang zhig ma/ gang zhig mdza' ba'ang mi rtag pa'o// sangs rgyas lus ni sgyu ma nyid/ rtag tu chos kyis yongs su skyob// 
174b7(rgyud): kye ma stong pa nyid kyis mthus/ dngos kun rnam par mnan pa'o// sangs rgyas 'bras bu rab ster ba'i// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ rmongs pa bcad pa'i don du ni/ dus gsum du ni tshogs
174b8(rgyud): bcad brjod/ 'chag dang nyal dang 'gro ba dang / 'dug dang 'gro ba thams cad du/ sngags kyi sbyor ba brtan byas nas/ sems dang sems kyi nyal bar bya/ bskyed dang skye bar brgyud pa yi/ 'byung ba
175a1(rgyud): / lnga yi lus kyi sdig/ nyin mtshan gnyis kyi spyod pa yis/ lus kyi dri ma dag pa nyid/ zla ba drug tu spyad byas pas/ rang 'dod lha ni 'grub pa'o// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ 
175a2(rgyud): mi shes pas kyang ye shes 'thob/ de ltar yon tan rang bzhin zhing / brtul zhugs spyod pa yi ni rgyu/ brtul zhugs sbyor ba sbyor ba yis/ thams cad rmongs pa rnam par spangs/ thabs kyi mtshan nyid
175a3(rgyud): mtshon pa yis/ mnyam nyid lta ba rdzogs byas nas// rnam dag lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ kun nas stong pa mnyam pa'o ros/ dngos po kun gyi mtshan nyid med/ kun nas stong pa nyid kyi mthar// 
175a4(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa ji lta bur// rmongs pas brtags shing /  rnam brtags pa'i/ dag pa'i sems dang sems dpar bcas// rmongasapa nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i lus/ 'dod pa khro bo'i bzhi de ni// / 
175a5(rgyud): rno ba'i sems kyi rmongs pa ni/ ye shes ldan pa'i lu sa kyi dbye/ snum pa'i bza' dang 'jam pa'i gos/ sna tshogs dbang po sa reg pa yis/ gti mug chags pas go bzlog pas/ 
175a6(rgyud): srid par ltung ba'i las su 'gyur// las ni bya ba'i dbang por 'gyur// rmongs pa ye shes mi rtag pa'o// 'dod dang khro dang nga rgyal 'joms/ srid par 'ching ba'i bza' ba'o// 'byung po
175a7(rgyud): 'byung la rtse ba dang / kun nas sdig pa mi brtag go/ mgon med sdug bsngal phongs pa la// nor bas madrar med gyur pa bzhin/ 'jig rten 'dir ni rma 'bebs dang / mtshang 'dru ba ni mchog tu
175a8(rgyud): gtso theg pa che la legs bslabs pas/ ngan 'gro'i dngos por yang ma yin/ kun nas bza' dang legs bza' bas/ yang dag dga' bas lus srung ngo // brnyings pa'i bza' ston ngan pa
175b1(rgyud): yis/ nges par bdag nyid dga' bar bya/ sngon gyi bslab sogs bslabs pa dang / sngon du thams cad bsdams pa nyid/ brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/ mnar med dmigs pa/ 
175b2(rgyud): med pa'o// sngon gyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis/ sngon du bslab sogs bslab par bya/ brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/ bslab pa gus pas bslab par bya/ bud med 'jigs
175b3(rgyud): gzugs drag mo nyid/ sgra ni 'dzings shing 'khyil ba dang / ngur smrig dmar po 'jom pa nyid/ phra mo'i rdul gyis 'jam pa bgo/ mi yi rus pas byas pa yang / bud med rgyan du rnam
175b4(rgyud): par brgya na/ brnyings pa'i tshe ma ber dmar po ni// mi yi lpags pas g.yog par bya/ snod chen po ni gnyis pa ru/ gzung la dbang po ldan bzung / steng du rdo rje'i dbyug pa na/ 
175b5(rgyud): mi yan lag rus pas brgyan/ ba dan dril bu phreng ba ni/ dbyug pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung / de ltar bsdus pa'i lus kyis rma/ 'bad pas brtul zhugs spyad par bya/ 'di ltar rdzas
175b6(rgyud): sogs dngos po ni/ me bzhin 'bar bas reg mi bya/ bza' dang btung ba la sogs gzhan/ dang po bsdu bar yang mi bya/ snying rjer phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ kun nas dga' zhing bza' bar bya/ 
175b7(rgyud): thams cad gnod pa don med pas/ dngos po kun nas yongs su spang // lus ni srung ba tsam gyis ni/ slong mo'i bza' ba bslang bar bya/ stong pa'i khyim dang dur khrod dang / bas mtha' dang ni dgon
175b8(rgyud): bar gnas/ mtshan mo kun nas bgrod par bya/ bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog tu brtson/ 'chag dang nyal dang 'dug pa 'am/ shel gyi rnam pa'i sems dang ni/ rang bzhin yongs su dag pa
176a1(rgyud): nyid/ bzlas dang bsam gtan 'ba' zhig go/ de yis thams cad 'grub 'gyur bar/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa nyid/ sdig spangs rnam par spyod pa yis/ 'khor brla
176a2(rgyud): na mi gnas pa'o// thams cad dngos po dngos med par// rtag tu sems kyis lta ba nyid/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru ni/ de nas tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod/ sbyin pa chos kyis srung bar ni// / 
176a3(rgyud): tshigs bcad gcig gis gnang bar bya// e ma'o rmongs pa yi ni mthus/ lus can kun nas dbang du byas// 'dod sogs chos sogs mi bzad pas// mkhas pa yis ni yongs su spangs// dngos med
176a4(rgyud): dngos po yang ma yin/ gzung dang 'dzin pa mi rtog pas/ 8/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal zhing / dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba 'thob// gzhan gyis brtags pa'i longs spyod sogs/ nyale dang
176a5(rgyud): 'chag par dus gsum du/ rnal 'byor tshigs bcad gcig gis ni/ rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod byed pa'o// sems chen po yi sems kyi ni/ brnyings pa'i ras ni bsags pa yi// 
176a6(rgyud): de yi gos su rab tu bgos/ keng rus kyi ni yan lag kun/ shin tu mdzen pa'i dbyig pa bzung / pa Ta ha yi chos kyis brdung / rdo rje'i glu ni blang ba nyid/ sems can sgrol ba'i rgyu dang ni/ grong nas grong du
176a7(rgyud): kun tu rgyu/ dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam par bzhag/ dag pa'i sems ni mi dmigs pas// dga' ba yis ni bsrung bar bya// spyod pa yis ni rgyur gyur
176a8(rgyud): pas/ rnal 'byor spyod pa don gyi rgyu/ sdig pa thams cad rnam gsal zhing / nyes pa kun nas rnam spangs la/ brtul zhugs zla drug spyad pa yis/ rang 'dod ye shes 'grub par 'gyur// 
176b1(rgyud): brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rnam par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// de nas thams cad snying po ni/ de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa/ 'khor bar brtan dang g.yo ba
176b2(rgyud): nga'i kun gyi snying por rab sbyor ba'o// dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas/ yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ rdo rje 'am shes rab rnal 'byor gyis
176b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas nas// phyis ni rang 'dod pa yi las// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med/ spra tshil la ni gzugs brten bya/ tsha ba'i mar khus byug byas la/ snying khar ming ni bzhag
176b4(rgyud): ba dang tshigs dang tshigs su tsherams dgang / skyur po datshwa dang ma ru tsir/ gzugs brten dang ni yang dag ldan/ snod du bsres la/ yang dag bzhag/ ye shes lus la lus kyi ni/ 
176b5(rgyud): rkang pa yas pas mnan par bya/ rno ba'i sems kyis bzlas byas pas/ mtshan mo gcig gi mtha' ru ni/ 'grub par 'di la the tsom medasmin pa'i me la bzhag byas na/ rgyal po myur du gdung
176b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la/ las 'di yis ni sbyar bar bya/ hrIHa mo g+ha sa sid ha da ha gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hrIHphaT/ snga dro nyi ma shar dus la/ me tog dkar po'i maiN+Da laM dang / 
176b7(rgyud): spos dang mar me'i cho ga yis/ zhi ba'i las ni rnam par bya/ chu dang 'o ma bsres pa'i snod // der ni gtor ma sbyar nas naM/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ rgyal po nad dang bral bar 'gyur// 
176b8(rgyud): oM a mr-i taM ba ra de hUM hUM hUM a a a/ thams cad las ni bsdus byas la/ chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskur/ rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// 
177a1(rgyud): de nas rab sbyor snying po 'di/ sngags pas rab tu rnam par spyad/ yungs kar las ni gzugs brnyan bya/ snying khar ming ni rnam par sbyar/ rdo dang tsher ma lte bar ro// rkang pas mnan
177a2(rgyud): cing bzlas par bya/ su tI k+ShiM shU la hUM dza phaT hrI/ me la bsro zhing gdung ba dang / lhag par bzlas shing bzhag par bya/ 'di ltar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// mod la gzer bas yang
177a3(rgyud): 'dzin to// zhi ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las/ 'i ma dang ni sbrang rtsis bkru/ chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na/ gzir zhing gzer ba'i nad dang bral/ oM sarba ka ri hUM dza swA hA/ gzer ba rab tu zhi bar byed
177a4(rgyud): pa'i sngags so// de nas thams cad snying po yis//  gzhan gyi las kyis mtshan nyid ni/ sngon du bsnyen sogs bsten byas pa ras/ las kun 'grub par 'gyur ba'o// nag po'i mtha'
177a5(rgyud): dang tha ma la/ bskam gyi ni lci ba las// bsgrub bya yini ming dang gzugs// dmar po'i tsan dan gyis ni sku/ bsgrub bya'i ming ni kun nas bzhag/ seng ldeng phur pas mig 'bras la// 
177a6(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas shing / me la bdug cing bdug pa yis/ mig ni gzer bas 'dzin par 'gyur/ oM tsa k+Shu ma li ni hU~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags
177a7(rgyud): kyis ni/ 'grub par 'di la the tsom med/ zhi ba'i mchod pas mchod byas nas/ oM badz+ra tIk+ShA ya hUM swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas/ de yi'i rgyun la bkrus na/ bsgrub bya'i nang
177a8(rgyud): dang gnod pa sel/ mig 'bras rno zhing gsal bar 'gyur/ mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// lhang tshor las ni bsgrub par bya/ mkhas pas khrag gis bri ba'o// dug dang dur
177b1(rgyud): khrod sol ba yis/ mig gi 'bras bu byugs byas la/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ brgyad rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o// oM kr-iSh+Na paM ga li hUM khaM phaT/ 'di yis sngag dang sngags kyis
177b2(rgyud): ni/ bdag nyid lci bas bran par bya// de ltar mtshan nyid kun ldan pas// bsgrub bya myur du long bar 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsku byas nas/ bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/ brgya rtsa
177b3(rgyud): brgyad du mngon par bzlas/ oM a mr-i ta lo tsa ne a swA hA/ long ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa pos/ las ni shin tu rnam par spyad/ dkon mchog gsum
177b4(rgyud): la gnod byed pa/ sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// bag zan las ni pad ma'i dbyibs/ bsgrub bya'i ma ni dbus denyid du'o// khye ya~M swA yis bug pa dgang / tsha ba'i
177b5(rgyud): mar khus bskus byas la/ g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ oM badz+ra ba ke hUM pU phaT/ me la sri zhing bsgos pa yis/ b+ha ga myur du bzlog
177b6(rgyud): par bya/ shin tu gdug pa'i chung ma ni/ 'di yis las kyis rab tu sbyar/ lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags nas/ sbrang rtso 'o ma'i rgyun gyis bkru/ oM su ko b+ha bi hUM he swA hA/ zhi bar byed pa'i
177b7(rgyud): sngags so// 'ji ba'i snod ni blangs byas la/ pad+ma'i dbyibs kyi rnam par bya/ rno ba'i til mar yungs kar gyis// bug pa dgang zhing sbyar bar bya/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ seng ldeng
177b8(rgyud): pubur pas brdung bya zhing / sngags ni brgyad brgya rab bzlas na/ b+ha ga gzir zhing gzir bar 'gyur/ hri pi la ta hUM phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid do// 
178a1(rgyud): chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing / sngags dang mngon du sbyar bar bya/ oM sarba sho d+ha nI swA hA/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo// gzhan yang
178a2(rgyud): las kyi mtshan nyid ni/ shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyod do// rgyal po lam gyis rdul blang // yang na bzhin mdo'i sa rdul las/ pad ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni/ b+ha ga'i snying po khrag dang ni/ yi dgas
178a3(rgyud): phyag rgya phyag rgya yi/ brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas/ hri pri phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ pad ma sdom pa'i las su 'gyur/ oM a mri ta wa ti swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod
178a4(rgyud): pa dang / bla ma dang ni slob dpon spod/ dam tshig spyod la/ 'phya ba ni/ sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// gal te rmongs shing khro ba ni/ las kyi rtag tu byas nas ni/ 'dis ni nges par ltung ba ru/ 
178a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis gsungs the tsom med/ las kyi sa rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don/ snying po'i mchog
178a6(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa/ rol mo bstan bcos sogs glu yi/ de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas/ gnyis med dngos po'i ngo bo las/ gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ gnyis kyi dngos po bdag min pas// 
178a7(rgyud): gnyis dngos dngos po med pa'o// dngos po dngos min dngos med la/ mnyam nyid lta ba'i sems kyis su/ rnam par rten dang brten bya med/ rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs
178a8(rgyud): can zad par bye ba/ rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ sems kyis brtan pa'i gnas su ni/ bsam gtan bsam bya bsam par bya/ dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// thams cad dbyings
178b1(rgyud): su 'jigs par byed// stong nyid stong la sogs stong pa'i/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid/ dag cing bral phra ba'i don/ sems dang sems pa dang bcas pas/ kun tu dngos po dngos med pas// 
178b2(rgyud): thams cad nam mkha' bsdams pa'o// rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i don/ nam mkha'i khams ltar bstan pa sems pas/ me stag rdul phran yan lag 'phro// chu skyar bzhin du brtag pa yi// 
178b3(rgyud): rnam shes ye shes lhag ma ni/ nam mkhar 'phro zhing snang ba'o// nyon mongs de bzhin du mun pa ni/ ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas su/ rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bor// ye shes snang ba sogs
178b4(rgyud): thob 'gyur/ sems dang sems byung sems pa yi ngas/ rnam par lta zhing rab tu spya pa/ 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ thams cad kun tu
178b5(rgyud): snang byed cing / thams cad 'od zer kun bsdus pa/ snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni/ dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ a li ka li rab sbyor bas/ phyung ba yin sa bon mchog/ sbyor ba 'grub/ 
178b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyu ru ni/ mnyam nyid rnal 'byor pa yI sgom/ sa bon nam mkha' spros pa yis 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byas/ ma lus smin ltar spro ba nyid/ skad cig gis ni spro zhing bsdu/ phyis ni rang
178b7(rgyud): 'dod dmigs med cing / yi ge med pas yang bsam mo// gzugs ni stong par brtags pa yi/ mnyam nyid sems dang sems kyis ni/ ma lus rnam par bltas pa yis/ khams gsum
178b8(rgyud): snang bar byed pa'o// de ltar sems kyis bsams pa yis/ byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ skad cig gzugs dang gzugs nyid dang / skad cig phung po'i rnam par dang // skad cig/ 
179a1(rgyud): thams cad dbyibs rnams ni/ de phyir mi rtag pa yi gnas/ legs byas nyes byas med can ni/ nyes nyes pas smad par mi bya'o// gzugs dang stong pa la/ sogs dbus/ 
179a2(rgyud): sems dang sems byung rnam par mtshon// dngos po'i lhag ma dngos med pas// de yi lhag ma gzugs med pa'o// ye shes ri mo 'bar ba yis// 'od gzer mnyam par gnas pa nyid// 
179a3(rgyud): de yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/ rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyad// rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gis las/ yang dag byang chub rtag pa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas/ 
179a4(rgyud): ni sngon du bsnyen pa rab brtsams nas/ las dang don kun rab grub pa'o// ri rab rtse mor kun bsams pa/ rang 'dod rgyal chen 8 gzhal yas khang / sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin mchog
179a5(rgyud): dril bu dra bas mngon par brgyan/ gdugs dkar po dang ba dan dang / sna tshogs mchod pas mngon par brgyan/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ dkar dang kun da zla ba'i 'od/ 
179a6(rgyud): de ni rgyan kun gyis brgyan cing / sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par chas/ rab tu mdzes pa'i gos bsnams shing / phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dril/ 'od zer 'phro ba rnam mang po/ kun nas rdo rje'i 'od zer
179a7(rgyud): 'phro/ khams gsum pa yi rnam pa ni/ sems dang sems kyis sgom pa'o// snying khar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ dmar po'i hUM ni rab 'bar ba/ spyi bor thig le me ri'o// ba spu'i bu gnas/ 
179a8(rgyud): 'phro ba'o// rta shar du rdo rje bzhag pa dang / lho ru mda' ni rnam par dgod/ nub tu ral gri mtshon pa dang / byang du gzhu ni yang dag ldan/ rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs bzhi/ mtshams dang mtshams
179b1(rgyud): su bzhag par bya/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid sngon ldan pas/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom/ a li'i sa bon gtso mo ni/ de nyid ldan pas yang sngags bzlas/ phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar/ 
179b2(rgyud): bzhag pa/ 'bum phrag gsum du rab bsnyen pas/ rdo rje'i lus dang lus nyid ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ sbas pa'i snying po snying po dang / rdo rje chos dang chos mchog ga/ 
179b3(rgyud): sems ni rjes mchod pa'i// hUM gau glA yi rnam pas bya/ bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis/ mnyam par gzhag pas blang bar bya/ tri b+hu ban dza li ta mUrti a nu ra ya na wa ti/ rasmi saM ha sra tIk+Sha d+ha sa su par
179b4(rgyud): su pa ra sra wa ti/ ba hU bi da rU pa pau sha a nu ra yan ta data ta wa ti/ na ta e badz+ras par be sar li la wa ti swA hA/ gdan bzhi'i rgyud ni rgya chen las/ stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor
179b5(rgyud): bsdus pa/ de yi dngos po mdor bsdus las/ snying po mdor ni bsdus pa'o// sdeb sbyor sla dang rtog sogs med/ don dang don ni yA dag bsdus/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i don na sbas pa nyid// 
179b6(rgyud): brda' yi skad kyis bshad pa'o// gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par btus pa sngags kyi cha'i rgyud bshad sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 
179b7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos lngas btsas kyis sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad duSh+Na shI tsa tu ra pI tha ma hA yo ga nI gu h+ya sarba tan+ta ra dza/ 
179b8(rgyud): bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid/ de bzhin rnam
180a1(rgyud): 'byor mchog nyid dang / drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang / rnal 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde/ gnas gtsang man bzhugs nas su/ thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ 
180a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ gsang basbyor ba'i khyad par dang / bdag nyid de nyid ji ltar lnga/ 
180a3(rgyud): chu dang me ni ji ltar lags/ ji ltar rab mdzes nam mkha' dang / ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba/ ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ 'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag/ nyon cig dpal ldan
180a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang / dang por dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / gnyis par yi ge gcig dang ni/ gsum pa sa bon brgyad pa dang / bzhi par tsa yi lha nyid do/ bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me// blo ldan nal
180a5(rgyud): 'byor pas shes bya/ lto ba me yi thab khung du/ de yi me le sbyin bsreg bya/ steng dang 'og dang dbusu ni/ rnam shes rtsa ni bsdam par bya// thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru/ me yi rtsa ra yi lha
180a6(rgyud): ni rnam par sgom/ lto ba'i me ni 'bar ba la/ khyad par kha dog sgom pa ni/ lte ba'i me ni dkar po'o// g.yon pa'i me ni de bzhin ser/ lho ni sngon po'i ming can te/ lhag ma 'di ni dmar por bya/ de
180a7(rgyud): dbus kha dog sngo bsangs su/ me yi du bar rab tu grags/ me yi dbus su pad ma nyid/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ de yi dbus su ye shes lha/ 'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad// 
180a8(rgyud): phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni/ rdo rje dril bus rnam par brgyan/ g.yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang / rgyad rnams thon ka'i rtse mo can/ bzhad dang khro bas hUM sgrogs shing / 'di yi ye shes dbang phyug
180b1(rgyud): lnga de yi dbus su rab tu grags/ shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang / byang du de bzhin gos dkar mo/ nub tu lha mo mA ma gi/ sangs rgyas yul ni lho ru'o// gzugs ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam du// bdag
180b2(rgyud): nyid lha yi lha nyid do// lce la chu ni sbyar bar bya/ nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o// mig las 'di rnam par shes// de bzhin tshangs par 'bar ba'i me/ g.yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid// thams
180b3(rgyud): cad nyon mongs drang dang ni/ phyugs gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni/ 'dra nyid lnga ni shes par bya/ rnam shes rtsa nas drangs pa yi/ de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi dgu// sde
180b4(rgyud): gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa/ kun tu tshwa bzhin zhu ltar ba bus// ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming / lce yi steng du bsten pa yi/ nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yi// 'khor lo phra rab rdul bzhin no// steng gi
180b5(rgyud): namakha' na mkha' ni// sreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni tham// ga yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid/ g.yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o// 'og dang ste/ nga ni 'di yi rtsa/ 'og na sngon du rab grags pa// dbugs dang
180b6(rgyud): dri ni mnyam drangs nas/ rgyas pa yi lnga yi stang du/ rnam shes gnyis kyi rtsa nas drang / bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim/ ye shes dbang phyug de'i steng du/ de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya// de ltar kun tu bzhin
180b7(rgyud): rngubs nas// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// lag mthil zla ba nyi ma sgom// ye shes yi ges de dbus so// ri dgas mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis/ khams lnga'i bdag nyid sreg pa'o// sngon du sa bon hUM
180b8(rgyud): byas nas/ gnyis par de bzhin gsum dang ni/ gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o// de bzhin rlung min bzhi pa dang // lnga pa ngang pa'i sa bon gyis/ mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin bsreg bya// 
181a1(rgyud): bdag gi de nyid me la ni/ bdag nyid sbyor bas bsregs pa nyid/ ji ltar ye shes me de ni/ sreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags/ sbyin sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po
181a2(rgyud): rdzogs so// sdong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis/ skyes pa'i dra ba rnam 'jig pas// 'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ stong pa'i de nyid rang bzhin gyis// 
181a3(rgyud): nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang / sa nI na mkhar kun tu bsam/ rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ yid 'ong pad ma 'byung ba ldan// stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas// 
181a4(rgyud): / me yi bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ shar du lha mo sgrol ma' di/ de bzhin byang du glo dkar mo/ mA ma ki ni nub phyogs su// lhor ni lha mos dngas rgyas spyan/ chu ni sgrol mar kun tu thim// me ni gos
181a5(rgyud): dkar mo la thim/ mA ma ki ni nub nas sa/ rlung ni sang sa rgyas sman la thim/ chu shing me tog pa da ma 'di/ sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gad mo/ de yi ye shes rgyal dbang mo// sgong skyes
181a6(rgyud): 'og tu 'byed pa can/ gzugs med srid pa'i dbyibs can ni/ ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim/ de ltar bdag nyid stong pa 'di/ de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid/ 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ 
181a7(rgyud): dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya/ ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la/ lus kyi dri ma rab tu bkru/ phyis ni chu yi gzugs su sgom/ dmar po mdab ma brgyad dang ni/ ge sar lte bar bcas pa yi/ 
181a8(rgyud): dbus su pad mas rnam par brgyan/ mad pa brgyad la ni lha mo yi/ sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ shar du si ka zhes bya dang / byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin/ lho ru hUM gi dbang phyug go// 
181b1(rgyud): dbang ldan du ni dbang po'i dbyangs/ me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so// bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang / rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o// dbus su ye shes rgyal po 'di/ spong skyes ye shes dbang
181b2(rgyud): phyag ni/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa/ bdud rtsis bon 'bar ba'o// kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni/ go 'phang mchog gis bsgom par bya/ dbugs mi g.yo ba'i sems dpa' yis// 
181b3(rgyud): dngos po dngos po sgom byas nas/ byis ni rtsa yi lha nyid gdan/ mig las sa yi sa bon dang // nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o// lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'di/ snying kar hUM zhes bya ba'i ming // yan lag
181b4(rgyud): drug 'dzin sa bon gyis/ rnal 'byor lus ni rnam pa srung / ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas/ ci'i yi phyir na skye bo'i ming / gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang // kha dog med
181b5(rgyud): cing mtshon kun dngos/ gnas med gnas kyi dbyib sa can dang / ma rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// 
181b6(rgyud): bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ nyen cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / gnyis dang gnyis med la rten nas/ bskal pa bzang po brgya yi sngon/ dag pa'i
181b7(rgyud): gnas la kun tu gnas/ ri rab lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ mA ma ki ni lho phyogs gnas/ lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling / de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo// shar du lha mo snyan pa 'di// lha mo rnam pa lnga yi ban+da/ 
181b8(rgyud): de ltar snying ka ri rab dang // de bzhin mgo bo mA ma ki/ sgrol ma lha yi gnas dang ni// g.yon pa de bzhin gos dkar mo// snyan pa mo 'di bdag gi gnas/ lha mo lnga yis byin gyis brlabs// pad ma'i dbusu/ 
182a1(rgyud): rdo rje dang / rdo rje'i dbus su pad ma can/ rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pa/ lus po kun nas dkris pa'o// yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du/ bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim/ lha yi gnas ni mam
182a2(rgyud): mkha' nyid rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes// bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni/ rdo rje'i rtsa zhes rab tu grags/ de yi yul gyi khrags dang ni/ lus dang lan cig bcas par gnas// khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor/ 
182a3(rgyud): bsaHblo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag/ ji ltar bdag gi sa bon lnga/ de ltar pad ma yi yang sgom// ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni/ nam mkha' rdo rje 'jib byed do// rkang pas rkang pa bkri bya zhing / mchu yi man
182a4(rgyud): ni btsir byas la/ gnyi ga'i lag pa phyag rgya ni/ rtse mo ga sum pa'i rdo rje brtag/ rang bzhin gyis ni so sra dang / snying ka'i rnam shes bsgoms pra yi/ ye shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di// skyes bus khros/ 
182a5(rgyud): pas hUM byas nas// de ltar rdo rje pad ma 'di// rnal 'byorabasdus pas bskyod par bya/ gnyi ga dga' zhing tshim pa yis/ lha rnams thams sa cad mchod par bya/ khrag dang khu ba las byung ba'i// 
182a6(rgyud): sa boni myu gus 'gro ba dang / lha rnams lus ni yang dag byung // 'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te/ longs spyod phyir yang gnas mi bya/ sems can don phyir 'dod pa'i phyir/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'ong sku/ 
182a7(rgyud): gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas pas/ gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya/ sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so// / nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid/ yi ge bcu
182a8(rgyud): ru sngon sbyar ba/ lnga yi bdag nyid du rtog bya/ lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/ lnga yis lus ni yongs su srung // yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar/ ji ltar sbyang zhing sgom pa dang // 
182b1(rgyud): ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste/ ji ltar thar pa la gnas nyid/ ngo mtshar lnga la mnyan par 'tshal/ gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba/ rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid nyon/ thog mar stong pa de kho na/ spong bar chu ni bsam par bya/ 
182b2(rgyud): kha dog bdun gyi pad ma ni/ gsar dang bcas yid 'ong ba/ stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyi/ pad ma'i gzugs ni snying por bcas/ pad ma rgya cher rab mdzes pa/ rin chen bdun gyis mngon par sbas/ 
182b3(rgyud): dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang / dar dang na bza' mngon par 'byang / seng ge'i gad ni mngon par bsal/ de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// pad ma'i rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di/ 'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi// sangs rgyas lnga
182b4(rgyud): yi sa bon gyis/ rdo rje'i rtse mo rnam par bsam/ dbus/ su rnam par sdang mdzad dgyes/ shar du de bzhin mi spyod pa/ rin chen sa bo na lho nyid du/ de bzhin nub tu 'od dpag med/ byang phyogs
182b5(rgyud): su ni don yod grub/ sa bon lngani rnam par sgom// pad ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ ji bzhin sa la rab tu brtag/ dbus su snying po skong la/ rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim/ pad ma brgyad pani
182b6(rgyud): rtse mer ni/ mnga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad/ shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di/ byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo// de bzhin lho ru mA ma ki 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por// 'jig pa mad
182b7(rgyud): par bsgom par bya// rdo rje las ni lha yi lus/ bzhugs pa ru ni rnam par bsam/ spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o// kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes/ rdo rje yi na cod pan can/ dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'byang / 
182b8(rgyud): rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / sems dpa'i skyil me krung gis bzhugs/ steng du ral gri 'chang ba dang / gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu/ gsum par rdo rje gdengs pa gser/ g.yon pa'i steng du kha T+wA~M dang / 
183a1(rgyud): gnyis pas lha mo nu ma 'tshir/ gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing / rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bsnams/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ rgyan kun pun/ sum tshogs pa dang / 
183a2(rgyud): me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan/ g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni/ phyag gcig gis ni 'khyud pa dang / gcig gi phyag na thod pa ni/ ba dang rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan/ mA ma ki yang de bzhin du/ gcig gi phyag
183a3(rgyud): gis mngon par 'khyud/ gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na/ khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o// spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam/ phreng bas phyag ni brgyan pa dang / gtor ma sbyangs pa'i phyag gnyis pa/ mdun du snod
183a4(rgyud): la rnam par bal+la/ de ltar bdag nyid lnga yi lus/ lus la kun nas yang dag gnas/ shar du lha mo mai tog ma/ lho ru spos dang yang dag ra ldan// nub tu mar me'i lag pa ma/ byang du dri yi lha mo'i/ 
183a5(rgyud): dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo nyid/ de bzhin me phyogs phreng ba ma bden bral phyogs su dbyangs ma dang / rlung du gar ma brgyad pa'o// nyi ma bye ba pa rgya stong gi/ 'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog/ sangs rgyas spyan
183a6(rgyud): ltar 'phro ba ni/ sems can sgrol la mchog tu brtson/ bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni/ bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no// bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas/ gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgoms par bya// phyis ni de
183a7(rgyud): yi mdun nyid du// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid pad mar bsam pa dang // de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam// ston du gsungs pa'i gdan la ni// der ni nyi mas mngon par g.yogs// sna tshogs rin
183a8(rgyud): chen mchod pa dang / sna tshogs dar ni mngon par sbyangs/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ pad ma'i tshul du kha phye la/ oM ka ma la ud b+ha be shrI swA hA/ pad ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rang gi dbugs
183b1(rgyud): las byung nas mi/ rdo rje mdun du rnam par sgom/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcas nas ni/ bsdigs mdzub g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung bkri/ lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o// oM badz+ra a ku sha dza/ oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya dza/ rdo rje
183b2(rgyud): lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ bsdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa/ zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o// oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ji ltar bdag nyi/ 
183b3(rgyud): gzugs brnyen bzhin/ de ltar mdun du'ang rab bsam bya/ lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi par ro// shar du gshin rje mthar byed dngos/ lho ru de bzhin bgegs mthar byed// nub tu dadam
183b4(rgyud): mthar byed pa/ byang du khro bo skyeng ba'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings/ rgyab dang rgyub tu sbyar bar bya/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ rdo rje lcags sgrog/ dgi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khri tshur bcang/ 
183b5(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar b.raro bya/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De ho// rdo rje dri la bu'i stagra dang phyag rgya'o// log pa lcag sgrog phyag rgya las/ sor mo dbu me ba rkyang byas la// nA mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ba ro tsa nA sa mA d+hi/ 
183b6(rgyud): bi shwa ye g+hu ye g+hA ya dza b+hi She swA hA/ oM hUM hU~M hUM/ ho ho ho ho ho ho/ hriM hri hri hriM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM tA re tut+tA re sa ta k+Shi ta hU~M swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so// 
183b7(rgyud): oM hi li hi li pa la swA hA/ gos dkar mo'i sngags so/ aM ta ra sarba ta na hUM phaT/ mA ma kI'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha bi bud+ha yA hUM/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags so// bsdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mo ni// dbus dang dbu
183b8(rgyud): su sbyar bar bya// mthe bong ngos su sbyar ba ni/ lha mo bzhi yi phyag rgya'o// ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni/ me tog ma la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo yi ni sngags nyid yin/ g.yas brkyang rkang pa yang dag gnas/ bsdigs mdzub
184a1(rgyud): / snying kar sbyin byas nas/ dpung pa mdun nas brkyang byas la/ se gol hUM gi rnam pa dang / lhan cig du ni sbyar byas pa/ 'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgya lo/ oM A yu/ pa la pra ti rak+Sha duk+Sha ban+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ 
184a2(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba'i'o// oM A kaR+Sha ya sa ta d+hA tA nA kro swA hA/ byung du rgyas pa yi'o/ oM mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba satwA nAM shrI swA hA/ nub tu dbang gi'o// oM shak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta g+hA ta ya hri phaT/ lho ru mngon par spyod pa yi'o// 
184a3(rgyud): oM su gan+d+ha hUM haM swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dri yi phyag rgya'o// oM su so bid puSh+pe b+h+yaHswA hA/ bsdigs mdzub dang mthib mo sbyar ba ni/ me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM d+hU pa ma la ku le swA hA/ sor mo dbus
184a4(rgyud): ma sgreng ba ni bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM tIk+Sha dI pa ra pra ti gr-ih+Na sA hA/ khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo sgreng ba ni/ mar me yi sngags da da phyag rgya'o// oM ku ru ku ru bi dza yai swA hA/ lag pa gnyis/ 
184a5(rgyud): brkyang nas dbus sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'o// ji ltar sngon du sbyar ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ hUM gi glu yi rnam pa yis/ sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya/ lag
184a6(rgyud): gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ rked pa'i phyogs su gzung byas la/ pi bang tshul gyis sgreng ba dang / gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang / e la nad dus gyis bral dang / brdab pa'i tshul gyi mi dus pa dang ga pa tshul gyis bskyod pa dang / rlung g.yag
184a7(rgyud): tshul gyis g.yab pa dang / rgyal mtshan tshul gyis sgreng ba dang / bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang / ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang / gdug kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang / cang de'i tshul gyis 'gying ba dang // khar rnga'i
184a8(rgyud): tshul gyis brdung ba dang / bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang / khro bo'o stang stabs yan lag bskyod// de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pas/ glu yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid/ hUM hUM hUM/ bdag med rnal 'byor
184b1(rgyud): bsgoms pa yis/ 'byin pa'i sa bon bzung byas pa// spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o// dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che/ thar pa chen po gnas chen po/ gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi// gsang ba'i bdag po dga'
184b2(rgyud): chen po/ rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las// lha dang lha ni mngon par sprul/ bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ sbyor ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod nas// 
184b3(rgyud): ji ltar las la mngon bde bar/ rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis// phreng ba la ni bzlas par bya/ ji ltar nus pas mchod byas la/ slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o// dbugs kyi bdag nyid lus bkang
184b4(rgyud): stelhan cig thim par bsam par bya/ ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid/ de ltar rnam pa snang mdzad bdag/ ji ltar rnam par snang ma dzad lha/ de bzhin rgyab kyi rtsa nyid do// ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid/ 
184b5(rgyud): las de bzhin ye shes skye ba 'di/ chu ni sgrol ma zhes su ba shad/ me la gos dkar yang dag ldan/ rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di/ de bzhin rab mdzes nA pani dkar po chu yi rtsa dang ni/ dud pa yang ni me yi
184b6(rgyud): gnas/ dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi'o// ye shes 'byin pa yi ni rtsa/ lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni/ gdan bzhi nyan par mi nus pa/ gzhung nyung ba ni bstan pa yin/ gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya/ 
184b7(rgyud): ba'i le'u rdzogs so// // rdo rje'i chu ni ji ltar lags/ bdud rtsi'i chu ni ji ltar skye/ gang gi dbye ba ji ltar myang // gang gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di yi rab tu dgos pa'ang tsi/ ngo mtshar lha
184b8(rgyud): la mnyan par 'tshal/ nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'tshang / gnyis dang gnyis med spangs pa yi// gsang zhing gsang bar rab sbas pa'i// 'gro ba'i 'bras bu de de nyid/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag du// 
185a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba/ sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba'o// ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid/ ji ltar me yi mnyam par bsregs pa'i spyod pa dang // nyi ma ji ltar mnyam par blta bar
185a2(rgyud): ston pa dang // ji ltar rlung ni mnyam pa nyid du len pa ltar//  rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho bsrings pa'i rnal 'byor pas// pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog/ dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu snang mdzad dang / ro ni
185a3(rgyud): dbang phyug rdo rje phyag/ lha gsum dag gi cho ga shes par bya// ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog/ ho zhes pa yis dri med cing / dpa' bo hri yi si btsam pa yi/ de dag rim bzhin shes par bya/ pad ma yi gdan ni rtag/ 
185a4(rgyud): tu mnyam pa nyid du skom/ mthe bong rdo rje srin lag gnyis su kun ldan pas/ sngags gsum yi ge gsum gyi cho ga bsrung bar bya/ gang zhes nga ro 'ang myang ba blo ldan rnal 'byor ma'o// rdo rje chu yi khyad par
185a5(rgyud): ni nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'dzag pa yi ni lus kyi chu/ bdag nyid lnga yis byin gyis brlabs/ dro ba'i rang bzhin ma ru mthong / zhi ba chu ru rab tu brtag/ rlung dang rlung ni du ba'o// sa ni
185a6(rgyud): gzugs su snang ba'o// gang zhig de nyid kyis myangs na/ dri ma can lus dri med 'gyur/ rin chen bzang dga' rnal 'byor pa/ sbyangs pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi/ gtsang dang mi gtsang de bzhin rdzas/ dang po
185a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do// nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa de/ rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o// ye shes rdo rje bcom nas ni/ rnal 'byor pa ni de la snang / bdud rtsi bsten 'dod lus can gyis/ gnyis med
185a8(rgyud): kha sbyar sbyar bar bya/ rnal 'byor chen po'i bsgrub pa po/ sngon du A li ka li bsams// A li zhes bya bung bar gsungs/ ka li de bzhin gshegs ma nyid/ sbyor ba'i ye shes sgra yis ni// gnyis kas 'khyud par/ 
185b1(rgyud): bsam par bya/ ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yis// yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te// rdo rje rabatsam zhig gis/ 'od dpag med ni dkri bar bya/ lha mo gsum pa nyid kyis ni/ dbyug pa tsam zhig rdo rje 'dzin/ dbus
185b2(rgyud): su dam tshig zhag pa yis// kun da mgo la mchog tu brtson/ de ltar sngags zlos rnal 'byor pa/ pad ma rdo rje can gyis bskyod// rang bzhin gyi ni si sgra dang / bdud rtsi chu dang 'dres pa yi/ de nyid 'di yis myang
185b3(rgyud): byas pa/ rnal 'byor chos la rab tu shis/ bden pa'i chos ni mchog tu bden/ rnal 'byor chos ni rab tu bstod// de nyid dman pa'i rnam rtog yid/ sbyor ba ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ bye ba brgyad cu'i
185b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma/ gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud 'di nyid// mkhas pa yis da ni rnam bltas la/ sbyar ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor ma// sbyor ba'i chos kyis gtor dam sbyin/ bdud rtsi lnga mdor bsdus le'u zhes bya ba rdzogaso// 
185b5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dbugs kyi the tshom ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'dri/ 'chi ltas ji ltar 'tshal bgyi zhing / gang gis shes nas rab tu sbyar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba lus
185b6(rgyud): can sems can don// 'chi bdag kun nas slu ba ni/ nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje bdag/ gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ 'chi bdag lus ni gnas pa nyid/ dang por snga dro 'dus nyid la/ dbugs ni rnam
185b7(rgyud): par dgod bshad pa/ lus can zla drug nas 'chi bar/ ngas gsungs pa la the tsom med/ gal te dus la bab gyur na/ dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur// de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong nas// / 
185b8(rgyud): 'gram pa'i tshigs ni yo bar 'gyur/ lus kyi mtshan ma she sa byas la/ rnal 'byor pa yis zhi bar bya/ rna ba'i u da rnam chad na/ chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo// mig gi aM ba ra yi tsa/ trota de bzhin nyi ma
186a1(rgyud): / lnga sA yi ma si ka chad na/ nyi ma bdun gyis gdon mi za/ steng 'og son 'thams 'gyur na// nyi ma gsum gyis the tshom med// 'di yi lce la thig nag na// zhags gnyis kyis 'chi lus can rnams// mgrin
186a2(rgyud): pa'i blo yi phyi la rtsa/ zla phyed las ni mi thub bo// brang gi lde'u zhom 'gyur ma/ zla phyed sman pas gso sdang yod/ sen mo khrag ni med pa ma/ chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo// be nya brgyad kyi 'chi ltas ni/ mche ba'i rma tshogs
186a3(rgyud): rnam par spangs/ rna ba'i u da'i bdag nyid ni/ rnal 'byor dbye bas bsten par bya/ mig gi a ma pa ra chad na/ mkhas pas dkar ba'i sa bon bzla/ sA yi ma si ka la ni/ dbugs bsdams me yi dud pa'o// 
186a4(rgyud): dang so 'thams rtsa lnga ni/ dung gi sa bon bzlas pas 'phro/ dag/ lce yi thig nag 'di la ni/ bdag nyid sbyor bas mnan par bya/ mgrin pa ra blo yi phyi rol rtsa/ pad+ma'i sa bon gyis rtse bya/ brang gi lde'u
186a5(rgyud): zhom pa la// stong skyes ye shes sgom pa'o// sen mo khrag ni med pa la/ lag pa bsdus la bzlas par bya/ bug pa dgu yi s+pho ru ni/ sadon dgu yis rtse bar bya/ rtsa dgu la ni sa bon dgu/ skye dgu
186a6(rgyud): sa bon dgu yis bsdam/ de ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni/ rnam par shes pa mi 'gro'o// ma bsregs snod ni gnyis su bzung ste/ gur gum dang ni gi wang gis/ bcu gnyis tshad ni yang dag bri// 
186a7(rgyud): sa bon dbyangs yig bskor bar bya/ lha mo brgyad kyi sa bon 'di/ mtsham su ma ning sa bon dang / dbus su ye shes sa bon ni/ mkhas pa yi ni bskor bar bya// de bzhin ming ni dbus su bri/ hUM gi dbus
186a8(rgyud): su gnas pa nyid// gnyis ka ya ma dang sbyar byas nas// skud pa dmar pos bkri bar bya/ mA ma ki ni mdab mar bsams// steng du de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag/ gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yis// nus pa yi ni mngon
186b1(rgyud): bAr cho// rdorje bcur gnyis bcings nAs/ dredang rtsini snang bar bya/ rnam shes ye shesas bon ni/ brgyad brgyar dri bzlas pa yis/ rnam shes bsdams pa'i dngos po dang / rnal 'byor srung ba'i khyad par gyis/ 
186b2(rgyud): yi dgas srin mo 'byung po dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba nyid/ rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung tsam gyis/ grol bar 'di la the tshom med/ tshe zad pa yi lus can ni/ zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i/ 
186b3(rgyud): mtshan ma yongs su brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzog so// / rnal 'byor pa stan bcos cho ga'i rim/ de nas ye shes dbang gis gsungs/ 'khrig pa'i dngos po bsten pa las/ khrag dang khu ba 'bru
186b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ ye shes ngo bos 'byung ba yi/ 'byin pa'i rtswa ni mngon par sems/ bdun par khu bar gyur pa yi/ dkar po'i rtsa ni rab tu bste dang / khrag gis mtshan mo brgyad na ni/ du ba'i rtsani mngon du
186b5(rgyud): gso// mtshan mo bye dang bzhir bsnyen pas/ dung gi rtsa ni byi na gyis brlab/ gong du mtshan mo bcu gnyis kyis/ pad+ma'i rtsa ni rab tu sbyar/ nyi ma drug ci'i grangs 'di yis/ mkhas pas gzang gi ni rtsa/ 
186b6(rgyud): mkhrang 'gyur dgu zhes bshad pa ni/ dri med gsum gyi rtsa ni bskyed/ mtshan mo bcu dang drug gi ro// 'byed pa'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed/ sa gdugs ye shes rnam shes ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus can na/ 
186b7(rgyud): sa gdugs bcu dang brgyad nyid kyis// mkhas pas zla dgur kun tu gnas/ skye ba sra s+thA la sogs ldan/ sen mo khog pa rus pa dang / zhags dang srin bu gci ba dang / bshang brgyad mngal na nga rgyas pa dang // 
186b8(rgyud): rtsa yi bskyed pa zhes byas/ lhag par lha dgu gnas pa nyid// bdag nyid lha dang pha rol mchog/ bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no// dkar po lha mo sgrol ma 'di// dud pa la ni gos dkar gnas/ lha mo sangs rgyas du nyid la/ 
187a1(rgyud): mA ma ki ni pad+mar gnas/ lha mo snyan ma gi wang la/ rdo rje sgeg mo dri med la// 'byed par rin chen yid 'ong ba/ sa yi gdugs la pad+ma'i rtsa/ 'di ltar spros pa'i ye shes rtsa/ thams cad 'byin cing sdud pa yi/ 
187a2(rgyud): ltar rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/ de ltar rgyab tu rab tu grags/ mnyam pa'i chu ru de byas pas// mnyam pa'i gzugs ni 'od dang bcas/ stong phrag dgu yi grangs nyid ni/ re re las ni gyes pa'o// stong phrag
187a3(rgyud): bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// lus po yin rtse nyid do// dgu pa yis ni 'byin cing sdud// dgu yi rtsa ni rtag pa'i sa/ dgu dang lnga yis dga' bar bcas// lnga po'i lha 'di 'gro ba'o// gcig gis 'byin
187a4(rgyud): cing srung ba dang / gcig gis lnga ni ye shes can/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te/ gcig gis lus dang lus can dang / gzugs da med ye shes gzugs can dang / mi stong pa dang stong ba nyig/ 
187a5(rgyud): ring min thung min gzhan ma yin/ dngos med dngos po tsam ma yin/ kha drog med la tshan kun dngos// ye shes lus can rnal 'byor pas/ la ma gnyis pa ni srid pa'i skyon/ lam gcig pa yis rnal 'a
187a6(rgyud): pas// rnam par rtog pa kun spangs la/ gcig gi lam nyid shes par bya// shel ltar dag pa'i lus kyis ni/ dag pa'i lam du yang dag bgrod// rtsa brgyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / 
187a7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i mdo ru bsdus pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ sbyor ba'i bstan bcos sgrub pa pos// gdan bzhi pa las btus pa yis/ stong phrag bcu gnyis yang
187a8(rgyud): ngag ldan// de yi don ni mdor bsdus pa'o// gzhung mangs pa yis 'jigs pa yis// de nyid mdor bsdus pa yi chog sbyor ba'i rnams la nye bar gsungs// rnal 'byor pa la rab dgod pa'i/ de nas zhi ba yang dag
187b1(rgyud): bshad/ thog mar bya ba stong pa nyid/ stong pa'i dbus su pad ma ni/ pad ma sa bon myu gu can/ kha dog bdun pa phyag chen po/ sde tshan bzhi pa'i tshig la ni/ steng du ma ning thig ler bcas/ de yi sa bon mnyam bsgom
187b2(rgyud): nas// de bzhin khro gnyer can ma bskyed/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas la ni/ gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ dag pa'i sku dang spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ mchog sbyin
187b3(rgyud): dang ni dbyug pa dang / bgrang phreng ril pa spyi blugs bsnams/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bsnams/ bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa mchog gi yi ge gcig/ 
187b4(rgyud): khro gnyer mchog gi yi ge ni/ 'bum phrag cig zlos sdig rkangs pa yis/ rnal 'byor pa yis brtsams tsam gyis/ tshe ni 'phel bar rab tu gra dgas/ lci nyid dmigs par bya ba yis// de nas rgyas pa'i
187b5(rgyud): las 'di nyon/ ti se gangs kyi rtse mo dang / gser gyi re bo'i ngos dang ni/ rin chen bdun rang bzhin gnas su/ gzhal yas khang pa nyer mdzes pa'i/ seng ge'i gdan la gnas pa ni/ nyi ma'i dkyil
187b6(rgyud): 'khor la bzhugs pa/ gdugs dkar po dang bla re dang / dril bu dra bar mngon par mdzes/ bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung ste/ gsum pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ sde tshan mtha' yi steng du'o// ye shes can gyi
187b7(rgyud): sa bon gcig/ dbugs mi g.yo zhing 'od zer bcas/ ser po'i mdog tu rnam par sgom// phyis ni nor rgyun zhes bya ba'i/ lha mo'i gzugasu rnam par bsam/ phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / rgyan kun
187b8(rgyud): gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ kha dog 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ rin chen shing dang za ma tog/ gnyis pa ni ni rab tu 'phel// gsum pas mchod sbyin lag pa dang // steng du shes rab phyag dang ni/ gnyis pa la ni bgrang
188a1(rgyud): / phreng dang // gsum pa ril pa spyi blugs so// sbom dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni 'dren pa'i khams nyid do// rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 
188a2(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ dmar po'i las kyi khyad par ni/ sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs nas ni// stong par pad ma yang dag bshad// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten
188a3(rgyud): cing // gdugs dkar po yis mngon par brgyan/ dbyangs yig deng po'i yi ge gcig/ steng du sde tshan than dang / mnyam par gzhag pas sa bon dmar/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba 'di/ sems can
188a4(rgyud): 'gug par byed pa'i dngos/ lha mo'i gzugs brnyan 'di/ bsams la// bcom gser gyi mdog lta bur/ mA ma ki bsam yang dga'/ byung // phyag gnyis rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes// gcig gis
188a5(rgyud): lcags kyu yang dag 'dzin/ g.yon pa dril bu mngon sgrogs pa/ thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ sgom zhing bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// sems can dbang du 'ong ba 'gyur/ 
188a6(rgyud): de nag po yi las 'dri ni/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing // rlung gi sa bon bsam par bya/ du bdu ba rab 'bar ba/ sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan/ nag po drag po yi ni gdan// ye dgas gdan la kun gan+d+ha
188a7(rgyud): pa/ bsam pa ral cig ma yi gzugs// kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od// dbu skra gyen brdzes lha mo che/ drag par dgod pas 'jigs par mdzad// spyan gsum zhalen gcig pa la// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam
188a8(rgyud): par spras pa gcig gi phyag na ral gri dang // gnyis pa ni ni rdo rje gsor// g.yas na mdung ni 'dzin mdzad cing / gnyis par de bzhin bsdigs mdzub bo// 'phen pa'i rol pas rnam par bzhugs/ me 'bar ba
188b1(rgyud): bdang mnyam pa'i 'od// zhags pa 'phen pas 'ching mdzad cing / hUM sgra'i rnam par 'jigs par byed/ sa bon dbus su ming dang ni/ phaT kyi rnam pa de bzhin mthar// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / rnal
188b2(rgyud): 'byor bstan pa 'jig byed pa/ lha mo ral pa gcig ma 'dis/ nus pas brlag par byed par gsungs/ sngags dang rgyud ni mnyam bzung la/ lha mo 'od zer can sa bon// dug dang khrag du bsres pa yis/ rdo rje phag mo
188b3(rgyud): kun nas bris/ de yi mchul ming dang yang // mgo la yi ge sa bon dang / steng du me yi yi ge dang / kha la rlung gnyis de bzhin no// 'dis ni sred par byed par gsungs/ las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs
188b4(rgyud): so// / sems can+da kun la phan mdzad pa// ye shes dbang gis dra nas gsungs// nyon cigra rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ 'khor ba'i lam nas grol ba yi// 
188b5(rgyud): mtha' yas sbyor ba mngon phyogs pas/ mtha' yas sgo zhes bya ba'i ming / stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid lus/ ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi 'dis/ phyi dang nang du bcas pa ni/ de bzhin namakha'i
188b6(rgyud): khams ni/ rgya mtsho'i chu'i dbyibs dang ni// de yi dbus su rab grang ba'i/ kun sa ji ltar 'dod bzhin du/ gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsams/ seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa nI/ nyi ma'i dkyil
188b7(rgyud): 'khor gyis brgyan// cing / sna tshogs darin rnam par 'phyang // yi ge gcig gla sa boni na/ 'od zer 'bar ba mtshon gyis dngos// drang po'i dbyangs yig kun bzang ba/ steng du bdud rtsi thi gra le can/ lha mo/ 
188b8(rgyud): bdag nyid lhan cig dang / phyis nas gzugs ni mnyam par bsam/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ rgyan kun gyisi ni brgyan pa'i sku// rab tu
189a1(rgyud): / mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// gcig gi phyag gis rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu mngon par sgrogs// yi ge brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid// spyod bcas mi spyod gsang ba dang / chu dang me dang de bzhin rlung // sa ni mig gi
189a2(rgyud): yi ge'o// spro bzhi dang ni phung po bzhi/ spong skyes rdzi ro lo gnas pa nyid// bzhi pa nyon mongs me dang ni/ yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du// rmongs pas dang nyon mongs dang / sngon du phyugs ni mnyam pa dang // chu shing
189a3(rgyud): me tog pad+ma ni// 'di yi sgong skyes bstan nyid do// ba lang rmig pa'i sdang du ni/ bdud rtsi brgyad kyis rnam par dbye/ shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/ snying po yi ni snying po'i mchog/ lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang
189a4(rgyud): nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o// sa ni mog la sbyar byas te// tshangs med par me ni de bzhin 'bar/ rmongs pa'i sa ni mgrin par ro// g.yon pa steng lag da nas pa dang / nyon mongs sems can brang dang ni// phyugs ni
189a5(rgyud): lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad la dgod pa yis// lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang // na mkha' rna ba snga dag la'o// 'di yis lha nyid yang dag shre// yi ge brgyad kyis sngags 'di ni// phyag rgya brgyad du rab tu
189a6(rgyud): grags/ dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ gnag cing 'bar ba'i las 'di ni// las rnams bzhi yi lha mo ni// mkhas pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas// ye shes las byung snying po nyid// mchog tu rtag tsi
189a7(rgyud): zhi ba dang / phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun/ las dang las kyi khyad par nyid/ laM thams cad chu yi dbyibs dang ni// mnyam par 'jigs byed ma dang yang / ji ltar rtag pa rlung dag dang // dang pa'i don dang sa/ 
189a8(rgyud): dbang po// lhags ma rtsegs pa las byung ba/ bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o// 'gro ba'i don phyir yi ge brgyad// lha brgyad du ni yongasu grags// mnyam pazhag bzlas shing bsgom pa yas/ 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// 
189b1(rgyud): ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ sngon du reg cing reg pa nyid/ 'jig rten 'dir ni bde ba dang // rtag tu mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni/ gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas/ bdag gi de nyid dman pa yis/ 
189b2(rgyud): ji ltar sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis// sbyor ba'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya// dri zhim rab grags me tog kun nas gnas pa dang / nag po'o a ga ru dang gu gul mar me dang // gnyis
189b3(rgyud): med gtor ma gcig gis yid ni yang dag ldan pa yis/ lha mos ma mo gzhan rnams kun nas rab tu mchod/ steng du rnam par snang mdzad bsam/ chu la phyag na rdo rje'o// yid kyis na mkha'i snying po ni/ rna ba
189b4(rgyud): gnyis la rab tu sbyar/ lce la 'jig rten mgon po dang // mgrin par 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sras/ byang du byams pa yang dag sbyar/ snying kar kun tu bzang po gnas/ lte bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ 
189b5(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed rab tu grags// de nyid rnam pa'i bye brag da// lha mo'i gdan nyid du ni sgom// snying dkar sems dang ye shes ni/ mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ 'od zer bye ba rnams mang po// sangs rgyas sprin nirma
