291a1(rgyud): me tog phreng ba dang // rgyan dang gos gyis brgyan pa ste// dag gis sna tshogs grags pa yang // blangs pa dang ni bzung ba rnams// rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang // 'dug dpa
291a2(rgyud): de bzhin nyal ba dang // sad pa dang ni log pa dang // thams cad rmi lam mthong ba ste// bzhed dang de bzhin cho nge dang // shin tu yid 'phrog gar dang ni// rnga rnams dag kyang brdung ba ste// sna
291a3(rgyud): tshogs pa dag 'dir brjod pas// smyon pa dang ni myos pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dod chags de de nyid// gzugs med mang po'i gzugs can de// pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams// du ma'i
291a4(rgyud): gzugs can kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin// khyab pa'i dngos kyis khyab nas su// de nyid dam pa char gnas so// de bzhin nyid de mA ma kI// bzlas
291a5(rgyud): med 'dzin pa yang med de// bgrang phreng bya ba 'ga' yang med// zas spangs pa yang mi bya'o// b+ha ga'i pad+ma mchod byas te// mkha sa pas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde
291a6(rgyud): ba che// de yis de nyid 'grub pa'o// gang de bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// b+ha ga'i dbus su pad+ma ste// rtsa gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis la// de yi dbus su de gtso ste// de dag las gzhan shin tu
291a7(rgyud): mchog/ rtsa dag dgu ni rnam par gnas// sgo dgu la gnas rig pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lha mo// rtag tu rdo rje can mnyam blta// de bas dri
291a8(rgyud): dag rab byed na// chags bral zhes gsungs kun rig pas// de dag gsang che ni mchog rab ni// zhal bzang ma kye sbyor bar bshad// sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad sogs pa// de bzhin
291b1(rgyud): gshegs pas mi shes te// gtan du dga' ba'i yid bde ba// sbyor bas dam pa rab bstan to// gsang ba'i pad+ma mthong nas dang // shin tu rgyas pa'i mA ma kI/ rdo rje'i bdud rtsi bde ba che/ 
291b2(rgyud): de nyid bdag gis bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po yis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen pos las de bzhin
291b3(rgyud): nyid sbyor ba ye shes bsnyen pa ces bya ba le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas mgu ba'i lha mo des// hA ra nu pur gyis brgyan te// 'di dag dbyangs
291b4(rgyud): ni blangs nas su// sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed// phyung mdzad bde chen rdo rje las// bdag gis mchog gi yig 'bru 'tshal bar bgyi// b+ha ga'i pad mar bde
291b5(rgyud): ba chen po ste// rdo rje'i don de bde ba chen po lags// sa 'dzin pa dang skad phran dang // drug ldan la sogs mtha' 'kho ba chul// sna tshogs thun mong rnams dag gi/ snyan pa/ 
291b6(rgyud): sgra yis blang bar bya// de rnams dpyas dag blangs nas su// dga' ba yid bde rnam sprul gyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
291b7(rgyud): bka' stsal pas// de bzhin nyid kyis the tshom bcad// rdo rje can khyod bka' drin gyis// rtag par ye shes bya ba bgyi// bcom ldan chags pa dang bral ba'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba
291b8(rgyud): 'di// rdo rje theg pa 'byung ba yi// sbyor ba bdag gis bstan par bgyis// da dung bdag la the tshom mchis// phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam sprul pa// ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung
292a1(rgyud): de dag gi sngags ji ltar lags// sngags rnams gang las skye ba lags// khyed par du ni lha rnams kyang // lha ni de dag the tsom na// mdor bsdus nas ni bdag la
292a2(rgyud): gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs// phyag rgya sngags dag 'byung ba ni// bshad de nyon cig mA ma ki/ phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gsungs te// sku dang gsung
292a3(rgyud): dang thugs las 'byung // sku ni phyag rgya mchog 'gyur te// gsung ni phyag rgya sngags kyi las// thugs kyi mtshan mA'i phyag rgya ni// bsam gtan ri mo gnyis med gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi
292a4(rgyud): rgyud chen la// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste// mtshan// ma'i phyag rgya mi bri'o// phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs yin te// lha ni/ lha mo bud med do// dbang po thams cad bde ba ru/ 
292a5(rgyud): b+ha ga'i pad+mar mchod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor zhing // las thams cad ni 'grub par bya// ji ltar dpag bsam shing chen gyi// yal ga brgya phrag stong can dang // rtsa dang de la
292a6(rgyud): gzung ba ni// skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ba bzhin// de lhor bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i yum yin te// sngags 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni// b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas pa'o// de
292a7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje bcug nas mA ma kaM/ nyon cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni// dang po rnam stong mdzad sbyor te// oM badz+ra a mri ta ma hA s+yA
292a8(rgyud): kha sa bon bzhi dang mnyam ldan la// swA hA yi ge yang sbyor ro// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul te// yi ge gnyis dang bzhi pa ste// bzhi pa yi ni mnyam ldan pa// mA ma ki yi snying
292b1(rgyud): po'i mchog/ brgyad dag kho na'o dbus pa gang // brgyad la rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'dab brgyad la ni sbyar byas te// lha mo sngags kyis sngags phyung ngo // sgo srung dag gi sngags rnams
292b2(rgyud): ni// nyon cig sbrul bzang mA ma kI/ sde yi tha ma sngags phyung ste// sa bon brgyad ni sngags rigs pas// stong pa'i lha yis gnon byas te// rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan la// swA hA yi ge mnya/ 
292b3(rgyud): por ldan// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin rnams// bzhini sgo srung gyi yin te// bzhi ni spos dang puSh+pe sogs// ma ning yi ge ga bzhi la// swA hA rnam par snang mdzad yang // lha mo gseng ba'i ma
292b4(rgyud): mA ki/ rnga sogs kun gyis mchod par bya// rdo rje/ bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshedags pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi
292b5(rgyud): rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las sngags phyung ba'i rim pa bstan pa ces bya ba le'u gsu ma pa'o// / de nas sbyin sreg las dag gi/ 
292b6(rgyud): cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga yi// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang // 'thub dang bskrad kyang de bzhi
292b7(rgyud): du sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgrub rnams// de kun bdag gis bsha par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying byed pa// skur brten bcas pas gnyis gnas pa// rgyan
292b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan byas te// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya// khams gsum rnam pa rgyal gyur nas// rkang gnyis g.yas brkyang bya ba dang // g.yon brkyang bya ba yang / 
293a1(rgyud): byas te// rkang mnyam dang ni sa ga yis// sa ni sbyong bar byed ma thag/ sa la reg na 'dzam skye'o// de nas bgegs rnams bskrad nas su// gzhal yas sprul pa la
293a2(rgyud): sogs pa// gong du bla ma phyag 'tshal lo// phyi nas sa yi lha mo dgug/ oM e h+ye hi lha mo che// sa yi brtan ma 'jig rten yum// rin chen thams cad rab rdzogs pa'o// lha yi rgyan
293a3(rgyud): gyis brgyan byed ma// ha ra NA pur sgra 'byin mo// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu mchod// yon 'di dag ni bzhes nas su// sbyin sreg las ni 'grub par mdzod// hri hri hri hA swA hA// bshang gci
293a4(rgyud): khra ga dang khu ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa la gtor ba dar bya// byin rlabs bya ba'i phyir spos ni// sha chen gyis ni dbul bar bya// de nas rig ma 'jug byas te// gdol pa ma dang
293a5(rgyud): sme sha ma// gar mkhan ma dang bram ze mo// de kho na bzhi na rgyal mo dang // dmangs rigs mo dang rgyal rigs mo// dri dang spos kyi ma chod byas te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// yan/ 
293a6(rgyud): lag lnga la yi ge hri// b+ha ga'i dbus su yi ge bruM// spyan ma sgrol ma gos dkar ma// yi dga' ma bdag bsgom par bya// b+ha ga'i dbus su slob dpon gyis// me tog gtor ba kho nar
293a7(rgyud): bya/ de nas sngags pas ho khung ni// tshad mar kun tu bri bya ste// zhi la zlum por bya ba ste/ khru gang tsam du thig gdab po// khru phyed sa la bskor nas su// dkar rtsi chen gyis byug par/ 
293a8(rgyud): br-i// kun tu 'khor lo tshur ltar yang // glo ru mnyam por bri ba'o// rgyas pa la ni khru do ste// de la khru gang brko bar bya// gru bzhi pa ni mtha' mnyam du// mugra dang btsag gis bri ba'o// mngon/ 
293b1(rgyud): spyod la ni zur gsum ste// sor nyi shu ni yangs pa'i tshad// nyi shu phyed ni brko byas na// dbus su rdo rje rgyu gram yang // 'ba' phreng gis 'khrugs pa bri// de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la/ 
293b2(rgyud): zlo gam yang dag bri ba'o// ho khung yang dag ston nas su// phyogs kyi cha yang bstan par bya// byang du mngon du kha gyur te// sngags pas zhi ba brtsam par bya// rgyas pa la ni shar du yang / 
293b3(rgyud): mngon spyod la ni lhon ste// dbang ni nub tu khon ba shed// dgug dang bskad kyang de bzhin no// mngon spyod rtag par nag po ste// tshon lnga yis ni dbang sogs bya// 'bras dang til dang
293b4(rgyud): 'o ma dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig par// bdud dartsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// zhi ba rgyas pa sbyin po sreg bya// sreg shing rnam das kyang thams cad la// dri zhim 'o ma can shing ngo // 
293b5(rgyud): sna tshogs zas sam gtor ma yang // 'byung po tha ma sa cad sbyin par bya// gtor ma gang yang sgrub pa pos// khrag 'thung phya ga rgya chen pos sbyin// gang zhig yid kyis 'dod pa
293b6(rgyud): ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yi 'grub// dbyar kyi dus ni zhi ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin dgun gyi dus// dpyid ka mngon spyod las rnams rnams ni// sgrub pa pos ni thams cad bya// shar dus ni
293b7(rgyud): kha rab tu gsungs// rgyas pa de bzhin srod la ste// nyin phyed la 'am nam phyed la// rtag par mngon spyod bya ba'o// ho ma khung dbus su yi dam lha// yi ge hUM gis skyes nas su// zhal ni
293b8(rgyud): ga da dra ba bsams byas te// sbyin sreg de la dbul bar bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag 'bul 'gyur na// mdun du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur// dang po me ni dgug bya ba// lha thams cad
294a1(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i gnas// 'od zer phreng 'khrugs drag po'i lha// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'o// oM e h+ye hi/ 'dir gshegs gdon mi za bar khyod// me la mngon
294a2(rgyud): sum dngos grub sbyin// drag po khams gsum gyis mchod pa// khyab 'jug tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba// 'di dag yon yang bzhes nas su// zhabs g.yon brjes kyang rdo rje can// oM hUM \u0f7f
294a3(rgyud): hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA// dang po la ni yon 'bul te// phyi nas lbu ba shos me tog 'bul// oM lha'i me tog shin tu dmar// dri zhim shin tu mdzes pa ni// me tog de ring bzhes nas su/ 
294a4(rgyud): 'di la byin gyis brlab par gsol// hUM me to gi snga dwags so// oM mar me 'od zer 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro 'jig pa 'jom/ nyes byed pa// lha yi mig byed bkra shis pas// mar
294a5(rgyud): me khyod kyis bzhes su gsol// hUM mar me'i sngags so// oM tsan dan ga bur dang bcas pa'i// dri zhim spos me dge ba ni// mthu dang bcos par bya ba 'di// bzhes nas byin gyis
294a6(rgyud): brlab du gsol// hUM spos kyi sngags so// oM sna tshogs lha yi dri zhim pa// sna tshogs ga pur rnam brgyan pas// sna tshogs yi ge hUM las byung // dri 'di 'bul te bzhes su gsol/ 
294a7(rgyud): hUM dri'i sngags so// dang por mchod pa'i cho ga ni// the tsom med par me la bya// phyi nas rang gi yi dam lha'i// bzlas sngags rig par brjod par bya// dbyangs dang gar dang zas rnams
294a8(rgyud): kyis// rnam pa du mar rol byas te// rig ma dang ni sgrub pa pos// tshogs la mchod pas mnyes par bya// gal te dngos grub dag 'dod na// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub pa'o// bla
294b1(rgyud): ma me lha rdo rje 'dzin// mchod par byas nas rdzogs par bya// oM me lU las ni grub par mdzad// sems can thams cad bde ba 'dren// su gsung thugs dngos grub don du// lha rnams
294b2(rgyud): las ni rjes su skyobs// me lnga zhi bar gshegs nas su// sa gzhi zhi bar mdzad mdzod cig/ rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa yis// sgrub pa po dang thams cad dang // bdag gi bsod nams
294b3(rgyud): 'bras 'gyur dang // sngags kyi dngos grub rab sbyin cing // a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ la l-I/ e ai/ oM o// aM aH/ hU~M swA hA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rjes de
294b4(rgyud): gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud dri bde ba chen po'i rdo rjebadud d+hi rgyud chen po las sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa
294b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o// / khyod la mig sman bshad par bya// tshal chen gyi ni snying po yi// ban byed la ni dud ba blangs// 'gro pa'i mgo bo bsregs
294b6(rgyud): nas su// khrag chen dang ni bsres par byas// mtshan mo la ni btags na su// zhib mor phye mAr kho nar bya// bya rgod rje ngar bkang nas su// mi yi rus pa'i thur mang gis// mig la
294b7(rgyud): bskus nas gzugs kun gyi// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis byed// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// mig sman dngos grub sbyor ba ni// nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la// b+ha ga'i dbus
294b8(rgyud): su bsgrub par bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang 'gugs las byed do// sna tshogs drag po'i gdon rnams dang // zhag bzhi pa yi rims dang dug/ thams cad med par
295a1(rgyud): byed lha mo// dga' ma khyod la bden par bshad// rgyal po'i khab na chen por mchod// dgra bo rnams kyang zad byed de// de bzhin bgegs kyang 'gag par byed// smrig/ 
295a2(rgyud): sman+da ldan par bzla bar bya// oM 'dod pa'i gzugs can mig yangs ma// bshang gci khrag la dga' byed ma// zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i lha mo// drag po'i gzugs can mA ma ki
295a3(rgyud): hriM hUM hUM hUM oM aHa ha hU~M swA hA// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// de kho na bzhin g.yas ni dkar// g.yon ni dmar por de rig nas// g.yas phyogs phyogs ral gri 'khor lo can// g.yon
295a4(rgyud): du zhags pa dang lcags kyu// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu ya dang // b+ha ga'i dbus su sgom byas te// de la mig sman bsgrub par bya// b+ha dag gur gum gyis bkang nas// phyin ling ga
295a5(rgyud): gzhug par bya// de la brjod par bya sngags ni// oM yi ga sgra yig phye ba dang // badz+ra a mri ta zhes bzho// sgra sgrogs sprin dang pha Ta yig go/ bdud rtsi dang ni mnyam ldan pas// b+ha/ 
295a6(rgyud): ga'i dbus nas dbyung bar bya// de la sngags 'bum bzlas nas su// de yis thig le kho nar bya// bud med kyis khyo 'khol 'gyur te// mdun nas don bcas rgyal po yang // skyes pa
295a7(rgyud): gang gis de byas na// bud med gang la skal can 'gyur// rgyal po khab can chen por ched// dgra bo rnams ni zad byed do// dur dur arka'i 'bras blangs te// bdud rtsi dang ni bsrel
295a8(rgyud): byas na// zhal gsum drag po'i gzugs dang ni// gshen rje gshed khro bzlas nas su// sha chen dang ni ldan byas te// chang dang bsres la sbyin par bya// rtag tu myos nas 'khor
295b1(rgyud): nas su// mi nI bskams nas shi 'gyur ro// oM hrIHSh+TI wi kr-i tA na na sarba sha trUM nA sha ya// stam b+ha ya/ mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT// sngags pas gi'u wang blangs na// b+ha ga la ni yig 'bru bri/ 
295b2(rgyud): tsan dan gyis ni mnyam byugs nas// khyod dang lhan cig gnas par bya// gnas ma dag ni bde chen te// 'khor gi yog dngos por 'gyur bar ro// bshang gci gzugs brnyan
295b3(rgyud): byas nas su// sha chen gyis ni spos dbul te// dgra yi skra yis dkris byas nas// rus pa'i phye mas byug par bya// dgra sgor brkos nas sbas byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni shi 'gyur
295b4(rgyud): ro/ kha shang gci khrag dang bsras pa yi// sha chen gyis ni sbyin bsreg bya// dur khrod kyi ni sreg shing yang // shing gci ga pa dang lam mdon// me yi hom khung bris
295b5(rgyud): nas su// nyin phyed na mded sbyin bsreg bya// khro chen ga shin rje'i gshed po yi// sku la thal bas bsdus pas ni// bsgoms nas dgral cher gnon na// gdon mi za bar shi
295b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rjes des gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku dang // gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po
295b7(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las las chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u lnga pa'o// / rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// sgrub pa mdor
295b8(rgyud): bsdus bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa yang // de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes// khams gsum rnam rgyal las byung yin// gru bzhi par ni thig gdab ste// grwa gang
296a1(rgyud): yang na khru do'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa la// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad bzhag/ zhal gsum de bzhin phyag drug ste// rgyun
296a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis yongs rdzogs pa// phyag rgya yis ni phyag rgya na pa// rig ma bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa// u ma'i sras pa'i nu mar bzhugs// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po// khro dang
296a3(rgyud): ldan par bzhad byed zhal// g.yas pa la ni mda' bris to// de kho na bzhin g.yon gzhu// phyag bzhi pa ni bris bal// phyag gnyis pas ni nu ma bsdams// rig ma thams cad zhal gsum/ 
296a4(rgyud): ste de bzhin sgo srung lcags kyu dang // de bzhin me todag spos mam// dri yang yang dag bri bar bya// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin dpyang sa// gar mkhan ma yang phyag drug nyid// de bzhin// 
296a5(rgyud): gling bu ma bri ste// pi wang ma dang rnga chen ma// rdza rnga ma dang sil snyan kun// dkyil 'khor la ni bri ba'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud tshon las// skal ba bzang po yang bzhag ste// phyag
296a6(rgyud): gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// bzang po de dag kho na'o// rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa// sgrub pa po yang mdun bri'o// bgrang phreng de bzhin rdo rje dang // dril bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya// 
296a7(rgyud): gtor ma'i gtor ma mchod rdzas dang // chang skye mas ro dang dga' sngon mchod// nag po brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// dkyil 'khor la ni rdul tshon gdab// dbus su gru bzhi bri ba'o// 
296a8(rgyud): gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sngags yig gcig pa gtso bo ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgrub par bya// phyi nas slob dpon la mchod pa// bdag gam rgyal srid dbang nyid dam/ 
296b1(rgyud): dran mo bu mo de bzhin du// ma dang sring mo dbul bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yi// dngos grub gal te bdag 'dod ma/ khams gsum rnam rgyal las byung ni// sngags/ 
296b2(rgyud): pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ngo // bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pa// ngan song thams cad med byed pa// rdo rje se gol mnyam
296b3(rgyud): sbyor gyis// dpal lnga rdo rje hUM mdzad 'grub// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i// byang sems rnam par sprul par gsungs// lan grangs du mar rig ma dang // dkyil 'khor du ni
296b4(rgyud): rol par bya// bA ga'i dbus la myang byas pa// gang dag dpa' bo sngags la gnas// pad mar kha yI'o byas nas// ba dung rtsi khu ba kho nar blang // lag pa yi ni sor
296b5(rgyud): mo la// gnas de la ni blang mi bya// blang bar gyur na 'jig 'gyur nas// mthu'ang 'jigs nas 'bras bu med// rig ma chen mos kyang phyung nas// rdo rje la yang 'o gdab
296b6(rgyud): de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// khu ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsu
296b7(rgyud): dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sgrub pa bsten pa zhes bya ba'i le'u drug pa'o// 
296b8(rgyud): de nas lha mo mA ma ki/ dga' ba'i rol par cher bzhugs pas// thal mo sbyar nas phyag byas nas// dbyangs 'di dag ni ched du brjod// dpa' bo chu skyes sngon po'i sku// dpa'
297a1(rgyud): po gzhan gyis yongs bskor zhing // phyag rgya mtshogs mnyam ldan pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdug phyag 'tshal// ston gyin mkha' dang 'dra ba// nga ro brang ba sgra sgrogs la
297a2(rgyud): brgal bar bzhugs pa skal bzang ba// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad mdzes// yang dag dbang po lam gyis ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/ 
297a3(rgyud): ma lus pa yi khams gsum la// rdo rje bdud rtsi dpe med pas// nyi shu rtsa bzhi rigs chen mo// shin tu chags pas dga' byed pa// sen mo rjes dang bcas pa'i sku// rdo rje bdud
297a4(rgyud): rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ud pal sngon po'i 'dab mad lta bur phyag sngo ba// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje khyod kyis bdag dang ni// shin tu dga' ba'i rjes su chags
297a5(rgyud): khas long spyod cig/ khams gsum la ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyis phyir// khyod ni skyon med dam pa'i stong pa las// yig 'brus rdo rjes gyur pa'i mgon po khyod/ 
297a6(rgyud): rgyu dang mi rgyu gong gis khyod mthong nas// de dag 'khor ba ru ni ga la 'gro/ de ltar dbyangs ni blangs nas su// rdo rje gar ni rnam par byed// rked pa dang ni rkang pa dang // dpung pa dang ni mgo bo'i gar// 
297a7(rgyud): gir gyi gzhung gi mtshan nyid do// rjes thabs rjes su rim stong pa dang 'gying bag ste// rgyas dang 'dud dang gsal po ru// rgyas pa dang ni sprin bskyod gar// lag pa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba
297a8(rgyud): yis// stabs brgyad kyis ni gar byed bya// rgyas pa'i pad ma mA ma ki/ gar byas nas ni lha mo des// rdo rje cing gis rdo rje ni// rdo rje be cona'o btab byed// de nas bcom ldan
297b1(rgyud): rdo rjes kyang // 'o ba tab mA ma ki pad mar// ston cig lha mo pad ma ni// de la mchod pa brtsam par bya// bzhugs shig mi g.yo bar rig mo// bdud rtsi bsam gtan brtsam
297b2(rgyud): bar bgyi// de bzhin nyid mchog brtsam ba ni// bdud rtsi thig le'i gzugs can ste// mkha' yi dbus su zla ba 'dra// stong pa de nyid chad du brjod// 'jigs med zad med
297b3(rgyud): phra mo ni// rdo rje sems dpa' 'joms byed pa// lte ba'i dbus su gnas lha mo// snying po gsang ba'i spyod yul la// khu ba'i gzugs kyis zag nas su// b+ha ga ring ga'i dkyil
297b4(rgyud): dkyil du gnas// 'di ni srogs chags kyi ni srog/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po brten// sangs rgyas de bzhin rdo rje 'ji na// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// sa dang / 
297b5(rgyud): chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang na mkha' kho na yang / g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum la ni ma lus par// de ni bdag gis rtag tu bsam// de las skyed
297b6(rgyud): de bdag dang khyod// tshangs pa lha dbang khyab 'jug sogs// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// shes bya shes pa'i bdag nyid gtso// de nyid dam pa de bsam mo// skye ba
297b7(rgyud): dang ni shi ba dang // thams cad de la 'dus pa yin// skyed pa byed pa po de gcig/ rang ba dag gyur pa lhan cig pa// thams cad mkhyen pa kun nas kun// zhi nas zhi ba khyab pa po// ci phyir/ 
297b8(rgyud): khang pa de bkang bas// de bas skyes bur bshad pa yin// lus la gnas phyir lus can te// shed byed phyir na shes par 'dod// bdag la bdag gis rig pa'i lha// de phyir lha
298a1(rgyud): zhes 'dod pa yin// 'jug las khyab 'jug ces gsungs te// ngag gis rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur// ston du med pa gsang ba 'di// nan tan du ni gsang bar bya// snron
298a2(rgyud): can min dang g.yon can min// dam tshig la ni mi sdang ba// chad par lta ba med pa la// bla ma la chags 'dul ba can// phrag dog chags pa spong byed pa// dkyil 'khor la ni zhug
298a3(rgyud): pa dang // rdo rje bsten pa'i slob ma dag/ de la rgyas pa'i bstan pa 'di// de bzhin nyid mchog bshad par bya// slob dpon rig ma dang ldan nas// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// 
298a4(rgyud): rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsu rangs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thu rigs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi 'de ba chen po'i rdo rje bdu
298a5(rgyud): rtsi rgyud chen po las dbyangs dang // gar dang / dbang bsku re ba dang / de bzhin nyid cher dmigs pa dag bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u dadu na pa'o// / 
298a6(rgyud): de nas lha mo yang langs nas// bzhad nas 'di dag zhu ba ste// bcom ldan 'di la the tsom zos// dam pa'i ngo mtshar bdag bskyed de// zhi gzug rdo rje can de las// khro bo'i gzugs ni ci ltar 'gyur// 
298a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te// khro bo'i gzugs ni rnam par phyung // 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag po can// 'jigs byed la yang 'jig
298a8(rgyud): bar byed// zhal bzhi la ni phyag brgyad de// thod pa'i dbu rgyan 'jig par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bsdams te// thod pa dang ni khrag dga' ba// gtum po rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa// 
298b1(rgyud): rig ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// dur khrod chen po bzhir bzhugs pa// phaT yig sngags kying ro can// 'byung po ro langs tshogs pa dang // dur khrod la ni rol mdzad pas// 
298b2(rgyud): 'og dbang dang bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bza' byed rdo rje can chen mo// dpal ldan khrig 'thung gzugs ni phyung // dang po'i rig ma'i 'jigs can ma/ 
298b3(rgyud): mi sdug gdol pa sme sha can// ser mo rigs can drag mo dang // 'jigs par byed ma brgyad du 'dod// sngags 'di dag gi bzla byas te// gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo // 'jigs
298b4(rgyud): byed chen po mche ba gtsigs// rgyu ma phreng rnga gi rgya dan skud brgyan// sha chen dag ni gsol byed pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung bdag phyag 'tshal// sgrub pa po rnams phan byed
298b5(rgyud): phyir// bzlas pa'i sngags ni bshad par bya// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa sbyor// bdun pa yi yang gsum pa ste// gnyis kyi cho ga ni gnyis su sbyor// 
298b6(rgyud): kun la de bzhin nyid ldan te// yi ge phyed kyis rnam par brgyan// drug pa'i bzhi pa phyung byas te// bdun pa'i dngos pos gdan du bya// bcu gsum pa yis steng gnon pa'i// swA hA mtha
298b7(rgyud): bzhag sngags ni phyung // dang po rnam par snang mdzad dbul// khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i sngags yin no// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi// mthu chen nyon cig mA ma kI/ lan cig tsam gyis sngags
298b8(rgyud): bzlas na// skad cig 'jig rten gsum 'jig go/ khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang // zos par byed par the tsom med// de yis 'dod pa thams cad sbyin// dpal ldan khrag
299a1(rgyud): 'thung mnyam 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
299a2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las dpal ldan khrag 'thung bskyed pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// gzugs ni
299a3(rgyud): yang dag bshad par bya// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// drag po nag po dud pa'i 'od// 'od zer phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang // gtum mos spyan ni dmar po can// dmar ba'i smin ma ag/ 
299a4(rgyud): choms 'bar// drag chen po ni zil gyis gnon// / phyag na dgras bsnams brtson pa// gtun shing rdo rje zhags pa dang // / g.yon gyi phyag gi bsdigs mdzub kyis// sdang ba
299a5(rgyud): thams cad bsdigs par byed// ral gri phyag mtsha na po sgom par bya// rig ma brgyad dang mnyam ldan zhing // sgo srung dang yang yang dag ldan// gsang ba'i pad+ma bsgom byas te/ 
299a6(rgyud): 'dab mar rig ma brgyad ni bkod// bdud rtsi ma dang bdud rtsi zhal// bdud rtsi can dang bdud rtsi spyan// grangs med ma dang gzugs bzang ma// mdzes pa'i gzugs can bde grub ma// tham
299a7(rgyud): cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste// phyogs dang mtshams la dgod par bya// phyag gis pad+ma bsnams par brtson// de dag lha mo gar byed nas// sna tshogs gzugs rnams mchog
299a8(rgyud): sbyin ma// bzhed cing rol par mdzad byed do// sngags kyi rgyal po dbyung bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul nas// chog 'di yis ni yongasu dgang // dang po yi ni gnyis pa ste/ 
299b1(rgyud): stong banyid ni gdan ldan pa// stong pas steng nas gnon pa'i sngags// mtha' nas swA hA sbyor byed do// gtan du shin tu dga' 'byor nas// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi phung nas su// bdud rtsi 'ang
299b2(rgyud): rtsi sbyor ba yi// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgrub par bya// don kun dngos grub thams cad yang // de yis myur bar sgrub par 'gyur// po 'am gal te mo dag gis// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dran
299b3(rgyud): byed na// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsu ma// de yi phyag mthil lo kun gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// dus rtag par ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
299b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdza rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyang chen po las dpal bdu kyi 'khyil pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le
299b5(rgyud): dgu pa'o// de nas ro longs chen po yis// sgrub pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// ni ga po'i chos brgyad bcu bzhi la// lig gcig dang
299b6(rgyud): lam mdo dang // shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri dang chu 'gram de rnams la// las thams cad ni bsgrub bya ste// de bzhin re longs slong ba ni// 'gag nas shi ba mo rnams ni/ 
299b7(rgyud): mtshan thams cad ni kun rdzogs pa// gdol pa ma dang sme sha can// khyim chos ma rnams de dag ni// mdzes pa bzang ba rma med pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags pa ste// lo na nya
299b8(rgyud): shu rtsa lnga bskyed// bud med ro yi sra bzung ste// gtsang ba'i chu yis bkru bar bya// sngags dang sman gyis rdo le ba la// ga pur tsan dan dkar po yis// de la drug par bya byas te/ 
300a1(rgyud): sna tshogs me tog spos rnams kyis// mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar bya// mar khu chen pos bskus nas su// yungs kar ngo la brgyag par bya// khrag 'thung zhes
300a2(rgyud): bya sgrub pa pos// de la dkyil 'khor yang bri te// thod pa zhes bya zlag ma 'am// gzhu yi tshul gyis bkang bar bya// thod pas nye bar rgyan byed cing // rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bya// sha yi
300a3(rgyud): khams can thod pa dbang // kha T+wAM thams cad kyis 'dzin te// zhal gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// phyag drug ral gri phyag na 'dzin// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol du// sgo srung ma ni rab
300a4(rgyud): tu brtags// glang rngu dang ni glang chen na// zhal mdze ras de bzhin zhal gdug ma// drag mo zhag pa lpags kyu 'dzin// mo sdug 'jigs pas 'jig byed rnams// zhal gcig pa la
300a5(rgyud): phyag gnyis so// me tog mchod pa yang dag bri// rna ma pa sna tshogs rim pa yang // dkyil 'khor la ni mchod pa bri// de nas dpa' bo sgrub pa pos// dung chen gyis ni brgyan byas pa/ 
300a6(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng thod bcings pa yi// khrag 'thung gzugs ni sgom byed pas// de la cang te'u brdungs nas su// gar byed cing ni khang par 'jug/ de yi snying kar mnan pa'i sngags// b+h+rU~M yig
300a7(rgyud): ge la bzla bya ste// lha yi dkyil 'khor mchod nas su// khrag chen gyis ni gtor bar bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags chen ni// sgrub pa pos ni bzlas ma thag/ khro dang ldan pa'i ag
300a8(rgyud): bcar bya// ro langs kyis ni gang spogs byed// de tshe sngags pas mi 'jigs te// khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya// langs pa'i ro langs de yis yang // sgrub pa po la 'di skad smras
300b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po kye las gang yang // bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang // mkha' la rgyu bar 'dod pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod pa// las de dag ni grub par
300b2(rgyud): bgyi// de nas sgrub pa po la ni// yid la gang dang gang 'dod bsrung // de ltar thams cad bsgrub bya ba// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma ki/ ro longs sgrub pa'i mchog gyur pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung yin
300b3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du// sgrub pa po yi bde yang 'dren// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su dang // gsung dang
300b4(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rjebadud rtsi rgyud chen po las ro langs sgrub pa bstan pa ces bya ba le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje tsam
300b5(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te// 6 da mi gsung bar cher bzhugs so// dbugs dgags phyir nas mi g.yon// mi 'jigs pa dang mi gsung bar// ting 'dzin mchog
300b6(rgyud): la bzhugs pa la// mA ma kIs ni yang zhus to// bcom ldan rdo rje phra mo ni// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// tsau ltar rnam pa gang gis ni// de bzhin nyid de thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan
300b7(rgyud): rdo rje ca ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bzhad pa mdzad nas gsung 'di ni// spyan yang phye nas bka' stsal pa// de nyid sngon bzhin bshad pa ste// bdud rtsi gzugs ni khu ba yin// bdud rtsi lnga dang / 
300b8(rgyud): ldan byas te// rtag par rgyun tu myang bar bya// rdzas ni re re'i mthu dag ni// bshad pa nyon cig mA ma ki/ ye shes shes bya sgrub byed pa'i// khu padangs par bza' bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi
301a1(rgyud): slub don du// khrag chen rab tu bsgrub bya ste// gang zhe bud med rnams kyi 'am// bu mo yi ni rtag tu blangs// khrag chen des ni mA ma ki/ don ni thams cad byed pa po// drag
301a2(rgyud): shul shi ba rnyed na ni// sha chen po yang bza' bya ste// gsal shing btsugs dang 'gegs pa'am// g.yul du bsad pa gang de ni// zab cing brten pas za byed na// tshe dang nad med 'phel bar
301a3(rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa'i bde ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'tsho// 'dod kun 'bras bu des sbyin no// rdo rje chu dang bshang gci ni// rang gis bza' bar/ 
301a4(rgyud): rig par bya// phye ma zhib mor byas pa la// khrag chen gyi/ sa ni bse bar bya// snga dro de bzhin nyin ched dang // phyi dro la ni bza' bar bya// / dus gsum zos nas rnal 'byor pas// de nas rdo rje
301a5(rgyud): chu ni btung // nyin dang nyin du mA ma kI/ sgrub pa po gang sgrub byed pa// lus la nad no med 'gyur zhing // rgas pa'i nad kyang med par byed// skal bzang rgyas pa'i ma dang ldan pa// rgyal po'i
301a6(rgyud): sgor yang rgyal bar 'dren// des na 'dod pa kun sbyin pas// mchog rab de nyid thob pa yin// rnal 'byor de yang kun shes te// rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// 'dod chags zhe sdang las
301a7(rgyud): grol nas// brkam pa phrag dog rnam spangs nas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// de yis sgrub pa 'grub po'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni// don mang gsang ba'i rim pa can// ma lus rdo rje theg
301a8(rgyud): pa 'di// 'di las byung gyur lha mo kye// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI sa// 'dod chags kyis ni bde 'gyur bas// khyod la dam pa'i dngos ston na// bdag gis gang la yang mi ston// 'di ni gsang
301b1(rgyud): chen dam pa yin// yid dag kun gyi bdag la gnas// byang chub sems dpa' ma shes te// gzugs med stong pa mi 'gyur bas// de na de nyid rig chen po// rdo rje spyi gtsug nor bu
301b2(rgyud): 'dodaka shin tu gsang nas gzungs lha mo// pha dang bu la'ang bstan mi bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdan du gsang ba bstan pa dang // bla ma la chags brtul zhugs bstan
301b3(rgyud): de la sbyin nas de nyid bsten// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni// bde 'grub shin tu thob dka' ba// yang dag rdzogs pas bskal bzang zhi// snyin po ye shes 'dus pa yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen
301b4(rgyud): sgrub pa po gang dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// de la kun gyis phyag byed de// phyag ni lan gsum byas na/ sa su// rdo rje slob dpon skal bzang mchog/ de nyid sam/ 
301b5(rgyud): can thams cad kyi// 'khor ba las 'dren gtso zhes ga sungs/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po// ston pas dga' ma la bsten
301b6(rgyud): nas/ phra mo'i gzugs su rdo rje can// de nas b+ha gar cher bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang // thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las bdud
301b7(rgyud): rtsi lnga sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud lo tsA ba gyi tso zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
301b8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ku la lo ka nA thA pany+tsa da sha ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan rigs kyi 'jig rte mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas/ 
302a1(rgyud): 'di ni mchog tu gsang // 'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa'i mchog/ rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas// gnyis med sngags ni rab bshed bya// dam tshig spyod
302a2(rgyud): pa nges par grol// bya ba dus chod rnam par spangs// de nyid gsum ldan yang dag lha// 'jig rten mgon po 'gro ba'i bdag/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa'i lha// mthong dang ma mthong
302a3(rgyud): 'bras rab ster// de 'dir sngags ni mtshungs med pa// bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas// drag chen 'jig rten lus la ni// lnga pa'i thig le dang bcas shing // rnam gcod dang po
302a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan// chen po lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas// lus gsum gyis ni sngag ma cho ga la// yi ge rnams kyi bsdu ba las// mtshan
302a5(rgyud): nyid cho ga bzhin du bzlas// 'di yi rjes dran sngags pa ya sa// gtsang ngam yang na mo gtsang rung // lha bzhin mthong ba lha rnams kyis// / de yi lha mo 'dod lha bzhin// 'di bzhin sngags kyi
302a6(rgyud): 'dod lha yi// bya ba med cing sgrub pa'ang med// mchod med me la sbyin sreg med// rnal 'byor/ ldan dang yang dag ldan// dus tshod rnams las rnam nges grol// rtse gcig sems ni
302a7(rgyud): g.yo mi byed// sgrib pa dang bral mtshungs pa yi// mchog gi bsam gau tan yang dag spyad// rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi le'u
302a8(rgyud): ste dang pa'o// / snying kha'i 'khor lo'i nang song ba'i// de nyid gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro// dbye ba nyis 'gyur de las ni// ye shes nyid ni kun 'gro byas// mi 'gyur
302b1(rgyud): dga' ba'i yul rig pa// sems kyi rjes su rtogs pa can// bya ba de yi bde 'dod phyir// rtogs pa kun nas 'jug par 'gyur// de yi ngo bo rtogs nyid 'jug/ de sems dga' ba'i
302b2(rgyud): spyod yul la// bya ba dang ni las rnams kun// tshig dang bcas pas the tsom med// bsam gtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan// brtan par dgod bya blo ldan gyis// 'gro kun dgra yi
302b3(rgyud): rang bzhin gyi// sa steng sa 'og mtho ris sgrub// lte ba'i pad mar pa da ma che// rnam gsum na mkha'i nang song ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// nam mkha' phyag rgya'i bdag nyid bzhin// 
302b4(rgyud): srog 'bab pa yi tshad kyis ni// gnas gnyis po ra yis goms par bya// de bzhin rab tu dgod byas nas// 'jig rten ma dgon po'i sku ru 'gyur// gang gis gzhan du bzlas
302b5(rgyud): byas dang // las rnams kyang ni sgrub byas na// de ni mkha 'al khu tshur bsdun// rmongs pas spun stong 'joms par byed// bsam gtan sbyor bas cho ga bzhin// las gang rtag tu bya
302b6(rgyud): ba ste// de las myur du sgrub byed do// de yi las ni yid kyir 'dod// rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las bdag gi de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
302b7(rgyud): rang bzhin bsam gtan dang bcas shing // 'dza' te mtshal gyi 'od zer bzhin// se 'bru le brgan me tog bzhin// li khri dmar po dang mtshungs gtso// sngags kyi sku yi lnga yi
302b8(rgyud): lha// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// mkha' pad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// khyab bdag zhags pa lcags kyu bsdams// mchog sbyin phyag gis yang dag rol// mu tig nor
303a1(rgyud): bus rnam par brgyan// pad ma'i phyag dang spyan gsum po// gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs sku// dpa' bo dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon// rnal 'byor ma yi thugs
303a2(rgyud): dgyes pa// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// sngags rnams kun la bsam gtan bya// gang dang gang gis sgom pa yis// rnal 'byor goms par gyur pa'i phyir// de yis de yi/ 
303a3(rgyud): rang bzhin 'gyur// yid bzhin nor mchog ji bzhin no// lha ni dkar pos zhi rab ster// de bzhin ngag ni rab sad byed// dbang drang dgug pa'i de nyid la// sku mdog dmar po rnam par bsam/ 
303a4(rgyud): du ba dmar po'i 'od mdog can// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid gyis dkris pas// dgra bo rnams ni nyer smod pa// 'dir ni the tshom med/ par byed// du ba skya bo dmar ba yis// rnam par zhe sdang / 
303a5(rgyud): nges sbyor bas// bsad pa la ni kha dog gnag/ rengs pa la ni ser por shes// lug gi steng du gnas pa la// rkan gyi bar du rnam phug na// srid pa gsum du gang gang gnas// thAd rab
303a6(rgyud): tu rmongs par byed// gzhan dag rmongs pas ci zhig bya// don mong tshig ni rab 'dus pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi las rnams ni// yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yi// rgyud gzhan rnams la nyer spyod
303a7(rgyud): pa/ gsungs dang ma gsungs gyur pa ni// rang bzhin bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// bya ba 'di la the tsom med// gang zhig lha ni na mkha' mtshungs// kha dog dbye bas so so ste// 'jig rten
303a8(rgyud): gsum na gang spyod pa'i// las rnams thams cad bya ba'o// skal bzang byed pa'i sngags rnams ni// snying kha'i chu skyes dbus song ba// snying ka'i chu skyes sbyor ba yis// dbang la sogs pa
303b1(rgyud): yang dag sgrub// yi ge gsum dang bcas pa'i lha// steng du 'gro ba gsum ldan pas// mi rnams las ni rtag sgrub pa// rnal 'byor ma rnams zhal la gnas// rnam pa gsum ni 'gugs
303b2(rgyud): par byed// pad+ma gzugs ldan gyur pas mdzes// rtag sbyor rgyun tu rnal 'byor pas// mar me g.yo med gnas pa bzhin// sngon gsungs lha yi lha dbang phyug/ skya reng dmar po dang mtshung
303b3(rgyud): 'od// mtshan mo phyed kyi dus gnas la// rnal 'byor nyid ni yangs spyod// de yi gzugs 'dzin lus la ni// yang dag sngon du bkod pa yis// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lha// 
303b4(rgyud): bsgru bya'i lus la yang dag blang // thams cad bla ma/ da'i zhal la gnas// zhags pa lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis// de las lba/ dgas kyu bsnun nas ni// zhags pa yis ni 'gug
303b5(rgyud): par byed// rnam par myos shing lus ni dmar// yang de nga yang du brgyal gyur te// bug sgo dgu nas bsnun nas// khrag ni rab tu 'a bab par byed// sgrib pa med pa dang mtshungs par// 
303b6(rgyud): rang lus rnam par lta bar bya// de yi dbugs las bzhengs pa'i sngags// yi ge'i dbang po dang por bsam// 'bar zhing 'bar ba lta bu yi// kha yi sgo ru sngon 'dod rol// pad ma'i
303b7(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin de yang ni// kha yi nang nas nges par 'byung // bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim gyur te// ji srid de snying chu skyes la// gang zhig de yi snying gnas pa// 'dir ni de'i snying kun nas phrogs
303b8(rgyud): mer mer por ni blangs pa yis// sgrol ma'i gzugs bzhin yid 'phrog pa// de ni gsum pas cho ga bzhin// rlung gi lo ma g.yo ba ltar// rang gi khyim du thim par sgom// gcig gi
304a1(rgyud): ngo bor gyur pa mchog/ lha dang lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs// mtshan mo mdun du bsgrub par bya// bran gyi ngo bos 'jug 'gyur zhing // 'tsho ba dang ni nor gyis kyang // sa steng 'chi/ 
304a2(rgyud): rten slar ci smos// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sngags kyi dbang po sgrub pa pos// rang dbang med rnams sbyar mi bya// sngags kyi rgyal dbang bzlas byas pas// rgyal srid sgrub pa de
304a3(rgyud): mchog go// gzhan du gang gis rab bsgrubs na// bud med 'dod pas long bzhin myos// gal te lha yi bu mo yang // de yi skad cig nyid la 'chi// rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa
304a4(rgyud): las lha'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gsu pa'o// / 'jig rten dbang phyug snying po mchog/ sra zhing srog bzhin yang dag srung // dam tshig spyod pa dman
304a5(rgyud): pas kyang // 'dren pa'i bdag nyid sngags bzlas bya// gcig pu grogs dang bral byas te// blo dang ldan pas 'bum du bzlas/ de yi mngon sum 'ong 'gyur te// 'khor lo gsum du le/ 
304a6(rgyud): 'gro mchog/ 'jig rten thams cad 'byin pa dang // bdud pa dang ni yang dang yang // nam mkha'i go 'phang der 'gro ste// dran pas 'di la the tsom med// sems dang sems med sbyor ba na// sems ni// 
304a7(rgyud): sems med la nges mthong // sems ni sems ma la thim nas// rab 'jug lus skyes ma rnams la// nad bcas nad med pa dang ni// nad med de bzhin nad bcas byed// zhags pa lpags
304a8(rgyud): kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog sngags kyi rgyal po'i dbang pos so// gzhan du byis pa rmongs pa yis// zla ba 'dzin par 'dod pa bzhin// gang zhig rang bzhin sbyor bral bas// las rnams sgrub
304b1(rgyud): pabade mchog min// gang gis gsum gsum gnas skabs gsum// 'jig rten mgon po nyid rigs nas// chu 'dzin bral ba'i na mkha' bzhin// 'jig rten mgon po'i go 'phang 'gro// zhes
304b2(rgyud): pa ni dpal pad+ma 'bar ba'i rgyud chen po las phyung ba rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/ byang
304b3(rgyud): chu ba rin chen gyis bskul nas/ shud ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA ku ru kul+le kal+la/ bod skad du/ 
304b4(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nor gyur pa la phyog 'tshal lo// 'a phag ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor
304b5(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i rgyud/ gzhung dang rtog pa nyam shing nub par gyur nas yang // sgrol ma 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin zhes bya rgyud kyi gtso// de yang nga nub par gyur nas rtog pa 'di yang 'byung // sems can
304b6(rgyud): mang ba'i don du rnal 'byor pa// rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud las bsdus byas nas// rtog pa 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyan bar gyis// 'jig
304b7(rgyud): rten skyabs med gyur la rnam ltas nas// 'gro kun don byed pa yi tshul 'di ni// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal gyur/ bltas nas// gus pa chen pos khyed kyis blang bar bya'o// 'jig
304b8(rgyud): rten rnam rtog zhi bar bya phyir rtog pa 'di// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni rab tu gsungs// dpal ldan gru 'dzin ri la 'jam dpal dang // pad+ma bsnams dang rgyal bar byed pa dang // sgrib pa
305a1(rgyud): rnam sel blo gros rgya mtsho dang // byams pa la sogs tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// gang yang chos kyi tshig 'di thos gyur nas// rjes su yi rang spyi bos
305a2(rgyud): gus phyag byas// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mnga' byas bstod pa'am// yang na glu dang dbyangs dag byas pa yis// sna tshogs gar gyis 'di ni mchod pa byas// gnod sbyin srin po yi dgas 'jig
305a3(rgyud): rten dang // sna tshogs bu mo dang ni rgyu skar dang // sa yi dbang dang lag na rdo rje dang // rlabs rnams sna tshogs can gang gnas pa yi// klu yi bu mo zur gyis lhubs blta ba dang // sa 'og skyong dang lnga
305a4(rgyud): dbang grub pa'i bu mos mchod// dri za'i rgyal mo nu ma shi ran tu rgyas pa dang // rig pa 'dzin dang mi'am ci yi chung ma dang // gnod sbyi ngan chung ma ri yi bu mo'i bu dag ni// gang yin bdag
305a5(rgyud): cag skyabs med ces ni 'di skad smra// gang phyir skyab sa med skyabs gyur sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dir// mgon med mgo na gyur 'jig rten mgon po khyod// bde ba bskyed cing // 
305a6(rgyud): ngo mtshar che gyur gang // mgon po tshigs kyi tshigs dbang 'di thos nas// nyid kyi dbang du byed pa'i gsang sngags gsungs// sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kun thos pas// mthar thug
305a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdi bdu ma 'byung // rdo rje reg pas khams kyang 'dzag par 'gyur// zur gyi sa lta bar byed pas lta byed cing // rkang pa dag kyang sa la gya tsam 'dor// 'dod chags shin tu
305a8(rgyud): bde bas khu 'bab tshe// 'di ltar mthong nas lha yi bu mo la// 'gro ba dbang byed ku ru ku l+le'i sngags// ras ris bri dang gsang sngags sgrub pa'i phyir// dus la bab pa'i tshig 'di mgon
305b1(rgyud): spros zhes// de ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs// de tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug las rnams rab tu gsungs// ku ru ku we'i ri mo'i lugs// gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni/ 
305b2(rgyud): sgrub pa po yis 'bras thob pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis// tshes grangs gang dang dus gang la// sgrol ma 'byung las bshed pa'i bzhin// de ni bdag gis
305b3(rgyud): bshad par bya// ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis// gang gi mig ni dmar 'gyur zhing // lag pa de bzhin rkang pa dmar// bya yi mig can e n+ya'i rkang // des ni sgrol ma bri bar bya// dpyid kyi zla
305b4(rgyud): ba dang po yi// mya ngan med pa'i tshes brgyad nyin// thu na ni phyed dang gnyis pa la// sgrol ma'i mig ni bri bar bya// mngaragasu dam bza' zhing nyal sogs// sha dang chang yang srung
305b5(rgyud): bar bya// dmar po'i gos kyang rtag tu bgo/ dmar ba dri yis rtag tu byug/ byam pa'i sems ni bskyed byas la// tho rangs khrus byas pa sangs nas su// lan gsum gos ni rjes
305b6(rgyud): nas su// dbang du byed ma yang dag bri// zhal gcig mig ni yangs pa dang // phyag bzhi ma la gur gum mdog/ bcu drug lo lon sgeg bcas 'dra// bud med sgyu ma rgyags pa bri// gnon/ 
305b7(rgyud): nu ma dmar ser mos byas pa'i skud pa las ras byas la// de dang thags mkhan gnyis ka zan dang 'o ma bza' bar bya zhing // de nas pad+ma'i gdan la stod g.yogs dmar po'i gos dang / 
305b8(rgyud): bcas par rin po che'i rtserna cha dang // rin po che'i cod pan dang // g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / gnyis pas mda' rna rtser 'gengs pa// g.yon pas gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 
306a1(rgyud): ud pal dmar po gnyis pa na bsnams pa dang // 'od dpag med cod pan na bzhugs pa ri'i phug na gnas pa'i ku ru l+le'o// ku ru le'i 'og tu ni sgra can no// de'i
306a2(rgyud): steng du 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa'o// 'dod pa'i lha'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de la pad+ma dmar po'i gdan no// de la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can gyi
306a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma bris la/ ras ris rab tu gnas pa bya'o// de'i mdun du mchod pa rnam pa bco brgyad byas la yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// sgrol ma'o
306a4(rgyud): snying po na 'di yin te// mo ku ru kul+le hrI hUM swA hA/ zhe/ ras bya ba'i sngags so// de nas sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum tsam byas la/ yang ston zla tha chungs sam// dpyid zla 'bring po 'am/ dbyar/ 
306a5(rgyud): zla 'bring po'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i dus tshogs kyi nyin par tho rangs kyi khrus byas la gso sbyong bzung nas mchod pa tha ma sa cad kyis mchod la// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchod
306a6(rgyud): ston ga sol// de nas theg pa chen po gsang sngags pa'i tshogs la mchod ston byas nas yon phul lo/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar
306a7(rgyud): nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang bar bya'o// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang na bzhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la dga' ba'i tshogs rnams la phyag byas nas bzod par gsol te/ gang
306a8(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris bkram pa'i phyogs der nye bar song la// dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i don du rig pa 'dzin pas bsam gtan dang ldan par gnas la yi ge grangs kyi
306b1(rgyud): 'bub bzlas pa bya'o// cha gcig gis ni shes rab 'phel// cha gnyis kyis ni dbang du byed// gang zhig cha ni gsum pa yis// mis ni dug kyang 'gugs par 'gyur// tshogs shing 'gying ba'i/ 
306b2(rgyud): bud med rnams dang ni// 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// sbyor ba goms pas lha mo mdzes rnams la// sngags 'chang des ni ji ltar 'dod par spyod// de ming tsam gyis mchung
306b3(rgyud): med dug can 'bros// ga de ka'i gtso bo'i 'od kyis dpal ldan dag kyang nyo bzhin 'gyur// bzlas brjod ldan pas ngag gi dbang phyug byed 'gyur bas// rigs pas 'gyings pa'i stobs
306b4(rgyud): can mkhas pa'ang lan med byed// rig pa 'dzin pa gla dang po rta'i rgyub tu zhon pa dang // rig ma mdzes pas legs par 'khyud cing mgul nas 'jus pa las// sngags rig pa yi
306b5(rgyud): gtso bo'i stobs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur// mthar gyur pa yi rgyal srid longs spyod dag la yid kyis spyod// 'dod pa'i lha las dga' ba'i bu la sogs pas ri khrod ma// de bzhin sred
306b6(rgyud): med bu las dpa' mo mi phyed pa las bde sogs dang // tsho gas bdag las ni dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dkar mo dang // sa 'dzin lha las phun sum tshogs mnga' sngags kyis rnam rgyal bye/ 
306b7(rgyud): gsang sngags ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma gang zhig sgom byed pa// des ni sna tshogs gter dang gser dang dngul dang rna cha dang // gos la sogs pa'i nor rnams kun la chad du gang bas
306b8(rgyud): pa// sems kyis thams cad ma lus kun nas longs spyod byed// rgyal po las ni rgyal srid dbang po'i yul 'das pa'i shing las 'bras bu dang // klu dang klu chung rgya mtsho rnams las chu rnams/ 
307a1(rgyud): 'gugs// sngags dang ldan pas 'thung zhing zas la sngags kyis dag par byed// skye bo sngags med par ni longs spyod grub pa med// nag skyes glang po rta mchog ri dgas dang
307a2(rgyud): ldan pa// dug bcas gdengs ka can gyi sbrul mchog dang // chu srin chu klung stag dang bse dag dang // rang gi sngags kyi stobs kyis bkug nas ni/ zhon yang ngo mtshar med par byas pa'i mig
307a3(rgyud): dag gis// blta bar gal te gsang sngags grub pa de yis mthong bar 'gyur// gal te snying rje'i lta bas 'jig rten 'di ltar sdug bsngal bas// rgud par gyur pa'i mi mnyam pa la sngags
307a4(rgyud): pa des// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'jig rten la phan sgrol ma yin// 'jig rten ma lus sgrol mar byed cing zhi bar byed// bdud de rnams bcom nas nor gyi char rgyun 'bebs par byed// 
307a5(rgyud): dpag bsam shing du gyur nas 'gro rnams ci 'dod spyin par byed// nor gyi dbang phyug ma lus pa yi nor rnams kun bkug na/ sa// sems can ma lus kun la phan phyir sbyin par byed/ 
307a6(rgyud): de bzhin phongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams phyir gos dag dang // sten dang khyim dang bla re dag tu sgrol ma dang // rgya mtsho'i gling du tshong pa'i gru zhig phongs pa la// gzings dang gru la sogs par sgrol ma
307a7(rgyud): 'gyur// sgrol ma de bsgoms rnal 'byor pa// dang po sdug bsngal gyur pa de// de spang nas ni cung zhig na// mis ni ston mo rnyed par 'gyur// gnyis par gos ni rnyed par 'gyur// de bzhin btsun
307a8(rgyud): mo dang yang 'phrad/ de nas so rtsi long spyod 'gyur// ma blangs par yang ci 'dod spyod// gal te tshangs spyod yin na yang // lha mchog bskyed pa'i bu mo spyod// sems can gsod la dga' ba yis// 
307b1(rgyud): bstan pa 'di la 'grub mi 'gyur// dge ba bcu la dga' 'gyur zhing // theg pa che la sems cig pas// rdo rje chos kyi bka' bzhin du// dngos grub mchog ni des spyod 'gyur// 'di ni ras
307b2(rgyud): ris la 'jug pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o// chos mchod pa yi sbyor ba yis// gang gis chos nyid brnyes gyur na// chos kyi dbyings su rang gyur pa// de nas yang dag bshad
307b3(rgyud): par bya// de'i rjes la dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brag gi yi ge las byung ba// dpag bsam shing ni rnam par sgom// ud pa la yongasu gyur pa las// shing ni
307b4(rgyud): g.yon du bsgom par bya// sna tshogs nor gyi tshor pa dag/ na mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab pa yis// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byed pa// de ltar skom na nor bdag 'gyur// gling bzhi pa yi sems
307b5(rgyud): can rnams// sems kyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas// rtag tu rin chen bdun rang bzhin// de dag la ni rab sbyin bya// yongs kyi gtso bo rin chen dang // de bzhin rin chen rgya mtsho skyes// bud med rin
307b6(rgyud): chen rta rin chen// de bzhin ral gri rin chen dang // glang po rin chen sogs rin chen// sangs rgyas rnams la yid kyis dbul// bud med rgyan gyi sa brgyan byas la// sna tshogs gzugs can
307b7(rgyud): 'gying ba rnams// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod rnams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu dbul// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// rin po che ni
307b8(rgyud): yongs rgyas pa'i// yongs kyi gtso bo nor dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya// de bzhin rin chen gzhan dag kyang // gus dang bcas pas yongs btang na// rdo rje chos su
308a1(rgyud): gyur nas ni// sems can kun gyi don byed 'gyur// 'di ni dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sems nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do// sems nyid kyis ni rnam
308a2(rgyud): par grol// sems kyi 'ching ba rnams las thar// sems kyis grol ba dang ldan 'gyur// sems ma gtogs par dngos don rnams// gzhan dag gzhan par ma mthong ste// sangs rgyas
308a3(rgyud): nyid dang dngos grub kun// gang phyir phun tshogs gzhan ma mthong // gang yang snod dang sems can rnams// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa dag/ zag med lhag par mthong ba yis// sems
308a4(rgyud): tsam yin zhes rab tu bsgrags// de bas 'bad pa tha mas cad kyis// sems kyi me long spyis byas na// rang bzhin glo bur ba dayi skyon// rim gyis rab tu zad par 'gyur// 
308a5(rgyud): dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba// dri med rdzogs pa 'i zla ba ste// sems nyid zla bar bsgoms byas nas// de yi steng du sa bon dgod// dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ni// me yi
308a6(rgyud): mdog gi steng na gnas// yi ge i dang yang dag ldan// nam mkha' gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi sna tshogs 'od rnams kyis// 'gro ba dri ma med byas nas// stong gsum
308a7(rgyud): 'di sogs mkha' dbying te// ku ru kul+le'i rir zhugs pas// de yis sgrol ma bskul nas ni// bkug nas mdun du gnas par byed// de nas mkhas pas sa bon la// mchod
308a8(rgyud): pa chen po'i sprin rnams spo// me tog spos dang mar me dang // de bzhin dri dang lha ba shos sogs// phyag rgya phreng ba de bzhin du// gar dang glu yis mchod sogs mchod// dkon
308b1(rgyud): mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjesa'i rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // sngags 'di lan gsum brjod
308b2(rgyud): nas ni// de nas gshegs su gsol bar bgyi// sems ni byam pas gnas byas la// slar yang der ni gzhag par bya// snying rje'i sems ni bskyed byas nas// rab dga'i sems
308b3(rgyud): kyang bskyed par bya// phyi nas thams cad btang snyoms la// sems tsam la ni mnyam par gzhag tha mal rnam par spang ba'i phyir// sems kyang slar yang stong par bya// yang srid
308b4(rgyud): len pa'i phung po lnga// stong pa nyid kyis me yis bsre/ ga/ oM shu n+yat+tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ yud tsam stong pa'i rna/ rnal 'byor nyid// byas nas sems ni ngal sos bya// 
308b5(rgyud): sngon gyi dam bcas dran byas nas// sa bon tsam zhig yang dran bya// gcig pu mya ngan 'das pa yis// sems can bslus pa 'gyur ba'i phyir// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las// 
308b6(rgyud): bdag gis de dag ci ltar bsgral// 'di lta bsams nas brtse ldan des// sems med pa yi stong pa yang // chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sems// sems nyid kyis ni bskyed par bya// / 
308b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byin rlabs las sa bon// de la ud pal zhes byar 'gyur// ud pa la dkyil du zla ba'i gzugs// yi ge a las byung ba'o// slar yang zla ba der sa bon// de la 'od
308b8(rgyud): zer 'phros gyur pa// de yis ma lus 'jig rten khams// rnam par sbyangs par bsgom par bya// de yis sbyangs shing gsal byas nas// 'od zer kun gyis sangs rgyas tshogs// 
309a1(rgyud): ut+pal la zhugs bsgom par bya// de las sgrol ma 'byung bar 'gyur// bstan 'dra'i lha mo btsod mdog can// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa'i// dam tshig
309a2(rgyud): gzugs ni mnyam bskyed nas// ye shes 'khor lo yang dag bkug/ yud tsam gyis ni nges rdzogs pa'o// ye shes 'khor lo mdun gnas pa// dam tshig phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// 
309a3(rgyud): yi lam nas gzhug par bya// lag pa thal mo sbyar byas nas// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgom par bya// gung mo gnyis ni rtse mor sbyar// rtse mo'i nang du ming mod gzhug/ mdzub mo gnyis
309a4(rgyud): no dbu mar sbyar// mthe bong gnyis ni 'og tu bkug// / dam tshig phyag rgya 'dri bcings nas// 'khor lo bkug nas gzhug par bya// sangs rgyas rnams la tshigs bcad 'dis/ 
309a5(rgyud): dbang bskur bar ni gsol ba gdab// byang chubardo rje sangs rgyas la// ji lta mchod chen gsol mdzad pa// bdag kyang ba skyob pa'i don gyi phyir// na mkha' rdo rje deng bdag
309a6(rgyud): stsol// rgyal ba'i dbang bskur zhes bya bas// spyan la sogs pa lnga pa'o// rgyal po'i me tog dbang bskur zhing // chen por gyur pa de gsol mdzod// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba// 
309a7(rgyud): khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyis gnas las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas sgrol ma dbang bskur bas// chos ni gtsug
309a8(rgyud): gi nor bur 'gyur// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba gsum po snang bar byed// dbang bskur rin tshon thob 'gyur na// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// ji ltar
309b1(rgyud): slar bstan cho ga yis// lo phyed bstan par brtsams nas ni// gtor ma dus gsum btang bar bya// sngags 'di yis ni khar ba 'am// khur ba la sogs cho ga yis// rmi lam mtshan ma
309b2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// ral gri sa 'og dngos grub dang // mi snang ba dang bcud len dang // mi mthong ba dang mkha' spyod nyid// de bzhin rkang byug mig sman dang // rmi lam tshan ma ston 'gyur
309b3(rgyud): zhing // dngos grub rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te de la dga' 'gyur na// grub pa phra mo sgrol mas grub// 'khor lo sgyur nas rgyal srid dang // dbang po'i longs spyod thams cad
309b4(rgyud): khyad// sgom dang bzlas par ldan pa la// rmi lam du yang rab grub byed// zla drug tha ma'i zla gcig go/ mtshan cig rangs par bzlas byas te// ud pa la phyag rgya bcings nas na/ 
309b5(rgyud): bzlas nas phyag rgya yud kyis 'bar// phyag rgya 'di yi mthu yis ni// btsun mo dang bcas tshangs pa dang // dbang po nyer dbang drag po sogs// bkug nas dbang du 'gyur bar byed// 
309b6(rgyud): de nas brtsams nas dngos grub kun// bdag 'khor 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// chu dang 'dam kyi skyon dag gis// pad+ma gos par mi 'gyur ltar// dngul chu reg nas du mar 'gyur// bsdus
309b7(rgyud): nas slar yang gcig tu 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gyur na// dngos grub thob pa'i sems de bzhin// grub pa'i dngul chus reg gyur nas// zang ma gser du 'gyur ba bzhin// grub
309b8(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags kyis reg nas// sngags pa sangs rgyas skur yang 'gyur// lha yi dbang phyug du 'gyur zhing // khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs su
310a1(rgyud): byung nas ni// 'khor lo bskor ba yang 'gyur ro// bltam dang rab tu 'byung mdzad pa// dka' ba spyod pa'i spyod mdzad cing // byang chub spyod pa'ang spyod mdzad pa// sangs
310a2(rgyud): rgyas nyid kyang dran par mdzad// lha las babs dang sprul pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mya ngan 'das po chen po dang // dur khrod gshegs pa de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsu
310a3(rgyud): du lus spangs nas// rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs sku yis// gnas gtsang mar ni slar gshegs nas// sprul par byung ba'i sku yang ngo // gleg ba ma ras ris rim pa yis// chos kyi sku
310a4(rgyud): yang 'jug par mdzad// gang gi de yi grub pa'i sdug ras// sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de nyid kyi thugs// 
310a5(rgyud): rnam par brtags nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ji lta/ ra na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i sku
310a6(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi sku sa'i phyogs gang du dus byed par 'gyur ba yin// de nas lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang yang
310a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dag gis 'di skad du/ ci ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i sku chos kyi dbyings kyi sku mi phyed pa'i sku sa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig tu dus byed par 'gyur ba
310a8(rgyud): yin zhes smra// de 'di skad nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni bde ba can du 'gro ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ 
310b1(rgyud): ci lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos sku spangs nas bde ba can du 'gro 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'on te sprul pa'i sku spangs nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus bde ba can du 'gro
310b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi sku spangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ lag na rdo rje'i smras pa/ ci ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyi skyes bu gang zhig gis dgos pa'i don
310b3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyir sgyu ma sprul nas dgos pa sgrub par byed do// de bzhin du/ gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ sems can yongs su bzung ba'i phyir// 'khor los bsgyur ba 'das
310b4(rgyud): gyur nas/ skye ba yongs su 'dzin par mdzad// gang tshe sangs rgyas 'das pa na// de tshe 'khor lo sa bskur ba 'byung // de gnyis med par 'jig rten 'dir// nam yang
310b5(rgyud): 'byung ba ma yin no// gdul bya'i 'jig rten la rten nas// rkang gnyis mchog gis brtul nas ni// lo ni brgyad cur bzhu gas mdzad de// sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i gnasu gshegs
310b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sgyu ma spangs nas ni// rgyal ba'i pho brang bde can du// rab zhi bde ba chen po la// kun tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyi sa bzhugs// byed po rtag pa gcig pus bzhugs// yin
310b7(rgyud): snyam drang srong rnams sems te// de lta'i ngo bo demini zhes// de ni skad cig sdoms par 'dod// bdag tu 'dzin pas 'khrul pa rnams// rtag tu rtag pa'i don 'dod pa// mi rtag nyid la
310b8(rgyud): 'jug bya'i phyir// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gtong mdzad// dngos po kun gyi dngos bdag nyid// thugs kyis thams cad mkhyen te bdag/ 'od gnas 'di gnas ma yin zhes// byas
311a1(rgyud): pa'i nges pa yod ma yin// kun rdzob bden pa la brten nas// stong gsum 'di sogs gdul bya la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa// na mkha' mnyam/ 
311a2(rgyud): bapar rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba de nyid min// sangs rgyas 'gag pa'ang de bzhin te// thams cad ro gcig gyur pa yi// 'byung dang 'jig pa'i rang bzhin no// de ni chos dbyings
311a3(rgyud): gzugs gcig tu// sgrib pa lnga po spang ba'o// zab cing rgya ni che ba'i gzugs// de nyid ngo bor de nyid bzhugs// gnyis ka yod pa ma yin phyir// gdod nas yod pa ma yin no// de
311a4(rgyud): ni gdod nas ma skyes pas// skye ba ma yin 'gag ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje sang / sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das khams gsum
311a5(rgyud): la rjes su ston po mdzad pa// skye ba med pa 'gag pa me de ba ci lta bu yin/ smras pa/ kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ji snyam sa du sems/ gang sangs rgyas ji snyed pa de gang
311a6(rgyud): zhig yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa zhig yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams ni yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no// lag na
311a7(rgyud): rdo rjes smras pa// ma skyes pa ni skye ba yin// skyes pa phyir yang skye mi 'gyur// don dam nyid du dbyung na ni// de phyir gdod nas ma skyes pa// de bzhin 'chi ba 'chi mi 'gyur// 'chi ba med pa
311a8(rgyud): 'chi ba min// mi gnas pa la gnas pa med// gnas pa de la gnas mi dgos// gal te ma skyes nyams 'gyur zhing // ma skyes pa nyid skye 'gyur na// ri bang gi ni ra nyid kyang // 
311b1(rgyud): skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur// gang tshe yod pa skye 'gyur na// skyes pa slar yang skye bar 'gyur// gal te med pa skyen yang // mo sham bu yang skye bar 'gyur// de phyir thams cad ma rig
311b2(rgyud): pa// 'du byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po lnga ldan 'gro ba rnams// snang ba tsam du rnam par shes// re shig rigs pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan
311b3(rgyud): 'das rnams kyi mya ngan 'das pa shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ thams cad bskyed pa med pa'i phyir// sngags 'di ci ltar rgyud ci ltar// dkyil 'khor
311b4(rgyud): skom pa ci lta bu// dngos grub de ni ji ltar 'grub// la dag na rdo rjes spras pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni// dngos po rnam das ni 'byung ba ltar// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs
311b5(rgyud): brten nas// dngos grub rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos grub rnams ni kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa yang // sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// kun rdzob nyid du
311b6(rgyud): rab sgrub 'gyur/ rtog pa gnyis pa'o// sngags bzlas pa yi cho ga'i rim// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub
311b7(rgyud): pos dngos grub 'gyur bas so// byu ru yis ni dbang du byed// pus kar gos ni dug zhi byed// shel gyi shes rab 'phel bar byed// las gsum la ni sbyar bar bya// skye gnas
311b8(rgyud): kyi rnam par dag pa a ba shwa tA'i mdab ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i thab khung byas la/ mya ngan med pa'i shing la me sbar nas/ cho ga bzhin du ud pa la dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/ 
312a1(rgyud): gar mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la mngar gsum gyis bgos nas rtsa ba'i sngags dang bya ba yin no// phyi nas 'khrul 'khor bya ba yin te/ zla mtshan gyis gos
312a2(rgyud): gos pa'i ras la dkyil 'khor gru gsum bris nas dkyil 'khor du bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa po'i ming dang bcas pa'i bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas par bris te che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyur
312a3(rgyud): cig byas nas/ de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis spel nas rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang // lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag dang / ga bur dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi rnams kyi tshon rtsis bri bar
312a4(rgyud): bya'o// shes rab 'phel bar 'dod na thab khung de nyi/ tad du arka 'am/ ka ra bi ra'i shing la bram ze'i sbyin sreg gi me blangs la sbar la/ a ta ru ka'i sha'i khyi'i ma 'am// shu thag gi
312a5(rgyud): sbyin sreg khri bya'o// dug zhi bar byed na thab khung de nyid du tsan dan gyi shing la me sbyar la/ bin ta ka re'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o// des ni dug thams cad zhi bar 'gug par 'gyuraro// 
312a6(rgyud): sna tshog kyi zug gzer rnams med par byed cing zhi bar byed do// mkha' lding gi rig pa'i rgyud kyi cho ga'o// khams gsum pa yi lam gnas pa'i// btsun mor grags pa ji snyed
312a7(rgyud): ba// sbyin sreg 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba yis// de kun bkug nas spyod par byed// byams pa chags pa'i lta ba yis// sems de yis ni dbang du byed// 'gro ba thams cad dbang
312a8(rgyud): byas nas// sangs rgyas byang chub nges par spyod// 'di ni dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'o// rnam pa kun mkhyen zhes bya ba// shes rab med par thob mi 'gyur// de phyir de thob 'dod pa
312b1(rgyud): gang / shes rab rnon po bsgrub par bya// bzlas dang sbyin sreg sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun la spyod pa'o// blo na dag gsal dri ma med// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin// rnal 'byor
312b2(rgyud): ba ni grol bar 'gyur// gr-i he pi da'i lo ma dang // sha ti dang ni shing mngar dang // bram ze mo dang ma ga to// sbrang dang bcas pas bza' bar bya// shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i cho ga'o// 
312b3(rgyud): de rjes sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas// 'khor lo bzang rtsa de bzhin te// mche ba'i dug gis bzung ba la// bskus dang 'thungs pas zhi bar mdzad// dug gzhil ba'i sman no// dza ri tsaN+Da
312b4(rgyud): li dag dang // nad pa'i sde ni mar khur bcas// lus da kyi srin bu shi ba'i ro// zos nas dbang du 'gyur ba yin// dbang du bya ba da'i sman no// dug 'gugs pas ni 'gro ba bzhi/ 
312b5(rgyud): shes rab 'phel bas sangs rgyas nyid// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni// skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur// bdag gzhan don rab sgrub pa la// theg pa chen por thags/ 
312b6(rgyud): gzhan med// rig pa lan gcig bsgrubs pa yis// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ hrIHyig myos pa'i snod bsams na// bud med rnams ni 'dzag par 'gyur// lce snying dkyil
312b7(rgyud): du hrIHde nyid// bsams na blo rnams skye bar byed// mche bas bzung ba las bsgoms pa// chos kyi yi ge mdzes pa yis// yi ge dag ni dug zhi byed// sgrol ma'i snying po khams gsum
312b8(rgyud): las// rgyal ba yin par brtse ba can gyis rnam shes bya// ngag gi skyon rnams zad pas dug sel rnams kyi skyon spangs pas// shes rab 'phel 'gyur lus kyi skyon rnams dad pas dang / 
313a1(rgyud): du byeb de phyir 'gro ba 'di dag mi dge ba las zhen pas dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// de phyir rgyal ba'i sras kyi phun phyir mi dge ba rnams spang bar bya phyir 'gyi/ phyug
313a2(rgyud): rgya bcings pa'i khyad par gyi ni nges par lus kyi skyon rnams zad par 'gyur// sngags kyis lce'i tshogs kyi skyon rnams gang yin sems kyi skyon// bsam gtan dga' ba'i sems kyis
313a3(rgyud): dga' ba dang pa dri med kyis// lus kyi yid rnams yo ba med pa de tshe sangs rgyas byin gyis rlobs// sdig mod mig gis sdig lta zhing ni snying rje ldan pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por 'gyur// 
313a4(rgyud): sbyin pas bsod nams stobs lhag gyur par sa steng gtso bo sbyin bdag brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur// le lo spangs pas ma khas pas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal cung zad kyang mi
313a5(rgyud): myong // de phyir sangs rgyas sras kyi snying rje'i nor dang brtso na 'grus spyod pa dag la rten// na mkha'i dkyil du sangs rgyas rnams blta sa bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas rnams la sem
313a6(rgyud): rmi lam na yang rtag tu bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskor ba mthong // mkhas pas 'chi ba'i tshe yang ri rab rtser gshegs dang // gzhon pa sna tshogs zhon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// snying rje'i
313a7(rgyud): bdag nyid can gyis mthong gyur pa// sdig pa byas pas dmyal ba'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur// de rnams rnam par dag pa'i rgyud yin te// blo yang der ni gnas par 'gyur// de yi phyir na ci
313a8(rgyud): nas kyang // gos dkar dag gis btsun mor 'dod// de nyid dug ni zhi byed pas// rta mgrin gyis ni go 'phangs gnas// 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshogs 'byung ba// 'gro ba gsum po dbang du byed// 
313b1(rgyud): 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi rgyud sgrub pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur te// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni// slar yang gru gsum gzhan zhig go/ dbang po phyogs
313b2(rgyud): nas brtsams nas ni// oM la sogs pas mkhas pas dri// mtshams drug tu ni sa bon drug/ chos kyi sa bon dkyil du'o// yi ge phu yi nang byas pa// de ni sgo yi ma the ma bri// sbrul bskrad
313b3(rgyud): pa'i rgyud do// de nas bud med skal pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir// sbyor ba gan du bshad par bya ste// 'dab ma bdun pa'i ud pa la byas la de la yi ge bdun sbyar bar bya'o// de'i lte ba la hrIHgnyis
313b4(rgyud): kyis brten pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming dbang du bya ba'i cho ga babazhin du gro ga 'am// yang me tog dang bcas pa'i ras la bris la/ rig pa'i da ril bu byas nas dpung pa la bdags par bya'o// 
313b5(rgyud): bdag po bud med dran du 'gyur// rgyal po'ang zhab sa 'bring nyid du 'gyur/ srung ba'i don du 'khrul 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ut+pal mdab bzhi byas nas ni// de la bus su zla ba bI/ 
313b6(rgyud): shar du mda' ni bri bar bya// lho nyid du ni gzhu bro'o// mi 'jigs lag pa nub tu'o// byang du ut+pal bri bar bya// dbus kyi zla bar bsung bya ste// sa bon bdun gyis bskor ba'o// 'khor lo'i
313b7(rgyud): phyi yi rim pa la// ud pa la phreng bas brgyan pa'o// 'di ni gro ga la bris la// rang gi dpung la ga dbu bar bya// gzhan yang byis pa rgan po dar la bab// 'khrul 'khor gyis ni rang srung 'grub/ 
313b8(rgyud): gal te dbang phyug thob par bya 'dod na// sa bon gyi grong khyer bris la de'i dkyil 'khor du gzhu bri bar bya'o// gzhu'i dkyil du rin po che'i rnam pa lta bu'i ud pal gyi myu gu bri bar bya'o// 
314a1(rgyud): ud pal snying po'i dbus su yi ge dza la yi ge bdun gyis bskor ba'o// sa le snum gyi byang bu la mngon par bris la khyim gyi steng du nges par bzhag par bya'o// phyi
314a2(rgyud): rol nas ud pa la'i phreng bas mngon par bskor bar byas la tshes bcu gnyis sam brgyad la rin po che lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa gang bas phabal khrus byas nas mchod nas bzlas pa brgya
314a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad byas na lo gcig gis nor 'dzin dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// / de lta bu'i rig pa'i ril bu yang dag par gdags par bya'o// de nas sbyor ba
314a4(rgyud): yang 'byung bar 'gyur te// mig dmar la bab pa na/ 'gron bu gan rgyal du gnas pa rnyed na lag pa'i mthil du bzhag nas/ sngags 'bum phrag gcig brgya bzlas na rgyan po 'des
314a5(rgyud): pan pha rol po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'gron bu de bla ngas ku ru kul+le'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ tshes bcu gnyis sa ma/ brgyad la khrus byas nas/ mchod la dar gyi nang du
314a6(rgyud): gtums nas dpung pa la btags na// 'dis nor gyi dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro// 'gron bu de snod du bcug pa'i nang du sba ba byas na nyin rer dkar sha pa Na re re rnyed par 'gyur ro// don sgrub
314a7(rgyud): pa dang / rgyal srid sgrub pa dang / rgyan po rnyed pa dang // 'bras bu sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rtogs pa gsum pa rdzogs so// / gang gis rdul tshon mthong tsam gyis/ 
314a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas myur du thob par byed// dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i rim pa bzhin// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta ba bA bzhi yis nye bar brgyan// de yi dkyil
314b1(rgyud): du lha mo bkod// bla ga'i rnam pa kha dog legs// mda' ni shar du bri bya ba/ gzhu ni lha'i phyogs su'o// mi 'jig lag pa nub tu ste// byang du de bzhin ud pa la'o// mtshams kyi cha ni tham
314b2(rgyud): cad du'o// rdo rje 'khor lo sogs de bzhin// gos dmar po yi spyod g.yogs bgos// dar dmar pos gdong bkab pa'i slob ma bzhug par bya'o// 'dis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya
314b3(rgyud): bcings la 'khor lor me tog bsgyur bar byas te// pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes bya'o// g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor bsten par bya'o// dkyil du ba ba na ni dbang du byas pa'i las la dbang bar
314b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs sbyin pa la bib na ni dug 'a/ dgugs pa la bslab par bya'o// ud pal la babs na/ shes rab 'pho dal ba la bslab par bya'o// gzhul bab na ni thums
314b5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o// 'jug pa'i dus su 'di skad smra bar bya'o// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di dkyil 'khor du ma
314b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa gang gi yang mdun du brjod par bya ba ma yin no// dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ta re zhes brjod nas// de'i
314b7(rgyud): rjes la dam tshig sbyin par bya ste// dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par rgyud las grub pa yin no// mna' bsgrags par yang bya ste// chos kyi rgyal po dam tshig
314b8(rgyud): che// nga las blangs nas 'ga' nyams na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag/ gsang sngags spyod mchog spyod pa rnams// khrag chen dang ni snying chen kyang // de tshe phyung nas gsol bar byed// 
315a1(rgyud): chos kyi bsten pa skyong byed pa// ngal khyod kyis brnyes mi bya// rtag tu gos dmar bgo bya zhing // phreng ba dmar po bcing bar bya// dmar po'i dris kyang byug bya zhing // rin che/ 
315a2(rgyud): dmar po sogs kyis brgyan// chags pa'i sems kyi bsgom bya zhing // sngags kyang chags pa'i sems kyis bzla// btsag gam sin d+hu ra dag gis// pho brang dag ni bri bar bya// mtshal gyi
315a3(rgyud): phye ma dag ga ma ni// gur gu ma dang ni tsan dan dmar// byi ru'i phye ma dag kyang rung // ka ra ke ta yi phye ma sa bri// sin sreg yang na 'khor lo'o// rab tu gnas pa de bzhin te// kun kyang dmar ba'i rang ba'i
315a4(rgyud): sbyar// sangs rgyas ngur smrig mtshon byed yin// srog da chags bsad par mi bya zhing // bden pa min pa yang mi smra// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// gzhan gyi rlungs bsten mi bya// lus kyi sa
315a5(rgyud): ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yi da kyi rnam pa gang gsum pa// mi dge ba dag spang bar gyis// chos dang de ba zhin bang ring dang // byams dang mi 'jigs zhes bya ba ni// 
315a6(rgyud): sbyin pa khyod kyi rtag tu byin// med na bsam gtan las kyis so// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag kyang // khyod kyis rtag tu brten par bya// pha rol phyin pa'i sku dag dang // stobs rnams dang ni dbang dag/ 
315a7(rgyud): dang bud med 'gro ba brnyas mi bya// sgrol ma'i ming can khyad par du// gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyim pas kyang // bud med de ni blang mi bya// grong khyer sgo dang grong dag dang // yul gang du ni sgrol ma ni// 
315a8(rgyud): sgo ldang bzhi pado rtsig ngos dang // sum mdo dag tu khyad par du// gnas pa'i gnas der rtag phyag bya// bstod cing mchod pa chen po bya// gnas der gnas pa byas nas ni// sngags la sogs
315b1(rgyud): ba bsgrub par bya// sgrol ma'i ming can bud med gang // kha dog dmar ser mig legs ma// de mthong rnal 'byor gus pa yis// yid kyis phyag ni bya ba yin// ban dru ze'u 'bru'i me tog dang
315b2(rgyud): de bzhin ka ra bau ra 'dzin// gzhan yang me tog dmar po la// bsgrub pa pos ni 'gom mi bya// de ltar sdom pa byin pas ni// gtsang zhing dag pa'i lha rdzas chu// bum pa bzhin na gnas pa'i chus
315b3(rgyud): slob ma sngags chus dag par bya// slob dpon gyis ni rim pa bzhin// mda' gzhu sogs kyi phyag rgyas bkru// dang por mda' can bum pa ste// gnyis pa gzhu dang ldan pas so// gsum pa mi 'jig
315b4(rgyud): pa lag ti// ud pal gyis ni bzhi par ro// ji ltar sa/ dngas rgyas shAkya yi// seng ge sras bcas rdo rje 'dzin// rgyal srid chen por dbang bskur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis khyod dbang
315b5(rgyud): bskur// khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// de nyid dang dkyil 'khor 'dri ru rnyed// rdul tshon 'di gzigs sangs rgyas rnams// rab tu dgyes par gyur pa yin// 'di ni 'chi med nad med kyang // 
315b6(rgyud): mya ngan med cing phongs pa med// theg pa chen po gtsang ma 'dis// khyod kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob// mda' sogs bzhi yis dbang bskur bas// dam chos snod du byas nas ni// slob ma la
315b7(rgyud): nau gsang ba dag/ cho ga bzhin du sbyin par bya// de la re shig dang por klu la bsdigs pa la bslab par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yo na mo a swa ma hA a n+ya r+ya prA ka la yaM/ na
315b8(rgyud): mo bab te b+h+yo/ bud+d+ha ko Ti b+h+ya tad+ya thA/ oM hrI hrIHhrIH/ sarba nA gA nAM/ a nan ta ku lA nAM/ bA su ki ku lA nAM/ shaM kha pA la ku lA nAM/ kar ko Ta ku lA ne/ pad+ma ku lA nA~M/ ku li ka ku lA nA~M/ sun da ri ka ku lA nAM/ 
316a1(rgyud): gan ka ku lA nAM/ me ka ku lA nAM/ dza la da ku lA nAM/ dza la d+ha ra ku lA nAM/ badz+ra mu ta ku lA nAM/ saM brta ku lA nAM/ e sa brta ku lA nAM/ ku mu da ku lA nAM/ ka ha ra ku lA nAM/ so gan+d+he ku lA mAMH
316a2(rgyud): na ha na/ sha re Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha tsa bi na/ tA Da ya tA Da ya/ ut+pa le na/ brta na/ a b+ha yan/ de hi de hi/ pra la ya/ ka le badz+wa la da ra/ ma b+ha ta ra yan/ ba ra shAn+ta nA ga na ba shaM ku ru/ ku ru ku ru/ phu ku ru ba ya
316a3(rgyud): ku ru ba ya/ phu phu/ a~M ku ru ku l+le hrIHhUM swA hA phaT// sngags 'dis dgon pa'i lci ba las dkyil 'khor byas la/ cho ga bzhin du tsan dan gyi pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa bris la/ 
316a4(rgyud): shar sogs pa'i mdab mal dga' ba la sogs pa'i da klu brgyad bzhag nas/ sha kha ra dang / gu gul rgyu skar skar ma la bab pa'i tshe brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ klu rnams la bdug pa
316a5(rgyud): byin nas de nas mchod pa'o// gal te char 'bab pa ra mi 'gyur na// chang gis khrus byas la seng ldeng gi mes gdung bar bya'o// de ltar byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te char
316a6(rgyud): 'bebs par mi byed na mdzes thebs par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa de dag bya ba'i zas dang ldan par bya ba yin no// phyi sa nas nye bar bsdus la chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o// lha yang dus su
316a7(rgyud): char 'bebs shing // lo thog phun sum tshogs par shog/ 'jig rten mtha' dag skyid pa dang // rgyal po chos dang ldan gyur cig/ ces yongasu bsngo ba yang bya'o// char shin tu ches pa
316a8(rgyud): bcad 'dod na/ sbrul 'dul ba'i mi las sprul cig blang la tsan dan gyis byugs na sa 'o ma blud par bya zhing // sngags 'di lan bdun sngags pa byas pa'i bum pa dmar po ma tshos pa'i
316b1(rgyud): nang du bcug la phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab nas/ bum pa bcag par gyur na de ma thag du char pa gcod par byed do// phyi nas tshogs kyis ston mo bya// yang na nyan thos dge 'dun mchod/ 
316b2(rgyud): khye'u dang bu mo la'ang zas skom sbyin// de ltar byas na klu rnams dga'// char ni 'bab par 'gyur ba'i tshe// gal te 'di ltar mi byed na// klu rnam dga' bar ma byas pas// mdze yis thebs
316b3(rgyud): par gyur pa yin// rgyal po'i bu dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa khrus byas la phyir bzlog pa'i tshes lnga la/ phyir ldog pa'i rtsa ba btsal nas 'o ma 'am// yang na mar dang sbyar te/
